On the Lymansky direction the enemy attacked 14 times in the districts of Grekivka, Makiivka, Nevsky, Zarichny, Torsky and Novosadovo. Two skirmishes are still going on, the rest have been stopped by our soldiers. In the Kramatorsk direction, enemy activity resulted in nine combat engagements. All attacks near Hryhorivka, Predechyny, Chasovoy Yar, Bila Hora and Stupochky choked. The invaders suffered losses. In the Toretsk direction our troops repelled seven enemy attacks near Toretsk, Shcherbanivka and New York. All attacks were repelled by Ukrainian soldiers. The enemy tried 47 times to wedge into our defense on the Pokrovsky direction. The occupiers in the areas of the settlements of Vozdvizheneka, Novotoretskyi, Mykolaivka, Grodivka, Novogrodivka, Lysivka, Krutoy Yar, Dachinsky, Marynivka, Selidovoy and Novotoretskyi received a fierce rebuff from our defenders. Two attacks are ongoing. According to preliminary information, our soldiers neutralized more than 350 occupiers in this direction, 175 of them permanently. Five artillery systems, eleven armored combat vehicles, two BM-21 -Grad- and nine units of automobile equipment were destroyed. Eight vehicles of the occupiers, seven artillery systems, two tanks and three armored combat vehicles were also damaged. On the Kurakhiv direction the enemy attacked our positions 26 times. The most active was in the area of ​​Tsukuryny, Georgiyivka, Kostyantynivka and Katerynivka, where Ukrainian defenders repelled 23 attacks, three clashes are ongoing. In the Vremivsk direction our troops repelled 11 enemy attacks near Vugledar, Bogoyavlenka, Vodyanyi and Katerynivka. The occupiers unsuccessfully tried to launch three attacks on our positions on the Orihiv and Gulyajpil directions near Novodarivka, Robotyny and Maly Shcherbaki. They got a decent rebuff. In the Dnieper direction the enemy does not stop trying to knock our units out of their positions. Two unsuccessful attempts to storm the positions of Ukrainian soldiers were made by the aggressor during the day. Soldiers of the 35th separate marine infantry brigade named after Rear Admiral Mykhailo Ostrogradskyi and the 54th separate mechanized brigade named after Hetman Ivan Mazepa were awarded for effective and professional combat work in the department, who effectively destroy the enemy, inflicting significant losses in manpower and equipment. As reported by ArmyInform, the General Staff showed how Canadian instructors taktyczi-miskyh-boyiv/->teach Ukrainian military tactics of urban battles.

Title: - In Novohrodivka, they drove 15 meters to the shelter of the Russians. They all burned there. Siche...
Description: Correspondents of ArmiyaInform visited the waiting area of ​​Siecheslav tankers and talked with them about the combat tasks and tactics of the enemy. The crew of the T-80BV tank is on combat duty and is preparing for the mission. Enemy drones are flying around, explosions are periodically heard in nearby landings. — This is an offensive tank, it is designed for 5 minutes of combat — maneuverable, fast. He fires eight shots per minute. He flew in, gave a couple of good -slaps-, rolled back, recharged, and started again, - says the gunner-operator Vadim. He is the most experienced in the crew: he participated in the ATO since 2015, then returned to civilian life for a while. However, in 2021, he again signed a contract to serve in the Armed Forces. — Met a full-scale invasion in the East, then it was still a separate tank company, not a battalion. All my military life in the East. At the beginning, there were more crews, more motivated guys, - adds Vadim. Robert, a driver-mechanic, has been serving in the 25th Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces for a year and a half, in civilian life he worked on construction sites. — At first, it was not very attractive to join the tankers, because tanks are mostly the first equipment destroyed. You drive along the highways, there are only towers, and you think: oh no, what tankers, - he recalls with a smile. Tank commander Vladyslav also served in the brigade for a year and a half. -As soon as we entered this direction, we destroyed two tanks with direct fire during the day, in the area of ​​the settlement of Karlivka,- he says. Vadim remembers his first combat encounter with the enemy at the beginning of a large-scale invasion near the village of Verkhnotoretske in the Donetsk region. - It was hell there. I was ready to face the enemy, but it was very difficult. We left with one tank, when the enemy had four. The enemy attacked very actively with the use of airplanes, -Grads-. In the early days, no one could believe that they had reached such a frenzy. It was difficult to come to terms with the fact that this is a real war, he says. One of the crew's most difficult tasks is to destroy an enemy shelter at close range. The building in which the Russians were hiding was located almost in the center of the city, surrounded by a lot of vegetation, so there was no other way to destroy it. — We had the worst situation in Novogrodivka. Our task was to go out and destroy the houses in which the Russians were hiding. Worked with the support of BMP. It was a very close distance - 15 meters, and after the shot nothing was visible, - says Vlad. He used to live in Novogrodivka, so he knew the area well - and this helped a lot in the task, since the tank drove in at dawn and it was difficult to navigate. In addition, there are many Russians around. — After the shots, everything burns, a lot of dust rises, the streets are narrow, it is impossible to turn the tower. And while rolling back, we passed a turn, and our BMP was driving behind us, which could not control itself and crashed. As a result, the crew climbed onto our tank from there. And we rolled back after pi***s. They understood everything, there was an interception that -the Khokhlyat tank was rolling,- recalls mechvod Robert. With the massive appearance of drones on the front, the tactics of using tanks have changed a lot. - Before there was a war - tanks against tanks, and now there are FPV drones. They can quickly find you and destroy the tank. Nowadays, tanks are used more from closed positions, says Vadim. It was the same at the beginning of the war, he recalls, because then the enemy had a significant advantage in technology. Tanks fired from closed firing positions to engage targets that were not in line of sight, and this was much more effective. The paratroopers say that the Russians are currently using an interesting tactic in the Pokrovsky direction — they move mainly on foot without the support of armored vehicles. - They value life force less than iron. And yet they end a little. If the enemy takes active actions, we are given a command, and we simply destroy them from a closed position. And it turns out very well, because the tank is a very precise thing, and it is advisable to use them in this way, - say the crew.   According to the observations of our tankers, the Russians currently use T-72 tanks the most in Donetsk region, newer tanks such as the T-90M -Breakthrough- are not recorded. — I saw a T-90 parked in Oskol. There was knee-deep water there, I don't know how he didn't pass there, couldn't cross the crossing, - says Vadim. In addition to domestic tanks, he can also drive German Leopards, as he has undergone the relevant training in Germany. — Foreign equipment is better equipped, it is good equipment, -reportazh-armiyainform-z-donechchyny/->especially Leopard 2A4 tanks. Its strengths are good weapons, an armored capsule, various electrical systems, the gunner notes. Tankers emphasize that the most important thing in the crew is harmony. Despite the fact that they have only been working together for a few months, the guys are confident in each other. - In a few months, we went through many funny stories. It brought us closer even before we were on the same crew. We were almost always next to each other, we worked together. -Coherence is very important,- emphasizes Robert. The Sicheslav brigade says that they are actively recruiting, and about 20 people have signed contracts this month. Everyone is accompanied from the first application to the beginning of the BZVP and until the person takes office. Photo by Olena Khudyakova

Title: Reactive response to enemy electronic countermeasures: the British created a drone that hunts for el...
Description: As indicate experts from the BuildingTech portal, the new UAV is developed on the basis of a proven jet drone Modini Dart 250, which ensured a high level of interchangeability of components and a high level of their availability, ArmyInform notes. The Dart 250EW is equipped with a set of modern sensors that allow it to hit WED complexes using a guidance system at the source of interference. The key element of this system is a dual-frequency antenna installation and the patented Modini FX-2 Flight controller. It is this controller that makes the drone capable of autonomous detection, capture and targeting of a target operating in the radio frequency range. The FX-2 Flight controller is responsible for managing all stages of the attack: from the initial detection of the source of radio waves to the precise destruction of the target. Such a system allows you to effectively suppress enemy EW, minimizing risks for operators and other combat units. Another important feature of the Dart 250EW is its Terrain following system, which allows the drone to automatically maintain a set flight height of 50 to 100 meters above ground level. It ensures the ability to covertly move the drone in difficult terrain conditions, which makes it difficult for enemy radar stations to detect. According to the contributors of the site mil.in.ua, the flight speed of the Dart 250EW presented on defense exhibition MSPO2024 in the Polish city of Kielce, exceeds 400 km/h. This makes it extremely maneuverable and hard to see for the enemy. Such a high speed allows the drone to quickly reach the area of ​​effect of enemy EW systems, guide and hit targets with minimal reaction time. When the Dart 250EW enters the area of ​​operation of an enemy EW system, its FX-2 Flight controller automatically guides itself to the source of interference by azimuth and altitude, ensuring an accurate hit on the target. This makes the drone a powerful means of suppressing enemy EW systems, effectively disrupting their operation and opening the way for further action by friendly forces. Therefore, the Dart 250EW is an innovative solution in the field of electronic warfare, combining high speed, maneuverability and accuracy of guidance, which makes it one of the key tools on the modern battlefield. The manufacturer expects a certain demand for drones of this type, since the war in Ukraine demonstrated the need for a large number of inexpensive means to defeat enemy electronic warfare systems. In addition, specialists of the Modini company are developing a reconnaissance variant of the jet drone under the index Dart 250 ISR.

Title: Remuneration for instructors of the Armed Forces: who is paid and how much
Description: ArmyInform tells who is entitled, under what conditions the payment is made, and how much military personnel in these positions receive. Military servicemen of the management and instructor-teaching staff of educational military units (educational centers, educational military units, educational units, training schools) are paid additional remuneration in the amount of from 15,000 to 30,000 hryvnias. The list of specific training military units and positions of management and instructor-teaching staff, which are paid additional remuneration, is determined by the decision of the Minister of Defense of Ukraine. Payment of the specified remuneration is made to servicemen who are involved in the training and training of personnel, from the day the training begins in the training military units until the day it is completed. Important. Additional compensation is paid regardless of the number of classes that conducted by the management and instructor-teaching staff during staff training. Military servicemen who are admitted to temporary performance of duties as instructors are also paid. And also to those who arrived on a business trip to training centers for training and training of personnel. The management and teaching staff are paid on the basis of the order of the commander of the military unit, and the commanders of the units are paid by the order of the superior commander according to their subordination. The preparation of draft orders on the involvement of instructors in training and the payment of additional compensation is carried out on the basis of the reports of unit commanders on the days of their actual implementation of staff training measures. They also require reporting documents on training. As reported in the Department of Social Security of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, the reporting documents include: Payment will not be received by servicemen: a) who temporarily left the military unit with retention of positions at the place of service: b) in the event that persons holding positions (temporarily performing duties ranks by positions) of the instructor staff, do not have the corresponding level of training of the sergeant (sergeant) and instructor staff. c) in the following cases:

Title: The voice in the video does not belong to me: the enemy launched a deepfake about the situation in P...
Description: Back in February 2022, the Anti-Disinformation Center warned that technology deepfake can be actively used in information and psychological operations during the Russian invasion of Ukraine to create false videos. For example, with the statement about the capitulation of Volodymyr Zelenskyi. And there were actually a lot of deepfake videos during the large-scale war. The other day, the Head of the Donetsk regional state administration, head of the regional military administration, Vadym Filashkin notified that deepfake is spreading on the network a video with what appears to be his comment about the situation in the Pokrovsk community. The falsified video says that local residents are allegedly organizing rallies against the Armed Forces, clashing with the military, and therefore the community will be forced to evacuate the population. This information is not true. -The voice on the video does not belong to me, and the information presented repeats Russian propaganda narratives and is designed to cause tension in society,- said Vadym Filashkin and urged everyone to be careful with information on the Internet and trust only official sources. There are two main ways to protect against deepfakes: using critical thinking or technology. Again, artificial intelligence tools help to recognize a fake. But it is worth knowing that for more than a decade we have been living in the post-truth era, which is an information flow that is deliberately constructed in modern society to create a virtual reality different from reality with the goal of manipulating public consciousness. Therefore, a sensational message seen or heard during the war usually needs additional confirmation.

Title: Volodymyr Zelenskyi spoke about the results of his visit to the USA
Description: About this said President Volodymyr Zelenskyi before his departure for Ukraine. Strong positions for Ukraine mean faster peace. Everything that is key for Ukraine is on the partners' table, everything is being considered. Long-range, defense package, sanctions against Russia, steps regarding Russian assets. We managed to work on all topics,- said the President. He added that currently preparations are also underway for president-ssha/->meetings in Germany within the framework of -Ramstein- is a format where, together with partners, Ukraine will follow the contents of the points of the Victory Plan. -Thank you to President Biden for the invitation. Yesterday in Washington we went through all the key things, all the key decisions. Thank you for your desire to implement exactly this way so that Ukraine wins. Thanks for the unprecedented military package and corresponding decisions — a large package, the amount of almost 8 billion,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy said. According to him, the new aid package will support our soldiers and all our people, including the strengthening of air defense before winter. -There were meetings in the US Congress - full support. Both parties, both chambers. I am grateful to all senators, all members of the House of Representatives for conversations, for friendly advice and for questions that really make it possible to achieve important results, our common strength and peace through strength,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy said. He added that the Victory Plan was presented to both presidential candidates - Kamala Harris and /->Donald Trump. -It is important for Ukraine that America understands Ukraine directly. That's exactly how it is. This Russian war must be ended, and it must be ended justly, so that no aggressor does anything like Russia again,- said the President. Volodymyr Zelenskyy emphasized that everything dependent on Ukraine was done to strengthen it as much as possible. And now, together with our partners, we need to ensure exactly what will bring a just peace closer. Russia must lose this war. Ukraine must win. These are real foundations for common security. Peace is due to strength,- he said.

Title: 9 children and a 20-year-old boy were returned to Ukraine from Russia and the temporarily occupied t...
Description: reported the ombudsman Dmytro Lubinets about this. The age of the returnees is from 13 to 17 years. Some of them have disabilities and serious illnesses. Returned Ukrainians are from the Kherson, Zaporizhzhia, Donetsk, Luhansk regions and Crimea. At the beginning of the large-scale Russian invasion of Ukraine, some of the returned children were in the Oleshkiv Children's Boarding Home. Later, the occupation authorities took them to the city of Skadovsk and Russia. Through the mediation of the State of Qatar, it was possible to reunite the children with their families, who were separated for a long time by the Russians. One of the boys, who returned to his native land today, lost his father, who defended Ukraine during the Russian invasion. Some of the children will finally, after a long time, hug their relatives who are faithfully serving in various structures of Ukraine. Some returned to their grandparents, because they are the ones who can give a happy childhood in their native land.

Title: The General Staff showed how Canadian instructors teach Ukrainian military tactics in urban battles
Description: Photos from the training of Ukrainian servicemen -in urban areas- were made public in the General headquarters of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. During the exercise, service members practice tactical elements such as house and room entry checks, casualty evacuation, preparation, capture, clearing and building maintenance, and more. Also, the Ukrainian military learns complex actions during the seizure of premises in the department. Important importance is given to the skills of moving among city ruins, overcoming rubble, moving between buildings, etc. Instructors emphasize that fighting can take place in one building and consist of several isolated battles and skirmishes on different floors, in different corridors and rooms. These training modules prepare our soldiers for combat conditions during the defense of Ukraine against the Russian aggressor. Canadian instructors play a key role in this process, providing a high level of training and imparting their expertise. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that Ukrainian soldiers are trained by Norwegian instructors of the Norwegian training operation -ELLISEV-, which is a component of the multinational training operation Interflex on the territory of Great Britain.

Title: Dmytro Klimenkov: An effective and transparent defense procurement system is a key priority
Description: Deputy Minister of Defense Dmytro Klimenkov said about this. -The team of the Ministry of Defense is working on its improvement every day. We are grateful to our NATO partners for their constant and constructive cooperation, in particular within the framework of the Strategic Review of Defense Procurement,- he said. The MOU plans to involve the teams of the Ministry of Justice of Ukraine, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and our international partners with NATO in active cooperation in the implementation of the recommendations of the Review and their practical implementation. -An effective procurement system is a guarantee of timely provision of our soldiers with everything they need at the front, and this is one of the key elements of our future victory,- Dmytro Klimenkov emphasized.

Title: Volodymyr Zelensky presented the Victory Plan to Donald Trump
Description: This is stated in messages of the head of state. -I think we have a common view that the war in Ukraine should be stopped. Putin cannot win. Ukrainians must win. And I want to discuss with you the details of our plan, the Victory Plan,- the head of state said before the start of the meeting. Volodymyr Zelenskyi noted that it is necessary to put pressure on the Russian dictator and force him to make peace, and presented Donald Trump with the Victory Plan. The President of Ukraine also talked about the situation at the front, the progress of the operation in the Kursk region and its tasks, Ukrainian innovations in the fight against Russian terror, as well as the disproportionately high losses of the Russian army. During the meeting, the general situation in Ukraine, the consequences of the war for Ukrainians and the economy were discussed in detail. A separate focus of the conversation is the constant shelling of cities and civilian infrastructure by the Russian Federation and the role of American Patriot systems in protecting people's lives. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also emphasized that it is necessary to block any opportunities for the aggressor state to receive money for the war from the sale of oil and gas, as well as all channels of supply of Western components for Russian missiles. Donald Trump called today's meeting a good sign. -He (the President of Ukraine, — ed.) went through hell, and his country went through such hell, which few countries have gone through - this has never happened anywhere. No one had ever seen anything like it. It's a terrible situation,- he said. As you know, during his visit to the USA, Volodymyr Zelensky also ocholyt-prezydent-ssha/->held a meeting with US President Joe Biden and Democratic presidential candidate Camila Harris.

Title: The Defense Forces explained the activation of the Russians in the Lyman direction
Description: The head of the public relations service told about this on Army TV 63 OMBr Rostislav Yashchyshyn. -There is a whole set of reasons here. We know that they are conducting a certain covert mobilization, new personnel are constantly arriving. They go through minimal training for a few days, no one bothers with them,- said Rostyslav Yashchyshyn. The spokesman added that the occupiers had also been accumulating equipment for a long time, and when they managed to collect the amount necessary for the assaults, they used it. -But such assaults did not bring any positives for the enemy. Our main task, first of all, is to prevent armored vehicles from approaching our infantry. That is why we launch counterattacks at the beginning of the offensive,- he explained. According to the information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, on September 27 in the Limansk direction, the invading army kurahivskomu-ta-pokrovskomu-napryamkah/->carried out six attacks on Ukrainian positions near Grekivka, Makiivka, Nevsky and Novosadovo. Four clashes have ended, two more are ongoing.

Title: During the day, the occupiers shelled Kherson, there are wounded
Description: This was notified by the Kherson Regional State Administration. A 58-year-old man and an 82-year-old woman were injured as a result of dropping explosives. They have blast injuries, contusions and shrapnel wounds to the head. -Shvidka- took the victims to the hospital for medical assistance. Two women injured in another Russian shelling of Kherson were also taken to the hospital. At the time of the enemy attack, local women, 85 and 64 years old, were in the house. They received explosive injuries and contusions. Earlier today, a man from Kherson was taken to the hospital, who was injured in a Russian attack on the Dnipro district of Kherson. A 53-year-old man was injured due to an attack by an enemy UAV. As reported by ArmyInform, removed the bodies of two more dead. The number of dead has increased to three.

Title: Ukrainian brush, but with foreign details - the fighter Vasyl gets used to the prosthesis of his rig...
Description: The video with the defender was published on September 27 on the brigade channel . Vasyl served as a driver. Having lost a limb during enemy fire, he did not leave his service in the army and his comrades. Even with one hand, the boy drove the car perfectly and did not lose heart. -I also drove with an automatic transmission. But I got used to mechanics. I think it's pretty good,- says Vasyl. Now Vasyl is getting used to the bionic arm. -It performs certain functions, helps in everyday life,- says the fighter. The 63rd brigade expresses its sincere gratitude to all volunteers and medics who helped and supported our indomitable soldiers. As reported by ArmyInform, veterans on prostheses participated in the show at Ukrainian Fashion Week.

Title: New ponchos for the Armed Forces: the Ministry of Defense invites companies to participate in tests
Description: This is stated in the message at sites of the department. Ukrainian poncho manufacturers can offer samples of their products in accordance with the technical conditions developed by the Ministry of Defense. -Technical description for the experimental batch - Poncho (Type 2)- from the Main Directorate for the Development of Material Support is already available on the official website of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine in the section -Technical descriptions for the experimental batch-, as well as on the platform -MOU Partner-‎. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense plans to expand the range of tangible property for the military. The department is developing technical specifications for baseball caps, pants with knee pads, turnstiles and tablets.

Title: 68,000 women in the Armed Forces: the Ministry of Defense managed to implement systemic changes in g...
Description: About this said State Secretary of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Lyudmila Daragan at the international seminar on gender equality, which was held as part of the annual Richelieu Forum of Public Service in Kyiv. She said that the total number of women in the Armed Forces of Ukraine is 68,000, of which more than 48,000 are servicewomen. There are about 5,000 servicewomen directly in the combat zone. Lyudmila Daragan shared her observations of the faster integration of women in the army in the conditions of repelling a large-scale Russian invasion: -Today, women are everywhere - holding the rear, working in difficult positions, fighting in the ranks of the Armed Forces. They prove that people should be judged by their capabilities, efficiency and intelligence, not by gender.- The State Secretary of the Ministry of Defense drew attention to the changes in the gender policy of the Ministry of Defense, which were implemented in recent years. In particular, based on her own experience of serving, she noted that in 2018, women had the opportunity to serve in combat specialties. However, this opportunity remained unrealized for a long time. -The law itself was not enough. There was also an order with the seal of the DSK, which regulated officer positions for women and men separately. In 2022, after the change of this order, it was possible to overcome these obstacles,- Lyudmila Daragan said. In addition, it was possible to improve the level of material security of female military personnel. For example, in 2023, the summer women's military uniform appeared - before that, only the dress uniform was available. The participants of the seminar discussed topical issues of ensuring equality and inclusion in the context of the state policy of Ukraine. Special attention was paid to the impact of the war on overcoming gender inequality in the public service and the Armed Forces. The event emphasized the importance of implementing people-centered principles. They also discussed the new challenges that Ukraine faced due to the full-scale war: The participants noted Ukraine's significant progress in achieving gender equality and adapting legislation to European standards. The seminar became a platform for sharing experience and discussing further plans for the implementation of the state gender policy. -Ukraine demonstrates systemic success in implementing inclusive approaches. Progress in overcoming gender inequality, the active involvement of women in various spheres of public life, as well as the integration of the principles of inclusion, in particular in the system of the Ministry of Defense, are important steps on the way to European and European integration,- Lyudmila Daragan emphasized.

Title: -Dismissed- evaders with -difficult diagnoses-: -family contract- informed about suspicion
Description: This was reported by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. A 29-year-old doctor, who is a member of the permanent military medical commission of the RTCC and SP, and his 61-year-old father organized a money-making -scheme- for those willing to -de-register- from the military register. The father -recommended- his son to his acquaintances as a proven person who has -influence and official connections- to avoid mobilization. In the future, clients came for an -appointment-, received the necessary medical documentation about -difficult diagnoses- with the help of the doctor's son. Then these documents were sent to the Military Commissariat with the mark -unfit for service- due to -bad- health. This allowed men to deregister from the military register and go abroad. The father did not tell petitioners the full amount, but usually said they would end up paying about $4,000. First, customers had to hand over a deposit in the amount of 40,000 UAH, and then another 2,600 USD. Law enforcement officers exposed the father and son and informed them of the suspicion. They face imprisonment for up to eight years with confiscation of property. Earlier, ArmyInform informed that law enforcement officers reported the suspicion to the military army of the Russian Federation, which during the occupation tortured civilians in the village of Velikiy Burluk of the Kupyan district of the Kharkiv region.

Title: Army under the protection of the Virgin — an exhibition project opened in Kyiv
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine participated in its implementation. The exhibition shows the history of the transformation of the image of the Protection of the Holy Mother of God as an important element of the culture of Ukrainian soldiers from ancient times to today, when the newest Ukrainian knights repel Russia's large-scale armed aggression. The exposition consists of paintings, icons and their lists (copies), graphics, historical documents, rare weapons and church utensils, clothing items, photos, multimedia, etc. The opening of the exhibition was attended by the Vicar of the Kyiv Diocese of the OCU, Bishop Yefrem Vasylkivskyi, representatives of the Main Communications Department of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, historians, museum curators, publishers, representatives of the media and the public. -It is symbolic that the church holiday of the Intercession is celebrated on the same day as other important state holidays - the Day of the Ukrainian Cossacks and the Day of Defenders of Ukraine. Therefore, we strive to show the historical basis of the appearance of these holidays, testify to the durability of the military tradition and reveal the special place of faith among the bravest of us. After all, right now the servicemen of the Armed Forces of Ukraine are continuing this path of struggle of Ukrainian defenders of previous generations for the independence and freedom of our Motherland,- said Diana Popova, general director of the Museum of the History of the City of Kyiv. -The symbols of protection for the Ukrainian soldier have long been icons of the Protection of the Holy Mother of God. The Virgin Mary with the approaching soldiers - those depicted in front of her - became part of the Ukrainian cult. This transformation — one might say, the -militarization- of the Mother of God — is unique to Ukrainian Orthodoxy. Let me remind you that in the first days of the full-scale invasion of the Russians in 2022, the image of the Mother of God with a -javelin- appeared in our mass culture - the corresponding chevron, among other things, is presented in the part of the exposition prepared by the General Staff,- said the spokesman of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Captain Dmytro Lykhova The exhibition at the Kyiv History Museum will last until December 1, 2024. As ArmyInform already told in the National Reserve -Kyiv-Pechersk Lavra- since last May, the program for military personnel -Spiritual restoration through culture- has been implemented.

Title: The defense forces repelled the assault of a convoy of 50 vehicles in the Kupyansk direction
Description: This was reported by the command of the Airborne Assault Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. On September 26, the enemy once again tried to break through the positions of the Defense Forces of Ukraine in the Kupyan direction. At one of the boundaries, the column split into two parts: the larger part - 37 units of equipment - began to storm the units of the National Guard of Ukraine, the smaller part - 13 units of tanks and BBM - the position of the 77th Army. However, even with such serious forces, the enemy units were unable to complete the tasks set before them it did not succeed: paratroopers and national guardsmen showed courage, high professionalism and stability in defense, defeating the enemy and pushing him back to their starting positions. Two tanks, two armored personnel carriers and an infantry fighting vehicle were destroyed on the approach to the Dnieper paratroopers, and those who remained managed to flee in panic. The enemy column, which attacked the positions of the soldiers of the National Guard of Ukraine, also suffered a setback: as a result of the professional and decisive actions of the Ukrainian soldiers, this enemy assault was also repelled. Thus, the joint actions of Ukrainian paratroopers and National Guardsmen foiled the enemy's plans in an important direction. As reported by ArmyInform, UAV operators of the -Revenge- offensive guard brigade repelled an assault in Kharkiv Oblast, in which the enemy used a tank, BMP and armored personnel carrier.

Title: Exclusive from Chasovoy Yar, a Ukrainian sapper defuses a Russian bomb: stream from a front-line cit...
Description: Video of the hard work of our sapper. His task was to neutralize a planned Russian FAB-500 bomb that did not explode after hitting the building. Fortunately, he managed to remove the detonator, the bomb itself will be detonated later in a safe place. Two Russian soldiers decided to end the holiday season by the water. Fully armed, the extremes got on a jet ski and raced down the Dnieper. Our pilots decided to diversify the rest of the Russians and hit them with a drone, and the whole story ended with a bang! These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - Junior Lieutenant Serhii Lipko and Junior Sergeant Volodymyr Kravchuk.

Title: Ukraine is ready to share the experience of using weapons with the USA for its improvement - Deputy ...
Description: To increase the number of joint projects of the military industry called Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Oleksandr Balanutsa in an address to American defense companies, members of the National Defense Industries Association (NDIA). This will pave the way for deepening cooperation between Ukrainian and American defense industry companies. -Ukraine has already gained enormous experience of using Western weapons on the battlefield. We are ready to share it to improve the characteristics of weapons. NDIA has the prospect of becoming an information bridge between the Ministry of Defense and American companies,- Oleksandr Balanutsa suggested to American gunsmiths. The war started by Russia revealed the -weaknesses- of NATO countries. At the very least, according to the representative of Ukraine, we are talking about insufficient rates of production of weapons and ammunition. -But we see how these challenges are being solved. From their side, they are ready to cooperate to increase the pace, volumes and quality of production of what has proven effective on the battlefield,- Oleksandr Balanutsa added. He thanked American gunsmiths for the Association's support and contribution to the stability of Ukraine's defense. At the same time, he urged not to stop in expanding the formats of interaction and to cooperate more widely with Ukrainian manufacturers. As reported by ArmyInform, the US Ministry of Defense announced a new aid package for Ukraine in the amount of $2.4 billion within the framework of the Ukraine Security Assistance Initiative (USAI).

Title: A man from Sumy who likes theatrical effects will be tried for calling for terrorist attacks
Description: Inform in the Sumy region prosecutor's office. Under the procedural guidance of the Sumy Regional Prosecutor's Office, a 25-year-old man from Sumy who publicly called for terrorist acts was notified of suspicion. -According to the investigation, the suspect distributed a video on social networks in which persons in balaclavas and with weapons call for blowing up railway tracks and committing acts of terrorism on the territory of the Sumy region,- the prosecutor's office reported. During the search, a mobile phone with evidence of illegal activity was seized from the person involved in the criminal proceedings. At the moment, the issue of selecting a preventive measure for the suspect is being resolved. For what he committed, he faces up to 5 years in prison. As reported by ArmyInform, they will be tried a spy who disclosed the location of artillery units and firing positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: In Kyiv, an enemy drone was caught from the Dnipro
Description: This was reported by the State Emergency Service on September 27. Working underwater required the utmost precision and caution, as any remaining munitions could pose a potential threat. Professional sappers quickly examined the water area of ​​the reservoir, and at a depth of 12 meters, 60 meters from the shore, they found the wreckage of a Russian UAV. The State Emergency Service urges citizens to exercise maximum caution and in no case record on video the moments when rockets or drones fall. -If you witness such events, immediately call the Rescue Service on the number -101-. Do not approach the site of the fall or touch the debris: such objects can be dangerous and require professional disposal. Take care of yourself!-, says the message of the State Emergency Service. As reported by ArmyInform, a Russian missile was neutralized in Vinnytsia X-101.

Title: -Dracula-, an ammunition depot and a big explosion: a night Vampire attacked a Russian in the Vovcha...
Description: A new video of the effective work of the Vampire UAV by fighters of the Kramatorsk border detachment in the Vovchan direction published on September 27 by the State Border Service of Ukraine. -Thanks to the skill of the pilots, the enemy positions were hit with the help of the night bird -Vampire-, the border guards commented on the video. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how Ukrainian drones broke the -Lancet- - shot down an attack enemy UAV and a bunch of reconnaissances.

Title: Banquet during the plague: officials made money on spare parts for fighter jets
Description: This is notified by the Security Service of Ukraine. Counter-intelligence of the Security Service together with the Security Service and in cooperation with the management of Ukroboronprom exposed new episodes of appropriation of budget funds for the purchase of components for combat aircraft of the Armed Forces. -We are talking about a criminal scheme that law enforcement officers eliminated in December 2023 at one of Ukraine's defense enterprises. At that time, the ex-director of the plant was exposed for embezzling at least 4 million UAH during the purchase of modules for radar systems for Ukrainian fighter jets. So far, the law enforcement officers have documented an additional 32 million hryvnias, which the suspect and his accomplices took -into the shadows,- the SBU reports. Therefore, the total amount of damages caused to the state is more than UAH 36 million. According to the case materials, the scheme consisted in accepting on the company's balance sheet known defective parts that were supplied to the plant by -their- companies. At the same time, the funds paid for these defective parts were then transferred to cash and distributed among the participants of the -scheme-. Currently, the ex-director of the state-owned enterprise (in absentia), his former deputy, six managers of controlled companies and two more of their accomplices have been notified (in accordance with the crimes committed) of suspicion under the following articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: ch. 2, 3 Art. 255 (creation, management of a criminal community or criminal organization, as well as participation in it); Part 4 of Art. 28, Part 5 of Art. 191 (appropriation, embezzlement of property or possession of it by abuse of official position in particularly large amounts, committed by a criminal organization); Part 4 of Art. 28, Part 1 of Art. 366 (official forgery of official documents, introduction of knowingly false information to official documents, committed by a criminal organization); Part 4 of Art. 28, Part 3 of Art. 209 (legalization (laundering) of property obtained by criminal means in particularly large amounts, committed by a criminal organization). Perpetrators face up to 13 years in prison with confiscation of property. The former head of a state-owned enterprise is hiding from justice outside of Ukraine. Comprehensive measures are underway to bring him to justice for the crimes committed. ArmyInform told that the swindlers went to trial for defrauding the evaders of $15,000, and then demanded another $20,000.

Title: The General Staff of the Armed Forces: the enemy is storming the Kurakhiv and Pokrovsky directions w...
Description: This is stated in operational information of the General Staff ZSU as of 16:00 on September 27. Today, in the Kharkiv direction, the Russian occupiers twice tried to storm the defensive lines of the Ukrainian army in the Vovchansk region, our troops repelled the Russian attacks. In the Kupyansk direction, the enemy actively advanced six times on the positions of our units in the area of ​​Synkivka, Novoselivka, Hlushkivka, Kruglyakivka, and Lozova. Ukrainian soldiers are steadfastly on the defensive, four skirmishes are still ongoing. The situation is under control. In the Lyman direction, the invading army launched six attacks on Ukrainian positions near Grekivka, Makiivka, Nevsky, and Novosadovo. Four clashes have ended, two more are ongoing. In the Kramatorsk direction, the invaders carried out three assaults with the support of army aviation in the direction of the positions of our troops near Hryhorivka and Stupochka. All attacks of the invaders were repelled. In the Toretsk direction, the Russians tried to dislodge our units from their positions near Toretsk, Shcherbanivka, and New York, where the Defense Forces repelled two attacks, three clashes are still ongoing. The occupiers actively use aviation in this direction, in particular, the areas of Druzhba, Berestka and Kostyantynivka are subject to bombardment. Since the beginning of the day in the Pokrovsky direction, the enemy has already made 19 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their occupied positions in the areas of Vozdvizhenka, Novotoretsky, Mykolaivka, Grodivka, Lysivka, Krutoy Yar, Dachinsky, Marynivka, Selidovy, and Novotoretsky. The defense forces are holding back the onslaught and have repelled 15 enemy attacks so far, with four ongoing attacks. Enemy losses are detailed. Fighting continues near Tsukuryny, Georgiyivka, Kostyantynivka and Katerynivka in the Kurakhiv direction. According to detailed information, 13 attacks by the occupying army have been repulsed today, four attacks are ongoing. In the Vremivsk direction, our troops repelled five attacks in the direction of Ugledar, Bogoyavlenka, Vodyanyi and Katerynivka, three more attacks are ongoing, attempts to advance to the enemy did not bring success. On the Gulyaipil and Orihiv directions the occupiers made one unsuccessful attempt to attack our units near Novodarivka and Maly Shcherbaki. In the Dnieper direction, the enemy twice unsuccessfully tried to dislodge Ukrainian soldiers from their positions.

Title: Missile attack on Kryvyi Rih: the dead were found under the rubble
Description: reported this by the head of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Serhiy Lysak. On Monday, September 30, the Day of Mourning will be announced in Kryvyi Rih. 23 private houses, 3 high-rise buildings, an educational institution building and 82 cars were damaged by the enemy strike. Previously reported that as a result of the Russian attack on Kryvyi Rih, the building of the district police department was destroyed. As of this hour, six victims are known. Rescue operations are ongoing. Information about the victims will be clarified.

Title: The Ministry of Defense has developed a new data management system for the efficiency of working wit...
Description: This is stated in messages MOU. The department has developed a Data Management Concept, which also establishes requirements for information storage formats and managers responsible for these processes. -The Ministry of Defense creates and daily operates a large amount of information, which requires a new approach to work with it. The concept launched the creation of an integrated, secure and efficient data management system. I am convinced that the new data management system will allow to work more efficiently with large volumes of information. And such an automated process will contribute to the achievement of the strategic goals of the Ministry of Defense and increase the level of the country's defense capability,- said Deputy Minister of Defense Stanislav Heyder. The Ministry of Defense sets the goal: The document was prepared based on the results of several months of testing of the new data management system. The concept also involves a transition from manual data processing to decision support systems, including the use of artificial intelligence elements. As reported by ArmyInform, the Rezerv+ application will be available from October recruiting service. With this update, actual vacancies in military units will appear, which will allow users of the application to quickly find the place of their future service.

Title: They broke the -lancet- - our drones shot down an enemy attack UAV and a bunch of reconnaissance
Description: The video of combat work appeared on September 27 on the brigade's channel. In total, our drones shot down 5 Zala-421 UAVs, 2 Orlan-10, a Supercam S350 and a Lancet of the Russian troops over the line of combat. As reported by ArmyInform, aerial reconnaissance units of one of the divisions of the 11th brigade named after Mykhailo Hrushevsky of the National Guard saved the life of a Ukrainian citizen on the line of combat in the southern direction.

Title: I wrote - by telegram - to the FSB: a Russian agent was detained in Kostyantynivka
Description: reports this by the Donetsk Regional Prosecutor's Office. An indictment against a citizen has been sent to the court for unauthorized dissemination of information on the deployment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (Part 2 of Article 114-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). In December 2022, a resident of Kostyantynivky joined one of the pro-Russian communities in the Telegram application. In the course of communicating with chat participants, the man began to spread data about the deployment locations of the Defense Forces of Ukraine. -In particular, in text messages, he indicated the location of artillery units and firing positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on the territory of his city, as well as the villages of Ivanopil, Kleban-Byk, and Oleksandro-Shultine of the Kramatorsk district. In 4 months, the accused sent 8 messages of a military nature,- the prosecutor's office added. At the prosecutor's request, he is in custody until the court's verdict is announced. The sanction of the article provides for punishment in the form of deprivation of liberty for a term of 5 to 8 years. As reported ArmyInform, the attacker spied on the movement of combat equipment of the Defense Forces in the direction of the front line.

Title: I was catching up - our pilots destroyed a Russian sprinter drone
Description: The video of the defeat was released on September 27 on the unit's channel. Our aerial scouts first found and hit the starlink of the Russians. Then one of the occupiers came out onto the field from his hiding place in the landing. I must have been looking for a missing connection. Our FPV drone immediately flew to the occupier. the Russian tried to escape, but lost the last race of his life. As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the K-2 battalion 54 of the mechanized brigade named after Hetman Ivan Mazepa demonstrated a master class with repelling the mechanized attack of the Russians, and then they also provided commenting.

Title: The recruitment service in the Reserve+ application will be launched in October
Description: About this declared Kateryna Chernogorenko, Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for Digitization, during a speech at the IT Arena conference in Lviv. According to her, this significantly expands the range of services provided by the Ministry of Defense to military and civilians. -We set an ambitious goal for the Reserve+ application, in addition to the basic function of updating data, to become a tool where a conscript, conscript or reservist could solve their questions in a few clicks. And opening the opportunity to choose a place of service is one of the important steps we take for this. We will gradually improve the functionality of the service. So we will wait for user feedback about their experience,- Chernogorenko noted. The new recruiting service in Reserve+ will help users choose positions that best match their experience, skills and preferences. It is important to note that both combat and non-combat positions will be available. At the beginning of the job search, users need to fill out a short questionnaire. Based on this information and the selected skills, the system will offer the most suitable options. The application will contain a detailed description of the vacancies, including information about the brigades, their commands, achievements and publications in the media. A feature of the service is a convenient job selection process and system algorithms. The intuitive interface will allow you to quickly make a decision: press -plus- to save the offer for further study, or -minus- to reject it. The Reserve+ application began its work on May 16, the day the new law on mobilization came into force. During this time, thanks to him, more than 3 million Ukrainians were able to update their data and generate a military electronic document. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the application for military personnel Army+ received the function of data correction about military service.

Title: From the lie about the MH17 flight to the torture chamber: the sullen man was informed of the suspic...
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informed about this. Among the occupiers, the terrorist is known as -sullen-. During the large-scale invasion of the Russian Federation, he became the deputy commander of a separate assault battalion of the 101st Rifle Regiment of the 1st Army Corps of the 8th Army of the Southern Military District of the Russian Armed Forces. As part of this unit of the Russian army of occupation, the man took a direct part in the capture of the village of Velikiy Burluk, Kupyan district. In the settlement, the occupiers set up a torture chamber in the basement of the local police station, where the suspect became a -bystander-. -Grumpy- along with other Russian military illegally detained civilian men, searched their homes, and then illegally imprisoned them. Prisoners were kept in unsanitary conditions in the basement of the temporary detention center of the police station. In the torture chamber, -grumpy- personally abused and tortured illegally detained ATO veterans and citizens with a pro-Ukrainian position who refused to work for the occupying power. The suspect kicked them, punched them, and shot them all over the body, threatening to kill them. He starved the detainees, did not give them drinking water and constantly arranged -interrogations- to deprive people of sleep. People who were illegally deprived of their liberty were forced to change their pro-Ukrainian position, to provide information about other pro-Ukrainian citizens, ATO participants, law enforcement officers, Ukrainian military deployment locations, etc. Photos of the premises of the torture chamber, which the Russian occupiers turned into the basement of the temporary detention center of the police department made public in Holovny Department of the National Police of Ukraine in the Kharkiv region. Investigators have identified at least three victims who were personally detained and tortured by a 57-year-old serviceman. Judging by the photo released by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office, it is about the same DNR militant who commented on the camera the downing of the Boeing 777 passenger plane of Malaysia Airlines flight MH17 in the area where the debris fell. The man was informed in absentia about the suspicion of cruel treatment of the civilian population, committed by a group of persons based on a previous conspiracy. The issue of declaring a wanted suspect is being resolved. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that law enforcement officers identified two occupiers who abused Ukrainian prisoners of war during the second attempt the offensive of the army of the Russian Federation on Kharkiv.

Title: Everything burned down - the Russians tried to break through with a bunch of armored vehicles
Description: The video appeared on September 27 on the Fenix ​​channel. The fiery end to all the enemy's plans came as a result of the successful and coordinated actions of our bombers and FPV drone operators. -The enemy equipment was literally disassembled for spare parts and prevented from approaching our positions,- the unit commented on the video. As reported by ArmiyaInform, UAV operators of the Guards Offensive Brigade -Revenge- destroyed two ammunition depots, passenger and trucks, as well as several enemy shelters.

Title: The commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces told his Slovak colleague about the war crimes of the Rus...
Description: As ArmiyaInform reported, Slovak activists collected three times more than the planned amount for artillery shells for Ukraine.

Title: Enhanced training and career development — important changes have been made to the Concept of Milita...
Description: This was reported by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Another important step has been taken in the improvement of the military education system. The resolution adopted by the government was developed by the Ministry of Education and Culture. What is changing: From now on, the structure of the military education system includes initial military training of lyceums of military lyceums and lyceums with enhanced military physical training, instead of pre-conscription training. These lyceum students and students of professional colleges with enhanced military and physical training will acquire primary general military knowledge necessary for admission to higher military educational institutions. This approach will ensure continuous education of the military for the development of their careers. As reported by ArmyInform, the state seeks to create an extensive network military lyceums, so that every region of Ukraine has at least one such institution.

Title: Undermining, hunger, execution of soldiers - how the Russians tried to keep the plant in Vovchansk
Description: He made his comments in an interview with the publication Liga.net. About 80 Russian occupiers, commanded by special agents of Russian military intelligence, were at the blocked object. Most of the enemy group was destroyed. About two dozen occupiers were captured. -We have information that there were attempts to dig trenches from the buildings in the place where the Russians were located to the plant. For this, they used their -flyers-, defectors, as well as Ukrainian prisoners,- said Linux. One of the biggest problems during the clearing of the 30 buildings of the plant were the basements and bunkers where the invaders held their defenses. -If we compare it with the entire history of our war, it is unlikely that we will find similar cases of capturing an industrial zone, an object of such complexity in such a short period of time,- said the intelligence officer. He described the testimony of the occupiers who were captured during the operation at the factory. -Commanders of the blocked Russians from the Russian special forces maintained discipline with total fear, violence and murder. Two Russian soldiers were shot by the commanders a few days before our complete liberation of the plant, because it seemed to them that they -swallowed more water from the bottle than they were allowed to,- said Linux. As reported by ArmyInform, as a result of an extremely complex and successful operation, the GUR units were completely /->liberatedthe territory of the Vovchan aggregate plant and destroyed the occupiers in all the buildings of the enterprise.

Title: Battle for the Dnipro - Special operations forces shot a film about the battle in Krynky
Description: The film was released on September 27 on the channel of the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The details of the large-scale and lengthy operation, told by the unit's operators, are full of human emotions and memories. Everyone knows the story of the heroic assault and holding of the bridgehead in Krynyk by the Defense Forces of Ukraine. It's time to hear a story about the role of the SSO in the battle for the left bank: How ArmyInform reported, special forces soldiers showed footage of an ambush on Russian soldiers in the Kursk region.

Title: The evidence base regarding the participation of the Central Bank of the Russian Federation in ensur...
Description: This is stated in message of the SBU. According to the case materials and the conclusions of independent research, the head of this financial institution, Elvira Nabiullina, was informed in advance about Putin's plans for a full-scale invasion of our country and made central bank decisions that ensured military aggression. For this, according to the investigation, Nabiullina changed the strategy of the central bank in order to support the occupation, avoid sanctions applied to the Russian Federation for invading Ukraine, and also to facilitate the financing of the occupation groups of the aggressor country. The materials of the investigation also show that the funds that are in the accounts of the Russian Central Bank, opened in foreign jurisdictions, are actually one of the tools of waging war. We are talking about almost 300 billion US dollars, which, thanks to international partners of Ukraine, are blocked in the accounts of the Central Bank of the Russian Federation all over the world. On the basis of the evidence base collected by the SBU and the OGP, this amount may in the future be subject to confiscation as the funds of a legal entity to which criminal-legal measures will be applied, as provided by law. Currently, within the framework of the relevant criminal proceedings, a new suspicion under ch. 2 Art. 437 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (planning, preparation, initiation and waging of an aggressive war) was received by the head of the Central Bank of the Russian Federation, Elvira Nabiullina. The pre-trial investigation is ongoing.

Title: Love cannot be stopped: the former son-in-law became the husband of his mother-in-law, who is 36 yea...
Description: This incident is notified by the State Border Service. The husband is 42, the wife is 78. And they are former son-in-law and mother-in-law. His wife and child were left behind in Italy. Such a beginning of a -family drama- worthy of a Latin American TV series unfolded at the -Tisa- checkpoint, during the crossing of the border by a man and an elderly woman with disabilities. However, the border guards did not believe in these passions and discovered the deception. -The plan for the trip was developed a long time ago, as indicated by the marriage certificate issued last year. But getting the border guards around your finger turned out to be more difficult than getting married. Both now face criminal responsibility,- the State Border Service said. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces or recruiting centers.

Title: The Army+ application has received an important update
Description: About this notified the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. At the same time, the application number is generated so that the data update status can be updated later. With the launch of Army+, a certain part of servicemen encountered the fact that information about their service is not displayed in the application. Most often, this happened due to the fact that the operators of the TCC and JV did not digitize the data on the current status of the citizen's account. To correct the data, the user had to install the Reserve+ application and send a request through it. -Only in the first four weeks of the release, more than 60,000 military personnel updated their service data, in particular through Reserve+. It was inconvenient, required another app to be installed, and didn't give the military feedback about its data update request. That's why we developed a functionality that allows you to update information about your service through Army+ in a few clicks and get an application number to further clarify the status,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko, Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for Digitalization. How it works now in Armiya+: In total, more than 270,000 servicemen were authorized in Army+ for a month and a half of work. The application was implemented by 1,000 military units, and 7,000 electronic reports, which have the legal status of paper, were also submitted. The Ministry of Defense emphasized that the Armiya+ application should be downloaded only from the Play Market and App Store. Links are also available on the official page of the application. Do not trust third-party sites and unverified links in messengers and social networks.

Title: On boarding! Our FPV drone was able to capture an enemy reconnaissance -wing-
Description: The video of the unique battle was released on the battalion channel. Our FPV drone was attacking the enemy -wing-, but for some reason the ammunition did not explode. But the ram was enough for the enemy UAV to fall. -The fighter drone hits Zala, but doesn't explode and falls with her. The drone crashed into the wing, directly into the parachute release system and therefore fell with the -wing-. And this is a rare case!- - commented on the video the commander of -Birds of Magyar- Captain Robert Brovdi. His fighters were also able to shoot down the Merlin UAV, which has large dimensions: up to 5.5. The downing of -Merlin- took place at an altitude of 3,600 meters. -The Merlin UAV can climb to a height of up to five thousand meters and stay in the air for up to ten hours. A rare bird!- explained Robert Browdy. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 414th battalion of unmanned aerial systems -Birds of Magyar- as part of the marines conducted a master class on deep penetration into the enemy's equipment with the aim of its destruction as efficiently as possible.

Title: In Kryvyi Rih, the number of wounded increased after the attack of the Russian Federation: the conse...
Description: This was reported by the Prosecutor General's Office. According to the investigation, on September 27, the Russian military launched a missile attack on the city of Kryvyi Rih. Employees of the emergency services and law enforcement officers are working at the scene of the incident, recording yet another war crime of the Russian Federation. Rescue operations are ongoing. Information about the victims will be clarified. Under the procedural leadership of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional Prosecutor's Office, a pre-trial investigation was started in criminal proceedings for violation of the laws and customs of war (part 1 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). As ArmyInform reported earlier, as a result of enemy shelling of the city Izmail in Odesa region, three people died, another 14 were injured, including three children.

Title: Loved to fall on the tail of the Armed Forces: a paramedic from Vinnytsia may receive a life sentenc...
Description: About this informs Security Service of Ukraine. Under the -sight- of the enemy were units of the Armed Forces moving along the highways of the Vinnytsia and Cherkasy regions. According to the investigation, the Russian special service hoped to monitor the movement routes of Ukrainian military columns in real time in order to adjust the air strike against them. To fulfill this task, the FSB remotely recruited a 51-year-old paramedic from one of the medical facilities in Vinnytsia region, who was -elected- because of his pro-Kremlin activity in Telegram channels. -According to the instructions of the occupiers, their agent drove his car to interregional highways, where he monitored the movement of units of the Defense Forces. An episode was documented when, having discovered a military convoy, the person involved -sat on its tail- and followed it for almost 100 km. In this way, he tried to establish the route, as well as the number and types of equipment in the column,- the counterintelligence officers said. SBU operatives promptly exposed the traitor and detained him near his own residence. Before that, comprehensive measures were taken to secure the locations of Ukrainian troops. At the place of detention, the suspect's mobile phone was seized, which he used to communicate with the -liaison- of the FSB - Sergey Lebedev (better known as the blogger -Lokhmaty-) from Donetsk. On the basis of the collected evidence, the investigators of the Security Service informed the detainee of the suspicion under Part 2 of Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). The perpetrator is in custody. He faces life imprisonment with confiscation of property. As reported ArmiyaInform, an employee of one of the mines of the Pokrovsky district searched for locations of deployment of personnel of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and handed them over to the Russians.

Title: Drones of the hundred-year-old -Achilles-: defenders repelled a powerful Russian armored assault in ...
Description: The video of the repulse of half a hundred enemy armored assault was made public in the battalion of shock air defense systems -Achilles- of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after Ivan Sirk, the chieftain of Kosh. Anton Shmagailo, commander of the first shock company of the Achilles anti-aircraft missile battalion, gave an exclusive comment on the repulse of the enemy assault to ArmyInform: -The enemy used more than 50 units of armored and light armored vehicles - mainly tanks lined with steel frames (so-called -sheds-). All equipment is equipped with a large number of EW devices and additional protection against drones. The enemy's plan remains unchanged - a breakthrough to the Oskil River. Assault columns advanced almost continuously for 10 hours. No positions were lost in the area where the -Achilles- assault air defense battalion of the 92nd OShBr operates, and the battle line is unchanged. The unit destroyed 14 and damaged 26 pieces of military equipment. In total, more than 30 units of armored vehicles were destroyed by the Defense Forces as part of repelling the assault.- So, the Russian onslaught failed to get past the hundred-eyed hekatoncheir--Achilles- - the battalion's victors destroyed and damaged 40 units of military equipment. 14 units of enemy equipment were destroyed: Another 26 units of enemy equipment were damaged: Repelling an enemy assault with the massive use of armored vehicles on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyni- commented the battalion commander captain Yuriy Fedorenko. — During the period of service, which is almost 2.5 years, we have been fighting since the first day of a full-scale war, the first time in my memory when the enemy launched such a massive assault. This testifies to the fact that the adversary is given a task, without looking at the loss of manpower and equipment, to try to increase their capabilities as much as possible, efforts in particular in the Kupyan region, he said. The commander of drones expressed his admiration for the coordinated interaction of various units of the Defense Forces. - I must say frankly, I am impressed by the Defense Forces - from the tasking of the senior commander to the communication between the brigades that keep the tone. And also by the joint execution of combat tasks - when one detected, the second escorted, the third struck. The joint fire effect of artillery, anti-tank weapons and, of course, unmanned systems - those that help us identify the enemy and inflict fire damage on him, said the military. The officer told how much enemy equipment and how the soldiers of the Defense Forces of Ukraine managed to destroy it. Only during the repulse of this assault, the -Achilles- battalion managed to destroy 14 units of enemy equipment of various types yesterday. In particular, most of the equipment that participated in the shock-assault operations was destroyed by the defense forces due to the combined fire impact. The opponent had no sign of success, he said. Separately, Yuriy Fedorenko explained the components of the success of the defenders of Ukraine both in this separate battle and during the repulsion of Russian aggression against the Ukrainian people and the state as a whole. — First, we have become much better at interacting with each other. Second, tasks began to be defined more precisely, taking into account all the tricks that the enemy uses against us. And the third is the constant support of every Ukrainian, everyone who supports the Defense Forces of Ukraine, everyone who donates, the military explained. He thanked each of the Ukrainians for their contribution to the joint victory, noting that the state programs allowed drone operators to receive more drones on the front lines, but the donations of Ukrainians are also extremely important. — At the expense of state programs, objectively, we began to receive more drones. But the constant support of the Ukrainian nation makes it possible to have the minimum balance that is critically necessary in order to intensively destroy the enemy and not give him the opportunity to reach our advanced positions, he said. As reported by the analysts of the DeepState project, about 40 units of equipment were moving in the direction of Kolesnikivka and at least 9 more in the direction of Kruglyakivka. They noted that such a mechanized assault is an atypical phenomenon, because previously the enemy acted in infantry groups. DeepState suggested that this may indicate that the Russians have given the site a certain priority. -It is expected that they will try to repeat such a massive assault again, because this attempt failed.- Reporting on the achievements of the -Achilles- battalion, ArmyInform showed how the drones of the destroyed a rare Russian self-propelled gun 2C5 -Hyacinth-S-, flying -Achilles- killed more than one and a half dozen long-range Russian reconnaissance UAVs zala, supercam and -Orlan-, long-range -helmeted- Achilles hit exactly under the turret of a Russian tank and Grad won in Belgorod region, all-seeing -Achilles- saw and eliminated the invaders in Kharkiv Oblast with the help of the Stymphalian birds, and Achilles hunter fired a full yagdtash of enemy equipment at Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: Occupiers pour fire on Donetsk region — 4 dead, 9 wounded
Description: This was announced by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. Pokrovsky district. In Kurakhivka, one person was injured, 10 houses were damaged, Kurakhove, Trudove, Dachne, Dalne and Sontsivka were shelled. In Myrnograd, a person was injured, 7 houses were damaged. In Pokrovsk, 2 people were injured, the administration building was damaged. Kramatorsk district. 3 houses were destroyed in Novy Lymanska TG, 2 were damaged in Kryvya Luka, 1 in Ozerny. 83 houses were damaged in Raigorodk of Mykolaivska TG, including 8 destroyed. In Tarasivka, Illinivska TG, 10 objects were damaged. In Kostyantynivka, 5 private houses and 2 infrastructure objects were damaged, in Virolyubivka — a house and a power line. Bakhmut district. One person died in Siversk, 2 houses were damaged. In Toretsk, 2 people were killed and 2 injured, a house was damaged. In Chasovoy Yar, 1 person died and 3 were injured, 11 houses, a multi-storey building and a non-residential building were damaged. During the day, the Russians shelled populated areas of Donetsk region 27 times. 1,548 people were evacuated, including 51 children. As reported ArmyInform, one person died and three were injured in the Chasovoyarsk community in Donetsk region.

Title: A Ukrainian ground drone blew up a hideout with a dozen Russians
Description: The video with the powerful explosion was released by the Deputy Prime Minister for Innovation, Development of Education, Science and of Technologies, Minister of Digital Transformation Mykhailo Fedorov. According to him, there were more than 10 occupants in the tunnel. -Ratel S from Brave1 members has been successfully working at the front for over a year, so this is not the first successful case of eliminating Russians. It's always nice to see how Ukrainian developments help to destroy everything Russian. A cool motivation for entrepreneurs to create even more defense tech developments, because the video is the result of the joint work of the military and business,- Mykhailo Fedorov wrote. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilot of the -Alastor- unit of the 25th Sicheslav Airborne Brigade filmed how his drone was overtaken by the Javelin anti-tank missile, which hit the enemy equipment.

Title: Heavy-duty UAVs and movement restrictions: in Kharkiv Oblast, the occupiers replenish supplies and s...
Description: Detailed information about the situation and enemy losses in the Kharkiv direction informed in Kharkiv OTU. In the area of ​​the Hlyboke settlement, due to the high risk of fire damage during the internal replacement of positions, the enemy limited the movement of personnel. In the Lukyantsiv area, the enemy carried out logistical support for units of the 2nd Motorized Rifle Battalion, 380th Motorized Rifle Regiment of the 47th Tank Division, using UAVs with increased cargo capacity. In the Staritsa area, the enemy is moving personnel in small groups and providing logistical support to units in forward positions. In Vovchansk, with the onset of darkness, the enemy replenished mortar positions with ammunition, delivered medicines and food. Three combat clashes took place during the past day. the Russian occupiers carried out 2 airstrikes using 4 anti-aircraft missiles. 48 kamikaze drone strikes were made. They carried out 320 shellings of positions of defenders of Ukraine. The defense forces respond adequately to the actions of the enemy and continue to destroy the manpower, weapons and military equipment of the Russian occupiers. Enemy losses over the past day amounted to 73 creatures, of which 27 were irreversible, 44 sanitary. Two occupiers surrendered as prisoners. Also, the enemy lost destroyed and damaged 86 units of weapons and military equipment, in particular: In addition, in the Kharkiv direction, the Defense Forces destroyed 61 shelters for personnel, 4 ammunition storage places, and 1 fuel and lubricant storage point. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that occupiers dig underground passages in Vovchansk and explained why the invaders needed them.

Title: Fortunately, half a ton was found in the Sumy Oblast, another aerial bomb that did not explode
Description: The police of the Sumy region reported this on September 27. In order to eliminate the threat of detonation, police explosive technicians and sappers of the State Emergency Service went to the place where the projectile was discovered. Experts identified the munition as an unexploded 500-kilogram high-explosive aerial bomb used by Russian forces. After inspecting the explosive object, the police together with the rescuers decided to move it to a safe place for destruction by controlled detonation. Law enforcement officers remind citizens about the danger of unexploded ammunition. If you find such, immediately call 102. As reported by ArmyInform, in Sumy on the bridge found an unexploded FAB-500 aerial bomb.

Title: Live destruction - operators -Stugny- hit 3 enemy tanks
Description: The video of the combat operation was released on September 27 on the brigade's channel. Iron, which no longer poses a threat, becomes a testimony to the superiority and skill of our forces,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 1st mechanized battalion of the 66th mechanized brigade named after Prince Mstislav the Brave recorded lesions of the occupiers in forest strips in the East.

Title: The cyber corps of the GUR of the Ministry of Defense attacked more than 800 servers throughout Russ...
Description: reported this on September 27 ArmyTV with reference to sources in the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. As a result of the attack by the cyber corps of the Government of Ukraine, the documents and data stored on the affected servers were completely destroyed. We are talking about the servers of military, administrative and financial institutions that ensure Russian aggression against Ukraine.
