Title: They sold fictitious cars to servicemen of the Armed Forces: two men were detained
Description: The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informed about this on September 25. -When potential buyers responded to the ad, pseudo-sellers informed them of the need to make a full payment to a bank card. However, after the funds were credited to the account, the fraudsters stopped contacting them,- the report says. So far, law enforcement officers have identified five victims. All of them are servicemen of the Defense Forces, who were looking for vehicles to carry out combat missions to repel the enemy. The total amount of damage is more than 100 thousand hryvnias. -During searches of the suspect's place of residence, evidence of illegal activity was discovered and seized - mobile phones, computer equipment, other equipment, bank cards, etc. The involvement of the suspects in similar crimes is currently being investigated,- the law enforcement officers said. Under the procedural guidance of the Loziv district prosecutor's office of the Kharkiv region, two men were notified of suspicion of fraud committed under martial law, following a prior conspiracy by a group (Part 2, Article 190 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). At the request of the prosecutors, preventive measures in the form of detention were chosen for both suspects. As reported by ArmyInform, law enforcement liquidated a network of underground online services that operated through the Webmoney Russian payment system banned in Ukraine.

Title: The Ministry of Defense reported how it was possible to save more than UAH 16 billion
Description: Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov informs about this. -The largest items of savings are food (7.2 billion UAH), fuel and lubricants (5.5 billion UAH) and physical support (3.4 billion UAH),- the report says. According to him, these indicators indicate not only the optimization of procurement, but also the possibility of more effective management of state funds. -We are not just saving money - we are directing these resources to support the Armed Forces and increase the defense capability of our country. In addition to budgetary resources, we are working on expanding the sources of procurement financing,- Dmytro Klimenkov assured. He noted that this year, the Defense Procurement Agency for the first time signed a contract for the purchase of ammunition with funds raised through the UNITED24 fundraising platform. -Ahead of us is further modernization, new investments in technologies and Ukrainian production, expansion of international cooperation. In 2025, we plan to test a new model of providing food for the military,- he emphasized. We remind you that at the beginning of 2024, the procurement agency of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine -State rear operator- saved UAH 16.2 billion thanks to open and competitive bidding in the process of public procurement. As reported by ArmyInform, the MoU spoke about perestroika procurement model for the Armed Forces according to NATO principles and with zero tolerance for corruption.

Title: Zlyav leaked the location of the armed forces: the Lviv blogger was informed of the suspicion
Description: About this informs September 25 SBU. A few months before the start of a full-scale war, the figure incited people to organize mass riots and seize state institutions under the guise of the -anti-vaccination movement.- Being in the status of the accused during the full-scale invasion, the person involved continued his anti-Ukrainian activities. The -blogger- spread destructive content through his social media accounts. -He claimed that Russian armed aggression was allegedly caused by 'third countries' that 'provoked' Moscow to a full-scale invasion of Ukraine,- the report said. Also, during one of his live broadcasts on social networks, the person involved publicly announced the exact location of one of the units of the Ukrainian defenders, thus exposing them to danger. -In addition, he organized online -journalism- courses, where, among other things, he taught his followers to counter mobilization in Ukraine,- the SBU said. The cost of the courses was 7 thousand. UAH from one listener. After completing his studies, the suspect promised his clients an international journalist certificate. However, instead of the promised documents, he gave the -graduates- fictitious certificates of a local newspaper, which lost its accreditation in the spring of this year. Mobile phones and other material evidence of criminal activity were found during searches of the suspect's residence. Currently, the perpetrator has been notified of suspicion under two articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: -Currently, the issue of selecting a preventive measure for the suspect is being resolved. An investigation is underway to bring to justice all persons involved in subversive activities against Ukraine,- the SBU said. As reported by ArmyInform, law enforcement liquidated a network of underground online services that operated through the Webmoney Russian payment system banned in Ukraine.

Title: Consequences of the Russian airstrike in the center of Kramatorsk: photo report
Description: ArmiyaInform correspondents visited the site of enemy strikes. One hit hit a 10-story building, the hit occurred near the 7th floor. In the building, the ceilings were gutted, the windows and doors were broken, and the balconies were destroyed. Cars were also damaged near the house. Another hit occurred in the 5th floor, the roof and upper floor apartments were completely damaged, windows and doors were broken in many apartments. As a result of the strikes, several nearby houses, shops and cafes were also damaged. According to the official information of the local authorities, two people were killed and another 19 civilians were wounded, including three children, due to enemy strikes. Injured to a medical facility. The search and rescue operation continues — people may be under the rubble. The Donetsk regional prosecutor's office reported that Russian aircraft struck Kramatorsk, probably FAB-250s from the UMPK. A pre-trial investigation has been launched in criminal proceedings for violation of the laws and customs of war (Part 2 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). We will remind, on September 23, Russian troops also shelled Kramatorsk . As a result, at least one person died and one person was injured. Title: -One summer in Ukraine-: a presentation of the film about the fighters of the International Legion o...
Description: They published it on the official channel of Babylon'13. In the tape -Summertime in Ukraine- (Summertime in Ukraine), the Babylon'13 team talks about the war in Ukraine through the eyes of foreign volunteers. The main characters of the film are soldiers of the International Legion unit of the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine (GUR), who carry out combat tasks on the hottest areas of the front. The Babylon 13 team says that the heroes of the film are military personnel from different parts of the world, including Great Britain, Germany, Finland, Australia and the USA, who after February 24, 2022 decided to defend Ukraine and joined the service in GUR In the tape you can see footage of combat work, the training of soldiers during training on the training ground, and also listen to their thoughts about life and the war in Ukraine. The plot of the film tells the stories of several volunteers. During the service, fighters become true friends. They work, study and rest together. However, the time of tests for the courage and skills of the legionnaires is coming. The hot summer months are not easy for them. And not all recruits can withstand the high pace of training and service. Meanwhile, alarming news about the Russian offensive is coming from the front. How their fate will develop and what challenges foreigners face in Ukraine - watch in the movie. The full-length documentary film -One Summer in Ukraine- can to see on big screens already this autumn.

Title: The president talked about a disturbing message he recently received from intelligence
Description: The text of the President's speech was publishedon its official website. -At the moment, the Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant remains occupied by Russian troops. Unfortunately And there is a threat of a nuclear accident. This is the biggest source of radiation danger in Europe, and perhaps in the world,- he said. According to him, that is why the issue of nuclear safety is the first item in the Peace Formula that he presented. -Today, Russia has destroyed all our thermal power plants and a significant part of our hydropower capacity. This is how Putin is preparing for winter - hoping to torture millions and millions of Ukrainians. Just imagine, please, your country without 80% of energy,- said the head of state. In the President's opinion, this is how Putin wants to leave Ukrainians in the dark and cold this winter, in order to make Ukraine suffer and capitulate. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also stated that he recently received another alarming message from our intelligence. -It seems that Putin is indeed planning attacks on our nuclear power plants and their infrastructure to disconnect the plants from the grid. With the help of satellites, by the way, ladies and gentlemen, satellites of other countries, Russia receives images and detailed information about the infrastructure of our nuclear power plants,- he emphasized. The head of state explained that any missile or drone strike, any critical accident in the energy system could lead to a nuclear disaster. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that Volodymyr Zelensky spoke during a high-level meeting of the UN Security Council.

Title: Minus 8 - our drones disarmed the Russian artillerymen
Description: The video of combat work appeared on September 25 on the unit's channel. The drones almost flew into the muzzle of the cannons and left no chance for enemy weapons. The strikes were carried out by drones supplied to the Ronins by volunteers. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the -Ronin- unit of the 65th mechanized brigade strike on enemy artillery and transport.

Title: In Sumy, a dealer who sold fake wheels to our defenders was detained
Description: This was announced on September 25 by the Prosecutor's Office of the Sumy region. According to the investigation, the Sumerian placed an ad on an online platform, supporting it with high-quality photos, about the sale of car tires at an attractive price. Those who want to buy the product, he offered to pay the price in full or transfer an advance. After receiving the funds, the man stopped responding to messages and calls. Therefore, the buyer lost money and did not receive the goods. During 10 months of his criminal activity, the accused managed to cheat 41 people and enrich himself by UAH 235,000. Ten servicemen were among the victims. As reported by ArmyInform, a fraudster was detained >, who extorted money from the relatives of the fallen defenders.

Title: He cooked meals, and now he cooks - good Russian ones - UAV pilot Magnit told about the service
Description: The video about the defender appeared on September 25 on the brigade channel. Magnet had a good salary, on legal grounds he could not go to serve, but from the first days of the full-scale war, he left everything and went to defend the state. He was 22 at the time. He went through combat in an airborne assault unit, was wounded twice, and returned to the ranks twice. Now works with FPV drones, eliminates invaders, burns equipment. His work more than once saved the lives of our paratroopers at ground zero, stopped enemy assaults. -Magnit modestly talks about his results, but the videos of his hits speak for him. Dozens and hundreds of shots of enemy equipment, shelters and dugouts burning,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy threw into attack 35 armored combat vehicles with landing forces with the support of 9 tanks to break through the defense of the 79th separate airborne assault brigade of the Taurian Brigade in the area of ​​the village of Kostyantynivka in Donetsk region.

Title: The MOU revealed the details of the restructuring of the procurement model for the Armed Forces with...
Description: Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov informs about this. -It's not just about quantitative indicators of savings and procurement volumes, but also about fundamental shifts in resource management, digitalization, and the involvement of the Ukrainian manufacturer in the process of providing the army,- he said. One of the first strategic decisions of the new team was the restructuring of the procurement model for the Armed Forces according to NATO principles and with zero tolerance for corruption. -The Ministry abandoned the function of direct procurement, leaving behind only the establishment of the rules of the game. For this purpose, the Department of Procurement Policy was created within the structure of the Ministry of Defense - a key center for the development of procurement rules,- noted Dmytro Klimenkov. Direct purchases are assigned to specialized agencies: -Defense Procurement Agency- (AOZ) and -State Rear Operator- (DOT). They play a central role in meeting the needs of the Ukrainian army. According to the Deputy Minister of Defense, the division of functions is necessary for maximum transparency and prevention of corruption risks. A clear delineation of roles between the ministry and agencies ensures that each structure focuses on its tasks and also avoids conflicts of interest. AOZ took on the procurement of weapons and military equipment. DOT focused on rear support - the supply of food, fuel and lubricants, tangible property. These agencies are key elements in improving the efficiency and transparency of the procurement process for the Armed Forces. -However, as we move towards joining NATO, we are continuing procurement reform to improve efficiency and meet Alliance standards,- he said. In his opinion, one of the important steps was the decision to merge the two agencies responsible for the provision of defense needs into a single structure. Military practice showed that the parallel work of these agencies led to duplication of functions, inefficient use of resources and delays in decision-making. And in the conditions of war, this is unacceptable, since the promptness of the supply of military equipment and equipment is critical. The single agency will be created on the basis of the State Rear Operator (DOT), which has already demonstrated its effectiveness, transparency and integrity in the provision of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -This will make it possible to optimize processes and ensure compliance with NATO standards, which will bring us closer to integration into Euro-Atlantic defense structures,- Dmytro Klimenkov assured. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkovtalkedabout the principles of a new food supply model for the Armed Forces.

Title: Checkmate -shahedam- — Defense forces train on the new Skynex air defense system
Description: Video of Skynex use released on September 25 by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Skynex can be used to engage various types of aerial targets. As reported by ArmyInform, Germany handed over a new package military aid to Ukraine, which, in particular, included the SKYNEX anti-aircraft artillery complex and ammunition for the IRIS-T anti-aircraft missile systems.

Title: The MOU said who they offered to arm and train the Northern European states
Description: About this informs September 25 Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Within the limits of the initiative, each Northern European country has the opportunity to train and arm a Ukrainian battalion. The Ukrainian delegation offered Norway to join the -Northern Brigade- project during a meeting with the State Secretary of the Norwegian Ministry of Defense, Ann Marie Aanerud. Also, during the seminar of the Northern Defense Industry, the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine called on the arms directors of Denmark, Iceland, Norway, Finland and Sweden for bilateral cooperation and investment in the Ukrainian defense industry. -By joining the Northern Brigade project, defense companies and the countries of Northern Europe will have the opportunity to demonstrate the effectiveness of products of the Northern European defense industry on the real battlefield. Let's join forces for a joint victory,- Oleksandr Balanutsa told the participants of the event. On the sidelines of the seminar, the Ukrainian delegation held a meeting with representatives of defense industry companies - NAMMO, Fjord Defence, FLIR UAS, Kongsberg, Equipnor, Norlense and Rheinmetal. In addition, the delegation of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine conveyed to the representatives of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the Ministry of Defense of Norway the need to increase aid from partner states. The parties discussed the issue of Euro-Atlantic integration of Ukraine and increasing assistance to Ukraine within the framework of the Nansen program. -Norway remains committed in its support to Ukraine. The intention of the Norwegian government to expand the Nansen Support Program until 2030 and to allocate an additional NOK 5 billion this year for Ukraine is evidence of this. Despite all the complexity of the situation on the battlefield, we believe in the victory of Ukraine,- Ann Marie Aanerud assured. As reported by ArmyInform, the Netherlands will allocate 209.5 million euros for the restoration of critical infrastructure of Ukraine.

Title: - Clearing out the occupiers and testing the new air defense complex: stream from the front-line cit...
Description: Our soldiers cleared a village near Toretsk. The infantrymen of the Shkval special rifle battalion and the pilots of the 28th Brigade named after Knights of the Winter Campaign. the Russians were knocked out of their positions and destroyed, several occupiers still decided to surrender as prisoners. Ukraine is testing a new air defense system. The Air Force of Ukraine showed a video where they perform practice firing from the Skynex anti-aircraft artillery complex. It belongs to the air defense systems of a short range, such as the German Gepard anti-aircraft self-propelled guns, which have already shown their effectiveness in destroying the Shahed. These and other topics are discussed by the presenters - junior lieutenant Serhiy Lipko and junior sergeant Volodymyr Kravchuk.

Title: Cranes to the occupiers — a crane and two trucks were burned in the Bakhmut direction
Description: The video of the hits was published on September 25 on the brigade's channel. -Kamaz - once! Kamaz - two! And the logistical capabilities of the occupiers in the Bakhmut direction decreased by two units. For dessert, a mobile crane was damaged, the driver of which was forced to make an emergency stop. The last in his worthless life. This will be the case with every enemy who set foot on Ukrainian soil!-, the brigade commented on the video. Title: Fraudsters who defrauded clients of $15,000 and then demanded another $20,000 went to court
Description: This was reported by the Specialized Prosecutor's Office on September 25 of the defense sector of the Western region. The organizer is charged with fraud and extortion (Part 2 of Article 15, Part 5 of Article 190, Part 3.5 of Article 27, Part 4 of Article 189 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine), and the other participants are charged with extortion (Part 4 of Article 189 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). The investigation established that the defendants promised two conscripts to enter information about them into the Shlyah information system, which would enable them to legally cross the border as volunteers. In fact, they forged all the necessary documents for departure and handed them over to the petitioners during a private meeting in Lviv. They valued such -services- at $15,000. In addition, those involved, who knew that their -clients- were planning to take a significant amount of money out of Ukraine, set up an ambush for them - disguised themselves as TCC employees and stopped their car on the way to the departure point in Yavorivskyi district and tried to extort money. After checking the documents, the liars demanded $20,000. In the case of refusal to pay the -detachment-, they threatened to call an investigative-operational group, which would take them to the Military Commissariat, and from there they would be sent to the front. The law enforcement officers documented the criminal activities of the specified persons and detained them in April this year. Now, the accused faces up to 12 years in prison with confiscation of property. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces or recruiting centers.

Title: The General Staff of the Armed Forces told where the fierce battles are going on
Description: About this is going on in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 16:00 on September 25. The defense forces are holding the lines and taking all necessary measures to prevent a breakthrough defense. The aggressor does not stop using artillery and aviation on the territory of Chernihiv and Sumy regions. To date, the enemy has carried out ten airstrikes on the territory of the Kursk region, using 20 air defense systems. In the Kharkiv direction three combat clashes took place today. Our troops repelled the attack of the Russians in the Vovchansk region. Two skirmishes near Tykhoi are still ongoing. Three assaults by the invaders were repelled by Ukrainian soldiers near Lozova and Krugliakivka in the Kupyansk direction. There is a battle near Sinkivka. On the Lymansky direction the enemy is attacking in the areas of Grekivka, Novosadovoy and Bilogorivka. Since the beginning of the day, there have already been seven clashes in this direction, three of which are still ongoing. In the Seversky direction, the occupiers are actively using aviation. Siversk was hit by KABs. Fedorivka was also hit by unguided aerial missiles. In the Kramatorsk direction, fighting continues in the districts of Hryhorivka, Chasovoy Yar, and Klishchiivka. The enemy is trying to push the Ukrainian defenders. In the Toretsk direction the enemy, with the support of attack and bomber aircraft, attacked the positions of our troops six times. Currently, fighting continues near Shcherbinivka and Nelipivka. The hottest in the Pokrovsky direction. Fierce battles are taking place in Novotoretsk, Lysivka, Novogrodivka, Selidovoy and Kostyantynivka districts. So far, the enemy has made 33 attempts to storm Ukrainian positions. On the Kurakhiv direction, seven clashes are ongoing in the districts of Tsukuryny, Hirnyk and Georgiivka. Eleven enemy assaults have already been repelled by our defenders. In the Vremivsk direction Defense forces repelled four enemy assaults near Vugledar and Vodyanyi, four enemy assaults continue. On the Orihiv direction, three enemy attacks were repelled by Ukrainian defenders. The invaders are actively using aviation in the areas of the settlements of Novoandriivka and Kamianske. In the Dnieper direction the occupier launched airstrikes on Kherson and Burhunka, using aerial bombs and unguided aerial missiles. > Remind, last day, the losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,250 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 15 tanks, 12 armored combat vehicles, 74 artillery systems, one anti-aircraft missile system, 115 operational-tactical UAVs, 73 vehicles and 13 units of special equipment.

Title: Enemy troops killed a civilian woman in Kherson

Also, a 48-year-old local woman was taken to the hospital with an explosion injury, a contusion, an injury to her face and forearm. The victim is under medical supervision. As reported by ArmyInform, as a result of the Russian aggression of the previous day, September 24, in Kherson Oblast one -20-meshkancziv/->a person died, another 18 were injured.

Title: The tow truck, the mountains and the tank shed burned down - the Russian assault was defeated
Description: The video of the hits appeared on September 25 on the brigade's channel. Loaves, which have already become the main means of transport of the occupiers, are also among the loot of our drones. -All this junk is noticed by intelligence, falls into remote mine traps and is destroyed by drones of the unmanned systems battalion,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 63rd mechanized brigade repelled a powerful assault of the Russians, who used heavy equipment.

Title: They financed the Russian agency in Ukraine: the network of underground Webmoney brokers was exposed
Description: About this informs September 25 SBU. According to the available data, part of the transfers through this platform were intended to finance the Russian agency in our country. As a result of comprehensive measures in 10 regions of Ukraine, 12 dealers suspected of illegal activity were exposed. According to the case materials, participants of the -scheme- illegally accepted electronic funds from clients, including from the Russian Federation, and then converted them into the required currency and transferred them to bank details or in cash. In this way, since the beginning of the full-scale war, dealers have transferred tens of millions in hryvnia equivalent through their exchangers. -From each transaction, the participants had their -percentage-. To find potential customers, specialized sites where advertisements were placed were used,- the report says. During searches in Ternopil, Lviv, Rivne, Volyn, Ivano-Frankivsk, Poltava, Sumy, Cherkasy, Vinnytsia and Zaporizhzhia regions, computer equipment, mobile phones and bank cards with evidence of crimes were seized. Currently, all 12 defendants have been notified of suspicion under Part 1 of Article 200 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (illegal actions with transfer documents, payment cards and other means of accessing bank accounts, electronic money, equipment for their production). -The issue of additional qualification of perpetrators' actions under Art. 209 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (legalization (laundering) of property obtained through criminal means),- the SBU said. As reported by ArmyInform, earlier the Security Service gathered new evidence of Russian war crimes on the territory of Ukraine. In particular, two occupiers were identified who abused prisoners of war during the repeated Russian offensive on Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: The DRG of the Russian Federation are trying to break through to Vugledar: on the approaches to the ...
Description: Vadim Filashkin, the head of the Donetsk OVA, told about this in the -Edyny Novyni- marathon. . More than 3 thousand shellings. The occupiers are shelling Donetsk region with all available types of weapons. Not only the front line, but also the rear cities - with ballistic and guided missiles, aerial bombs. The situation is particularly difficult in Ugledar. He noted that on the approaches to Vugledar, our defenders burned a huge amount of enemy equipment. Separate Russian DRGs try to break into the city, but the soldiers of the Armed Forces destroy these groups. -Unfortunately, the enemy has an advance. There are now about a hundred people in the city who do not want to leave at all. And it is very difficult to deliver humanitarian aid. The enemy is shelling all access roads with all available types of weapons — tanks, artillery, FPV drones,- Vadym Filashkin said. The head of Donetsk OVA also touched on the situation in the city of Kurakhovo. According to him, 2.5 thousand people remain there now, and there are about 6 thousand people in the community. There are also few residents in Toretsk, where 150,000 people currently live. They leave very slowly: 1-2 people every few days. -Now it is almost impossible to get into the city. Neither authorities nor police units. When possible, our guys try to support those people who remain in the city with drinking water, food and medical kits. The situation there is also very difficult,- noted the head of Donetsk OVA. The enemy is trying to break through all directions of our defense. In particular, to Pokrovsk. -There are now 15,000 people, 135 children, remaining in Pokrovsk. More than 30,000 people left in a month. The enemy destroyed almost all the bridges in Pokrovsk, there were three of them. Now it is completely shelling all evacuation roads. Half of the city remains without electricity and gas supply,- Vadim Filashkin concluded. As ArmyInform reported earlier, two children were injured due to shelling of Donetsk region.

Title: 350 horsepower and more than 100 km per hour - the paratroopers told about the American Stryker armo...
Description: Video about armored personnel carriers released on September 25 Airborne assault troops of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -Everything here is practical and properly organized. Availability and convenience of service. Removed the cover - and everything is at your fingertips. Removed the fasteners, replaced everything that was needed. Everything in it is thought out, as for real boys. The guys sit down and play jazz,- said Ihor with the call sign -Bim-, a driver-electrician of the 170th logistics regiment of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The Stryker is equipped with a 350 hp Caterpillar 3126 diesel engine. The car is capable of developing a speed of more than 100 km. -Our guys squeeze everything out of them. Especially in Kurshchyna,- Igor said. Unfortunately, any technique breaks down. This 2008 combat vehicle was no exception. -The oil seal of the crankshaft was thrown out. It was practically replaced by oil, one oil hose was broken. Nothing, we will fix everything,- Igor assured. One of the biggest features of the car is its fire protection system. The armored personnel carrier is equipped with an FM200 automatic fire extinguishing system in the transport compartment and two FM25 automatic fire extinguishing modules in the engine compartment. -In case of fire, everyone will be safe. The system works reliably. Many lives were saved by these machines. Where the Soviet -bekhs- would not have succeeded,- noted Igor. As reported by ArmyInform, Galician paratroopers showed how they conduct training on Stryker armored personnel carriers.

Title: In Kharkiv, a woman's body was unblocked from a destroyed high-rise building
Description: This was notified in the State Emergency Service of Ukraine. The agency noted that unblocking is currently underway. The number of people killed as a result of enemy airstrikes on Kharkiv has increased to four people. As reported by ArmyInform, on September 24 three people died and 36 civilians were injured as a result of the Russian shelling of Kharkiv and hitting a high-rise building. The house that was hit in the Kyiv district had already been shelled at the beginning of the war. It was almost repaired, all the windows were put in, insulated, and prepared for the heating season. The enemy hit him a second time with a KAB.

Title: Russian propagandists called our stormtroopers in Kurshchyna elite
Description: A video of compliments from Russian propagandists appeared on September 25 on the battalion channel. Our stormtroopers agreed with their high assessment, only corrected Russian television in some respects: -Everything is fine, but they did not -undertake a new attempt to break through the border-, but went in and defeated your special forces and we are moving on,- wrote the 225th battalion. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the -Black Swan- strike group of the 225th assault battalion are in very difficult conditions were breaking through the enemy's defense.

Title: The GUR said how many occupiers were captured at the factory in Vovchansk
Description: The officer of the special unit Timur GUR of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine with the call sign Viking on the air -Edyny Novyny- disclosed detailed operations for the release of the Vovchan aggregate plant. -Timur's special unit is in constant combat readiness and, having immediately received a combat mission, the second battalion, together with an adjacent unit of the RDK, went to the task area, began planning and successfully cleared the Vovchan Aggregate Plant,- he noted. According to him, the battle lasted a little over a week. -There was intense shelling from the enemy. The enemy at the factory put up a lot of resistance, but in the end we completed the task,- said the scout. He confirmed that as a result of the operation, special forces of the GUR managed to capture the Russian occupiers. -At the Vovchan Aggregate Plant, up to two dozen of the enemy were captured, several dozen were destroyed. Also, four occupiers tried to leave the plant and were neutralized already outside the perimeter of the plant,- said Viking. As reported by ArmyInform, as a result of an extremely complex and successful operation, the GUR units were completely /->liberatedthe territory of the Vovchan aggregate plant and destroyed the occupiers in all the buildings of the enterprise.

Title: First, aerial bombs, and then cluster HIMARS — crushed the enemy command post in the South
Description: The video of the attack on the enemy was released on September 25. First, the Ukrainian aviation worked on the command post and residences of the occupiers, and then a HIMARS missile with a cluster munition arrived. As ArmiyaInform reported, the pilots of the -Shadow- unit with the help of the -Shark- unmanned reconnaissance system were able to track down the Russian S-300 anti-aircraft missile system and monitor its destruction.

Title: VOP-more! Our gunners destroyed enemy positions in Donetsk region
Description: The video of the defeat appeared on September 25 on the brigade's channel. In the Pokrovsky direction, the occupiers thought they had built a cozy nest for themselves, but aerial reconnaissance immediately tracked down the uninvited guests from the swamps. Accurate artillery strikes turned the Russian positions into ruins. Guardsmen of -Chervonaya Kalyna- are currently fighting in the hottest Pokrovsky direction. Here, the occupiers have concentrated the main reserves and are conducting assaults, sparing no personnel and equipment. As reported by ArmiyaInform, fighters of the National Guard Brigade -Chervona Kalina- showed a daring tank attack of enemy positions in the Pokrovsky direction .

Title: You helped unite defense ministers to strengthen our army - the President thanked the NATO Secretary...
Description: This is reported by 25 September Office of the President. The head of state noted significant multi-year efforts to support Ukraine during Jens Stoltenberg's tenure as Secretary General of the Alliance. -Thank you very much for your support. Your team worked a lot together, and I believe we achieved many different, very important results, especially during the war. You have helped bring together — as have some other allies — to bring the world together, including defense ministers, to help Ukraine, to strengthen our military,- the President said. He also thanked for the last two NATO summits, which brought Ukraine closer to the Alliance. Volodymyr Zelenskyy emphasized that it is important to implement all the agreements of the Washington NATO Summit on time. In particular, so that the member states fulfill their obligations to allocate 40 billion euros for the next year. Among the main topics of discussion are the need to strengthen Ukrainian air defense, in particular, the faster delivery of additional systems, and the continuation of work to ensure that Ukraine receives an invitation to NATO as soon as possible.

Title: Medical information system and evacuation transport: the 31st Multinational military-medical meeting...
Description: informs the command of the Medical Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine about this. The event was held on the initiative of representatives of the European Medical Command of the US Armed Forces and the Department of Military Medical Service of the Ministry of National Defense of the Republic of Poland. The following people were involved in the event: During the working visit, the participants of the event discussed the training of medical personnel of all medical units. They paid special attention to the training of instructors in the field of tactical medicine, expanding the capabilities of the School of Tactical Medicine of the Command of the Medical Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The issue of providing units of the Armed Forces with medical evacuation transport was also discussed at the meeting. At the beginning of this year, thanks to the help of partner countries and the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, about 100 M-113 evacuation vehicles were delivered to the needs of the Armed Forces. However, in view of the intensity of hostilities at the front, as of today, there is still a need to provide units of the Armed Forces with armored evacuation vehicles. The participants of the event also raised the topic of the implementation of the medical information system in the Armed Forces. -Digitalization of the health care system expands the capabilities of military doctors, their access to system resources and preserves information about the patient, regardless of which health care institution the patient is treated in,- the command of the Medical Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine noted. It is expected that medical professionals will be able to exchange information data with institutions of different ownership. This will ensure the collection of medical data on medical evacuation, data exchange with the civilian health care system, their analysis at all levels of medical management. -The issue of shortening the terms of medical evacuation of wounded defenders to healthcare facilities abroad was also discussed. This would contribute to the provision of high-quality medical care and rehabilitation of Ukrainian servicemen in the shortest possible time,- the report said. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how rescue the wounded medics of the -Revansh- tactical group of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine.

Title: Cheap consumables: Russians fight with -disposable- soldiers
Description: Officer 1 of the separate detachment of the Special Purpose Center -Omega- told about this on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyny- - of the National Guard of Ukraine. — They sometimes use the so-called meat assaults, using their junk that they have in the state. This is how he makes reconnaissance a battle and after that discovers our advanced positions, - he said. In this way, the enemy implements the tactics of assault by small groups of infantry and tries to carry out combat tasks at the expense of the lives of its soldiers. -Sometimes they use their personnel to scout out our positions and then destroy them,- the officer explained. Such combat reconnaissance is deadly for the vast majority of enemy attack aircraft, as Ukrainian drones effectively work on the logistics of the occupiers in their near rear, destroy enemy command posts and shelters, and shoot down Russian reconnaissance drones that adjust enemy artillery fire. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that technique of the occupiers — Soviet junk, but the enemy makes it a combat unit, and also informed that suicide soldiers dig trenches for the Russians.

Title: Heavenly de-Russification — the occupiers paint Ukrainian marks and German crosses on their wings
Description: A video of the invaders' tricks was released on September 25. The Russian reconnaissance UAV Zala, painted in black and with Ukrainian-German markings, caught up with our FPV drone. Ukrainian pilots easily identified the Russian -wings- and hit them. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the Signum 93 unit of the Kholodny Yar mechanized brigade showed selections of shooting down enemy reconnaissance UAVs with applied camouflage.

Title: Compensation for injuries and payments to military families have been increased
Description: About is in Resolution No. 1090 on the Government Portal. One-time cash assistance in the event of the death of a soldier is assigned and paid to the family members of a deceased defender in the amount of 750 subsistence minimums, established by law for able-bodied persons on January 1 of the calendar year in which they died. If a serviceman is injured and becomes disabled, then monetary assistance is determined in the following amounts: This refers to compensation in cases where a serviceman died during military service, but not in combat operations. Previously, the amount of compensation for such cases was 500 subsistence minimums for able-bodied persons. Previously, ArmyInform told, how to apply for financial assistance online veterans

Title: It really was like a drone war - by the anniversary of the liberation of Klishchiivka
Description: The conversation was made public on September 25 by the brigade. The small village became one of the hot spots of the Russian-Ukrainian war. In September 2023, the paratroopers of the Galician Brigade together with the soldiers of the 5th Assault Brigade and assault troops of the national police brigade -Lyut- were able to drive the Russians out of the village. Conversations with fighters and exciting footage from the battlefield are in the video: As reported by ArmyInform, the gunners-jets of the 80th Galician assault brigade of the DSHV of the Armed Forces of Ukraine from the first days of fighting in Kurshchyna are causing fire damage to the Russians with their own weapons and on their own territory.

Title: -New women are giving birth-: in Kharkiv Oblast, the Russian command is fighting with -Zhukiv- tacti...
Description: Why do Russians need this, the head of the planning department of the 13th operational brigade explained on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyny- appointment of -Charter- of the National Guard of Ukraine, Lieutenant Colonel Anton Baev. — It is a very common story for the enemy to discover our firepower precisely by manpower. The groups are sent precisely in order to draw attention to themselves and to draw out all our means, which begin to work actively to destroy and prevent the enemy from reaching our own infantry, he said. Such a lethal tactic for enemy infantrymen allows the enemy to identify fire positions and determine the fire system of Defense Forces units in order to then inflict fire damage on them. - In this way, our artillery and mortars are discovered - and they start working, - explained the soldier. When something goes wrong with the enemy, he does not hesitate to open artillery fire on those areas where his own infantry are. — Friendly fire is also present if everything falls apart in them, plans collapse, and they see that they are losing the initiative. Or we already proceed to certain actions and start to move a little, we make such small counterattacks, then they do not spare ammunition for the artillery and cover the squares where their units are located, - said Anton Baev. The Russian command is allowed to do so not only by the absence of any moral and ethical safeguards, but also by the presence of a sufficient number of manpower, which can be safely thrown to the slaughter, and the confidence that the losses will be replenished without delay. - We actually record from various sources - both from our air reconnaissance and from the interrogation of prisoners, which our brigade periodically takes, that our enemy is periodically replenished with manpower, - said the guardsman. Under such an approach, the quality of training of enemy soldiers does not matter at all. - This power can be different. As well as the barely mobilized and untrained ones, as well as those who have already fought a little. But there is constant replenishment, because as the fighting goes on, they lose a lot of manpower. And you have to hold on, you have to move forward, that's why they are constantly being replenished, - emphasized the officer. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that open artillery fire on own soldiers is a routine practice for the Russian military, and not an occasional excess.

Title: More than 1,000 occupiers were liquidated in the East per day
Description: informs OSUV -Khortytsia- on its official Telegram channel -Khortytskyi Wind-. As noted, the Defense Forces continue to inflict losses on the enemy in manpower and equipment. In particular, in this direction, Russia's losses per day are: Also, our soldiers destroyed 114 shelters, 12 ammunition depots, 2 PMM depots and the enemy's control post. Title: -The task remains unchanged-: the Armed Forces explained why the Russians are rushing to Kharkiv
Description: What is the enemy's goal, explained by the commander of the -Achilles- air defense missile battalion on the broadcast of the -Suspilne Novosti- marathon. Captain Yury Fedorenko of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after the Kosh chieftain Ivan Sirk. — For the enemy, the task remains the same - they are assigned the task of advancing as much as possible through the battle formations of the Defense Forces to the administrative borders of the city of Kharkiv with the aim of further raising firepower and inflicting fire damage on residential areas. It is important for the enemy to increase his terror, for him it is important to destroy Ukrainians, the officer said. For this purpose, the occupiers are trying to carry out shock and assault actions in the north of the Kharkiv region, first of all, on the part of the battle line that is closest to the administrative borders of the regional center. This is a shade of Hlyboke — Liptsi. However, the Defense Forces managed and continue to manage to deter the offensive actions of the enemy. It was possible to achieve this thanks to the combination of two factors - the effective actions of units to destroy the occupiers and the Kursk operation. — The defense forces managed to significantly defeat the enemy's shock-assault potential. Also, after the beginning of the Kursk operation, the enemy was forced in one way or another to transfer the reserves that were supposed to strengthen their grouping on this stretch to Kurshchyna, the drone commander explained. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the Russians hit the two residential high-rise buildings in Kharkiv, in one of the damaged buildings, floors from the eighth to the third were destroyed, in general as a result of the heavy bombardment with six aerial bombs, it is known about three dead and more than 30 injured people.

Title: A miner-spy dug a hole for himself - an agent of the Ministry of Defense of the Russian Federation w...
Description: This was reported on September 25 by the prosecutor's office of the Donetsk region. According to the investigation, in January of this year, the man met an unknown person on Telegram. In the process of communication, it turned out that the interlocutor is a serviceman of the Ministry of Defense of the Russian Federation. He offered the suspect to give him information that could harm Ukraine's defense capabilities. In order to conspire against illegal activities, they agreed to exchange information of a military nature on the Hornet social network. Having agreed to the offer, the resident of Pokrovsk began to collect information for the curator about the location of the units of the Defense Forces on the territory of the settlement. In the text messages, the agent -drained- the location of the personnel of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Under the procedural guidance of the Donetsk regional prosecutor's office, the citizen was informed of suspicion of treason (Part 2 of Article 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). The suspect was remanded in custody. As reported by ArmyInform, behind bars turned out to be a deserter who was -draining- the positions of the Armed Forces near Bakhmut.

Title: Two funny tanks lived in the occupier's house - they no longer live there
Description: The video of this appeared on September 25 on the battalion channel. Ukrainian FPV drones immediately flew to the tanks. The first tried to attack the leading tank, but, apparently, was crushed by an enemy EW. But the second FPV drone immobilized the first tank. As a result, both tanks could be finished off. -A tank is always an important target, but when there are two of them, it's twice as fun to destroy them,- the battalion commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the battalion of unmanned systems of the 110th separate mechanized brigade named after Colonel General Mark Bezruchka destroys enemy vehicles and personnel.

Title: We are in different entrances, the Russians are breaking down the walls towards us, and the locals a...
Description: His words were published on September 25 on the brigade channel. The man joined the brigade relatively recently, but is already actively fighting back the enemy. The paratrooper tells about cases when Russians changed into civilian clothes and tried to move around the city. -While holding your flank, you also need to insure the neighboring one, because there is no guarantee that the defense of the adjacent units will not collapse. There was a situation when the enemy wanted to get to us through the second entrance due to the almost destroyed first one. We were told by the radio station where the enemy was, and I quickly fired a shot from the -one-shot- (RPG-22. - Ed.) - and they were no longer there,- Maksym said. According to him, the occupiers started an assault at night for five days. -On the first day, a box with infantry arrived at the entrance and we immediately destroyed it together with the crew. And so they destroyed them one by one. At night, they have little efficiency, they are in a hurry with the technique and do not know what to do next. They hide in entrances to try to advance during the day,- Maksym explained. During battles in an urbanized area, it is not uncommon to shake hands with the enemy. Once there was only 30-40 meters from the paratroopers to the occupiers. -Just in time to throw a grenade!- Maxim added. Before the full-scale invasion, Maksym worked at Azovstal as a high-rise welder. -Before the invasion, we had just finished the facility and went on vacation. I was supposed to return on February 27... I didn't think about whether to go to the army for a long time, I knew that it was necessary to save the country,- Maksym said. First study in Ukraine, then abroad. According to the distribution, he got into another unit of the DSHV, fought in the Zaporozhye direction, then in the Kharkiv direction, was an attack aircraft. Later, he transferred to the 95th brigade, where he became a scout. -Dangerous tasks, being first everywhere, being efficient are mine. I found myself in this specialty,- said the paratrooper. Maxim himself comes from Kharkiv Oblast. -My region bravely stands under constant shelling. Therefore, I cannot be weak - I am a warrior and I fight for my native home, for my future and for the lives of millions of Ukrainians!- said Maxim. As reported by ArmyInform, the gunners of the 95th Polish assault brigade of the DSHV destroy military equipment and manpower of the enemy in Kurshchyna.

Title: It went off — our drones destroyed the enemy artillery system with ammunition
Description: The video of the injuries appeared on September 25 on the brigade's channel. The Russian missed and was punished.

Title: The three collaborators are now under arrest: the traitors - it turns out - have been behind bars fo...
Description: This is notified by the Kherson Regional Prosecutor's Office. The investigation established that during the occupation of Kherson, the accused were employed in managerial positions in the occupation administration of the city. -In the spring of 2022, one of them became the so-called head of the department of legal support of activities, the other - headed the -department of financial institutions of socio-cultural relations and the social sphere-. Description: This was announced by Oleg Synegubov, the head of the Kharkiv Regional State Administration. Title: Two drones — one goal: scouts destroyed a Russian howitzer -Msta-S-
Description: This is reported by the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. As the department said, the fighters of the -Kryla- unit of the Department of Active Actions of the GUR of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine destroyed the Russian self-propelled artillery installation -Msta-S-. -In order to burn the enemy howitzer, the scouts skillfully used two long-range FPV drones,- the scouts added. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the Comanche artillery reconnaissance division of the 40th artillery brigade named after Grand Duke Vytautas hit the car with the occupants, after which they had to jump straight out of the flames at speed.

Title: From baseball caps to tactical sneakers: The Ministry of Defense updates equipment for the military
Description: About this informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. It is these things that are most needed, according to a military survey conducted in July-August by the Department of Procurement Policy of the Ministry of Defense together with the Logistics Forces Command. According to the Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov, the survey was conducted to find out the real state of affairs with the provision of uniforms, body armor, and helmets to the Armed Forces of Ukraine. For this property, the need is almost completely covered, and provision is made in full with formed warehouse stocks. The military also had the opportunity to express their wishes about what material property they lack. For example, in their opinion, it is also worth issuing demi-season jackets (windbreakers), individual individual tents, tablet and turnstile covers, military baseball caps, tactical sneakers, etc. -We are committed to providing our military with everything they need to carry out their missions effectively. War changes, needs change, and we listen to the military. During the survey, they expressed specific wishes regarding the material possessions they lack. We will take this into account,- noted Dmytro Klimenkov. As ArmiyaInform reported, the Army+ application started survey on the level of satisfaction with dry rations.

Title: A Russian FPV drone attacked a civilian car in the Mykolaiv region

Currently, the condition of the victim is stable, of moderate severity. All the necessary medical assistance is provided,- noted Vitaly Kim. Monastyrske and the city of Kherson. Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , I decree: to start holding a nationwide minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, to be announced in all mass media regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Rocket attack on Odesa region: there is a hit in an open area

Title: The enemy tried to wedge into the defense 154 times: the Armed Forces repel assaults in all directio...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. According to detailed information, yesterday the enemy hit the positions of Ukrainian units and populated areas with three missile strikes using six missiles, as well as 75 airstrikes, including dropping 123 anti-aircraft missiles. In addition, it carried out almost 5,000 attacks, 178 of them from rocket salvo systems, and engaged about 1,700 kamikaze drones for destruction. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of the settlements of Malushyne, Richki, Yastrubyne, Sosnivka, Sumy, Brusky, Kindrativka, Pavlivka, Nova Sloboda, Kozache, Shalygine, Bilovody, Bezdryk, Zaporizhzhia, Kharkiv, Vovchansk, Petropavlovsk. The enemy also attacked Kupyansk, Senkove, Kruglyakivka, Bohuslavka, Mykolaivka, Novoyehorivka, Andriivka, Toretsk, Shcherbynivka, Katerynivka, Druzhba, Kostyantynivka, Oleksandropil, Zoryanye, Zelene Pole, Chelyve, Bogoyavlenka, Novokamyanka, Sukhanov, Khreschenivka. However, the Ukrainian defenders steadfastly restrained the onslaught of the occupiers and inflicted maximum losses on the enemy. In the Kharkiv direction the enemy tried three times to storm near the settlement of Vovchansk. In addition, the enemy's aircraft attacked residential areas of Kharkiv with seven anti-aircraft missiles, as a result of which the civilian population and civilian infrastructure were damaged. In the Kupyan direction, 12 attacks by invaders took place during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Sinkivka, Andriivka, Kruglyakivka, Pischany, Stelmakhivka, and Lozova. On the Lyman direction the enemy attacked 22 times. Tried to wedge into our defenses near Druzhelyubivka, Cherneshchyna, Grekivka, Nevsky, Torsky, Makiivka, Novosadovo, and Zarichny. On the Severskyi direction Ukrainian defenders repelled three assaults by Russian invaders near Verkhnokamyanskyi and Bilogorivka. In the Kramatorsk direction, the occupiers attacked ten times in the areas of Kalynyvka, Mynkivka, Stupochki and Bila Hora. In the direction of Toretsk, the enemy, supported by aviation, launched 12 attacks in the direction of Toretsk, Shcherbinivka and near New York. In the Pokrovsky direction our defenders stopped 25 assaults and offensive actions of the aggressor in the areas of the settlements of Vozdvizhenka, Novotoretske, Krasny Yar, Novogrodivka, Mykolaivka, Marynivka and Zelene Pole. The greatest concentration of enemy attacks was near Novotoretskyi. In the Kurakhiv direction the defense forces repelled 20 attacks. The occupiers most actively tried to advance near Georgiivka and Tsukuriny. In addition, the enemy attacked in the direction of Dalnyi, Kostyantynivka, Katerynivka, and Zhelanyi the Second. In the Vremivsk direction the enemy carried out eight assaults on our positions in the areas of Vugledar, Katerynivka, Vodyanny and Pavlivka. Actively used bomber aircraft for strikes in the direction. In the Gulyajpil direction, the Russian invaders fired at Biloghirya NARAs. Three times, the invading troops unsuccessfully tried to dislodge units of the Defense Forces from their positions in the Dnieper direction. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. We will remind, last day the losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,250 people. Also, Ukrainian soldiers destroyed 15 tanks, 12 armored combat vehicles, 74 artillery systems, one MLRS, 115 UAVs of operational-tactical level, 73 vehicles and 13 units of special equipment.

Title: Night attacks in Dnipropetrovsk region: the enemy hits Nikopol with kamikaze drones

Title: Large-scale shelling of Zaporozhye: a man died, seven people were injured

Title: Good, but not enough - the Russian army bombed their own city
Description: notified operational-tactical group -Kharkiv-. -This once again demonstrates the chaotic and carelessly planned nature of Russian military actions, which harm not only the civilian infrastructure of Ukraine, but also its own border settlements,- said the message of the Kharkiv Technical University. Such cases indicate the low accuracy of Russian airstrikes and the unreliability of guidance systems, in particular those that the enemy uses in universal planning and correction modules when equipping FABs with them. -In addition, this shows the incompetence and unwillingness of the Russian military to take into account the risks for its fellow citizens, which contributes to the deepening of the internal crisis in Russia,- - believes OTU -Kharkiv-. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russians continue bombing Suzha.

Title: All the martyrs were neutralized and 4 air missiles were shot down - the night work of our air defen...
Description: This was reported on the morning of September 25 by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Title: A view from a copter — the prosecutor's office showed the consequences of the attack on Kharkiv
Description: The video appeared on the channel of the Prosecutor's Office. A pile of household items, including a baby bathtub, pieces of concrete slabs, a door leading to a sinkhole, a balcony hanging over the void - this is what a residential building in Kharkiv looks like now. As reported by ArmyInform, as a result of a powerful Russian attack 3 people died and more than 30 were injured.

Title: Russia's war against Ukraine will end because the UN Charter will come into effect - the President
Description: The text of the President's speech was published on his official website. -One day, in this hall, they will definitely say that Russia's war against Ukraine is over: not frozen, not suspended, not forgotten - truly over. And it will not happen because someone is tired of the war. Not because someone bargained something out of Putin. Russia's war against Ukraine will end because the UN Charter will come into force. It should work. Our Ukrainian right to self-defense must prevail. Our cooperation with peoples of the world who value life as much as we do. Our territorial integrity. Our sovereignty, the independence of our country. We are protecting what every nation would certainly like to protect for itself. And what the UN Charter guarantees for everyone,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi. According to him, it is Russia that always has to lie to justify its war. Not Ukraine. Russia cannot refer to the UN Charter to explain what it is doing against Ukraine. Actually, in her perverted way, in her distorted world, she does refer to the Statute, but this is simply madness. -Russia remained silent because it could not explain why a Russian missile recently hit a grain ship heading to an Egyptian port across the Black Sea. Russia is either silent or lying about why its drones and missiles are detected in the airspace of Poland, Moldova, and Romania. Ukrainians are injured and die every day. Daily. Today again Russian bombs hit residential buildings. Even an ordinary bakery became a target. What is so threatening for Russia in the production of bread? Putin has no answer. And Russia never has an honest answer to the question of why its army kills children in Ukraine, -defeats- schools and hospitals, fights not for justice, but for the blackout of a neighboring nation,- the President said. According to him, Putin has nothing to say if you ask him why he is trying to drag Belarus into war, why his propagandists threaten the peoples of the Caucasus or Central Asia, or why Russia invests most not in the development of humanity, but in hatred. Russia has no legitimate reason—absolutely—for making Iran and North Korea de facto accomplices in their criminal war in Europe when their weapons kill Ukrainians and help Putin steal Ukrainian land from the Ukrainian people. -We know that some people in the world want to talk to Putin. We know that. Meet, talk, communicate. But what exactly can they hear from him? That he is upset because we are exercising our right to protect our people? Or that he wants to continue the war and terror just so that no one thinks he was wrong? This is also madness,- noted Volodymyr Zelenskyi. He reminded that from the first second of this war, Russia is doing something that cannot be justified in any way according to the UN Charter. Every destroyed Ukrainian city, every burnt village — and there are already hundreds and hundreds of them — is proof that Russia is committing an international crime. And that is why this war cannot simply -subside-. -That is why this war cannot be calmed down by talks. Necessary actions. And I am grateful to all the nations that are really helping in ways that save the lives of our people. Putin has violated so many international norms and rules that he will not stop himself. Russia can only be forced to make peace. And this is exactly what is needed - to force Russia to make peace as the only aggressor in this war, the only violator of the UN Charter,- the President urged. He reminded that now, with the approach of the third winter of this war, Russia is again trying to destroy the Ukrainian energy industry, and this autumn it is acting even more cynically. -They are preparing to attack our nuclear power plants, three of them, we have this information and we have evidence of this. If Russia is willing to go this far, it means that none of what you value matters to Moscow. This kind of Russian cynicism will continue to strike if it is given any place in the world. The UN Charter leaves no room for this. And that is why the Peace Formula also leaves no room,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy assured. He recalled how in 2022, at the height of the war, while proposing the Peace Formula, he proposed to adhere to the UN Charter — to make effective everything for which this organization was created. Each point of the Peace Formula is based on the principles, goals and norms of the UN Charter - on the rights it guarantees to countries and on the resolutions of the General Assembly, which are already supported by the majority of countries. -And there are not different versions of the UN Charter for different parts of the world. There are no regional quasi-statutes. There is no separate UN Charter for the BRICS or the G7. There is no separate Russian-Iranian UN Charter or separate Sino-Brazilian UN Charter. There is only one UN Charter that unites everyone — should unite everyone. There is only one way to a just peace - clear steps that everyone understands equally, and this is reflected in the Peace Formula. This is the implementation of the UN Charter. And we all know what needs to be done if we honestly assess the situation and really want to stop Russia's war. And the most important thing is to act. Together, of course. Of course, in unity. Without creating new and unnecessary divisions of the world into blocs or regional groups. Unity always works for the benefit of peace,- the President assured. He stated that it is necessary to prepare a second Peace Summit to end the war. All together. And invited all principled nations to join Ukraine in this process. All those who truly respect the UN Charter. -We invite China. We invite Brazil. I have already invited India. We work with African countries, with all of Latin America, the Middle East, Central Asia, Europe, the Pacific region, and North America. All are equally important for peace. All of them. No exceptions. Just as the UN Charter should work without exception. This is the process that will lead us to peace. To a just peace. Real peace. Peace that will last. We all already know how to achieve it. We have the Peace Formula. We have the UN Charter. And we have all the forces necessary to implement this. All it takes is determination. Thank you very much. Glory to Ukraine!- Volodymyr Zelenskyi said. As reported by ArmyInform, The President discussed with the US Congress defense packages and strengthening of sanctions against the Russian Federation.

Title: Financial assistance to veterans: how to apply online
Description: The portal works according to the -single window- principle. More than 40 different services are currently available. Among them are social, medical, educational and others. Among the categories of services, one of the most relevant is service material help. There, defenders, their family members and the families of the victims can remotely apply for annual financial assistance. ArmyInform tells how veterans can use the service online and what needs to be done. So, let's go. by link, we submit an application and undergo authorization. For this you need to confirm your identity. You can do this in several ways: using a personal key or the ID.GOV.UA system, through Action.Signature. The registration procedure takes only 3 minutes. They specify your personal and passport data, your status (combatant, person with disabilities or family member of the deceased), email address, phone number, registration address, information about a bank card for charges, documents confirming the right to benefits. Next, sign the application again in a convenient way for you, for example, with a personal key or through Action.Signature. Your documents are considered for 30 days. After they have been processed, the applicant will be informed through his personal account and by e-mail about the results of financial assistance. The funds will be deposited into the applicant's bank account. Material assistance is provided by decision of the Kyiv City Council once a year. Last year, the financial assistance amounted to: – to Kyivans participating in the ATO — 5 thousand hryvnias each; – to Kyivans participating in the anti-terrorist operation, defenders and defenders with disabilities of group I — 30 thousand hryvnias each; – Kyiv citizens participating in the anti-terrorist operation, defenders with disabilities of group II — 20 thousand hryvnias each; – 30,000 each to the family members of the fallen Kyiv citizens who participated in the anti-terrorist operation or perform combat tasks while repelling large-scale Russian aggression against Ukraine. More detailed information about service provision can be read on the -Portal of Defenders and Defenders-.

Title: The enemy removed its missile carriers from the Black and Azov seas
