The opinions of defenders of Ukraine and the potential demand for inclusive rations will allow the agency of the Ministry of Defense -State rear operator- to build a procurement strategy and make a decision on the feasibility of purchasing dry rations of one or another type for the Armed Forces. The Ministry of Defense is already working on expanding the range of dry rations - the list of available rations will include vegetable, kosher and halal sets. -Expanding the list of dry rations is an important step in improving the provision of our servicemen. By introducing nutrition that takes into account religious, medical and ethical needs, the Ministry of Defense provides for the individual needs of each and every one and creates better conditions for the performance of tasks related to the defense of Ukraine,- said Deputy Defense Minister of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. The survey started today, September 21, in the Army+ application. The functionality of the application will allow to quickly remotely collect the answers of the military and transfer them to the -State operator of the rear- for analysis and decision-making. The survey will run for 14 days. -Today, 250,000 military personnel have already been authorized in Army+. And every day up to 10,000 users register in the application and can really influence changes in the army. And I am grateful to the team of the -State rear operator- for their initiative and desire to take into account the opinion of the military, collected through a survey in Armiya+, in their work,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko, deputy minister of defense for digitalization issues. We remind you that this is the third survey that is being conducted in Army+ among the military. Past topics have included: use of combat systems and online training. Title: The investigation confirmed the participation of the Russian Federation in the shelling of the Red C...
Description: This is reported by the Office of the Prosecutor General. Under the procedural leadership of the Donetsk Regional Prosecutor's Office, a pre-trial investigation is being conducted in criminal proceedings initiated on the grounds of violation of the laws and customs of war, combined with intentional murder (Part 2 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). We will remind you that on September 12, 2024, the Russian army committed another war crime in Donetsk region. The troops of the aggressor state with barrel artillery hit 3 vehicles of the International Committee of the Red Cross in the village of Virolyubivka of Kostyantynivska MTG during the distribution of humanitarian aid. As a result of the shelling, 5 employees of the International Committee of the Red Cross were injured. Three men died immediately at the scene of the attack. Two of their colleagues suffered shrapnel wounds and mine-explosive injuries. The law enforcement officers established two places of impact of artillery shells and one place of impact of an attack UAV. Fragments of the mentioned ammunition and the remains of the unmanned aerial vehicle were removed from the scene. Based on the results of investigative actions, inspection of the scene, expert examinations and witness interviews, it was established that the artillery shelling was carried out by 2 high-explosive artillery shells of 152 mm caliber and the Lancet unmanned barrage munition, which is only in the arsenal of the Russian Armed Forces. The 152 mm projectiles were used in tandem with a drone that has a laser range finder and autonomously detects and engages the target. This not only explains the wreckage of the -Lancet- UAV found at the scene, but also indicates the deliberate nature of the attack on vehicles and personnel of the International Committee of the Red Cross, General Prosecutor Andriy Kostin noted. Taking into account the traces of damage to the surrounding buildings and cars, as well as the recorded locations of ammunition hits, the direction of the flight was determined in advance. According to the investigation, the firing positions of the artillery units were probably located in the area of ​​the village. Yagidne, Bakhmut District, Donetsk Oblast, a territory currently occupied by Russian troops. On the occupied territory, from which the shot was fired, the following are participating in the hostilities: These units are armed with artillery systems for firing 152 mm shells and Lancet attack UAVs. On September 18, 2024, with the aim of preventing similar incidents of shelling and the possible death of people during the delivery of humanitarian aid, the decision of the Defense Council of the Donetsk region introduced a ban on the movement of representatives of charitable organizations in the front-line communities of the region without the appropriate approval of the OVA. The pre-trial investigation in the criminal proceedings continues. As reported by ArmyInform, the Red Cross Office in Dnipro will suspend operations after the attack on the mission in Donetsk.

Title: The occupiers shelled Kharkiv and the region: two people died, more than 20 were injured
Description: informed Oleg Synegubov, chief of Kharkiv OVA, about the consequences of hostile shelling of Kharkiv region by the military of the army of the Russian Federation during the past day . Kharkiv was attacked by the occupiers around 16:50 on September 20. In the Osnovyansk district of the city, an enemy ammunition hit an industrial zone. Two people were injured, 150 windows of buildings, a bus, 7 trucks, 3 cars were damaged. There was a fire in the ecosystem. In the Slobid district, the impact came on the territory of the transport enterprise, a 61-year-old man was injured. Video and photo of the consequences of shelling in Kharkiv on the afternoon of September 20 was made public by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. According to the preliminary data of the law enforcement officers, the Russian troops struck the city with two FAB-250s from the UMPK. For the second time in the past day, the occupiers shelled the regional center around 11:00 p.m. Enemy ammunition hit the Shevchenkiv, Kyiv and Kholodnohirsky districts of the city. 11 people were injured, including children - a 10-year-old girl, a 12-year-old boy, and a 17-year-old girl who had an acute reaction to stress. In general, as a result of this shelling, the building of the regional hospital, a hotel, 6 private houses, 2 farm buildings, and 2 kiosks were damaged. Video with the moment one of the aerial bombs was hit was released by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office . According to preliminary data of law enforcement officers, the occupiers hit Kharkiv with a KAB-250 from the UMPK from the Belgorod district of the Russian Federation by launching aerial bombs from the Su-34 aircraft. Photos of the destruction caused by an enemy airstrike on the regional center published at the Main Office of the National Police of Ukraine in the Kharkiv Region . Also, in the Kharkiv region, the Russian occupiers attacked the territory of the market in the village of Kivsharivka. Two people died, two more were injured. According to preliminary data of the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office, the Russian military fired at the settlement FAB-250 with the UMPK module . One of the two injured women has an explosive wound, the other has an acute reaction to stress. The Main Department of the National Emergency Service of Ukraine in the Kharkiv region reported that as a result of the attack on the center Kivsharivky's building of the fire station of the Komunalnyk volunteer fire brigade and a fire truck were seriously damaged. Also, DNSN informed that in Kupyan Oblast, Russian occupiers also attacked the village of Novoosynov of the Kuril community. Two people died, two more were injured. There, the cafe building and 2 commercial establishments were destroyed by bomb blasts. Two civilians were injured. There were fires with a total area of ​​600 square meters. In addition, as a result of shelling of the village of Ivashka of the Zolochiv community of the Bogodukhiv district, three people were injured - a 68-year-old man, a 57-year-old man and a 55-year-old woman. And in the village of Shestakovo of the Starosaltiv community of the Chuguyiv district, two men aged 34 and 30 were injured as a result of enemy shelling of the territory of an agricultural enterprise, and the roof of a warehouse building with an area of ​​500 square meters was burned. 3 cowsheds were damaged. In the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office, Head Office of the National Police of Ukraine in Kharkiv Oblast and The main department of the DSNS of Ukraine in the Kharkiv region released photos of the destruction caused by the shelling of populated areas of the Kharkiv region by the Russian invaders. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that as a result of airstrikes by the Russian invaders with the use of KB-250 in Kharkiv wounded three people, after repeated strikes on the city the number of victims increased to 15 people, and in the village of Kivsharivka in the Kupyan region, two people died and two more were injured.

Title: The enemy carried out more than 200 attacks per day — General Staff of the Armed Forces
Description: Operational information as of 08.00 on September 21 was published by the General Staff of the ZSU. The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of Yastrubyne, Iskryskivshchyna, Khotyn, Pavlivka settlements of the Sumy region; Oleksandropil, Staromlynivka, Bogoyavlenka, Chasiv Yar, Ivanivske, Kalynivka, Bila Gora, Toretsk and Kleban-Byk of the Donetsk region; Novodarivka and Pyatikhatky, Zaporizhzhia region. Over the past 24 hours, aviation and missile forces and artillery of the Defense Forces have carried out eight strikes on concentrations of enemy manpower, two control points, one anti-aircraft defense device and seven artillery systems of the occupiers have been hit. In the Kharkiv direction, there were three enemy attacks in the Vovchansk area. According to detailed information in the Kupyan direction, the occupiers carried out 19 attacks during the day. The defense forces stopped all enemy assaults in the areas of Stepova Novoselivka, Synkivka, Stelmakhivka, Kruglyakivka and Lozova settlements. In the Lymansky direction, our troops repelled ten attacks by invaders near Cherneshchyna, Grekivka, Druzhelyubivka, Novosadovo, Terni and Zarichny. The main efforts of the enemy were directed towards Nevsky, where he carried out eight more attacks. On the Siverskyi direction, the Defense Forces of Ukraine repulsed one assault near Vyimka. With the support of aviation in the Kramatorsk direction, the enemy tried nine times to break through the defenses in the areas of Chasovoy Yar, Kalynyvka, Ivanivskyi and Bila Hora. Near the settlements of Dachne, Toretsk and Shcherbynivka in the Toretsk direction, the enemy launched nine attacks. Our defenders repelled 36 enemy assaults in the Pokrovsky direction of varying intensity in the areas of Zelene Pole, Marynivka, Krasniy Yar, Vozdvizhenka, Novotoretsk, Myrolyubivka, Grodivka, Chervone, Selidove and Novogrodivka settlements. The defense forces repelled enemy attacks in the Kurakhiv direction in the areas of Tsukuryne, Zhelanne Pershe, Georgiyivka, Hirnyk, Dalnye, Oleksandrivka, Katerynivka, and Kostyantynivka, where the occupiers tried to break through the defenses of our troops 58 times. The enemy was most active near Georgiyivka, conducting 21 assaults in one day. With the support of aviation, the aggressor attacked Ukrainian positions in the areas of Vugledar, Prechistivka, Novodarivka and Bogoyavlenka 18 times in the Vremivsk direction. In the Orihiv direction, six combat clashes took place near Mala Tokmachka, Lobkovo and Novodanilivka. Three attacks by the occupiers were unsuccessful in the Dnieper direction. On the Volyn and Poliske directions, the operational situation has not changed significantly. No signs of formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. In the Kursk region, since the beginning of the past day, enemy aviation has carried out 22 airstrikes, dropping 25 guided air bombs on the territory of the Russian Federation. Our soldiers continue to actively inflict losses in manpower and equipment on the invading troops, exhaust the enemy along the entire line of battle and in the deep rear. In general, Ukrainian defenders neutralized 1,440 Russian invaders last day. Also, the enemy lost 21 tanks, 38 armored fighting vehicles, 58 artillery systems, 4 anti-aircraft guns, 92 operational-tactical level unmanned aerial vehicles, 68 vehicles and 10 units of special equipment. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy used 67 KAB and almost 700 kamikaze drones.

Title: A wild boar was released on a minefield: Germany introduced an armored vehicle for neutralizing infe...
Description: As informs the official portal of the manufacturing company, at the military training ground in Bergen, Germany, representatives of this well-known company, in particular, in the Armed Forces, conducted a practical demonstration of the capabilities of its new highly protected armored demining vehicle Keiler NG, ArmiyaInform reports. More than 100 military and defense industry representatives from different countries attended the event. Keiler NG cleared the site at a speed of up to 250 meters per minute. Keiler NG, which means -wild boar-, is based on the chassis of the Kodiak armored engineering vehicle, and therefore belongs to the Leopard 2 family of tanks, which are detailed our agency told. This use of a well-known platform makes it possible to reduce logistics costs. The main tool of the machine is a Pearson mine plow more than 4 meters wide and with a speed of 250 meters per minute on loose soil. The machine is also equipped with the Plofadder remote demining system from the Rheinmetall division of South Africa Denel Munition, which works similarly to MICLIC. It allows making passages 160 meters long and 9 meters wide. As noted defense market researchers from IKK Defense Express, an important feature of the machine is the possibility of its transformation into a remote controlled drone An interesting feature is the ability to quickly convert the machine: instead of a plow, a bulldozer blade can be installed, which gives the Keiler NG additional options for clearing anti-tank obstacles, filling trenches and creating fortifications. Reviewers from the European Security and Defense portal write that the demonstration of the Plofadder detonating cord system, developed by the Rheinmetall Denel Munition company, attracted special attention. Two Plofadder systems on one Keiler NG can effectively deal with even deep mine barriers. According to Rheinmetall, Plofadder destroys 90-95% of the mines along the way, while those that remain will be degraded. Once launched, the Keiler NG will advance along the path, plowing through the terrain softened by the explosion. The Keiler NG is also equipped with a second-generation demining duplicating magnetic signature device in front of the plow, which greatly improves demining safety. The Pearson Pathfinder Clear Lane Marking System is installed to mark the safe area behind the machine. She installs special pennants, visible both at night and during the day, as the car moves forward. Rheinmetall Denel Munitions explosive charges are placed in the upper rear of the hull. An engineering crane with a hydraulic drive is installed in the center of the case. It can be used, in particular, to quickly replace a mine plow with a bulldozer dump, and if necessary, remove any obstacle. For remote activation of electronic mines, the machine uses a special magnetic complex. Despite the weight of 63 tons, the Keiler NG develops a speed of 65 km/h, can overcome obstacles 90 cm high, overcome slopes of 60% and cross trenches more than 2.50 m wide. The Keiler NG crew consists of two people, the workplaces of both soldiers are located on the left side of the car. To strengthen the protection in the center and on the sides of the machine, additional reservation is installed. At the request of the customer, active protection complexes can be installed on the car. For self-defense, the Keiler NG is equipped with a ROSY rapid cloaking system and a Natter remote-controlled weapon station with a 12.7 mm machine gun. In addition, the concept of the machine provides for the possibility of remote deployment and installation of active protection, which makes it maximally adaptable to different combat conditions. Basic characteristics: Plofadder detonating cord system: In the future, after passing all the tests, the new mine defuser should replace the obsolete Keiler, created on the basis of the M48 tank. It is also being considered to equip it with an active protection system and a sophisticated interface for digital operations. Rheinmetall improves its combat vehicle fleet with the next generation Keiler armored vehicle. Video: Military Style

Title: -Vkyd- for more than five million: the Russian Federation wants to repeat the tragedy of Okhmatdyt
Description: The Countering Disinformation Center reminds that this may indicate that the enemy is preparing another terrorist attack on civilians the projects The author of the fake is the foreign intelligence service of the aggressor country. It is her statement that Ukraine is allegedly preparing -a staging of a Russian missile attack on a children's institution- -at the behest- of the United States, which is being spread by propaganda resources of the Russian Federation. Such -throw-ins- by the Russians have nothing to do with reality and may indicate that the enemy is preparing another attack on civilian objects. Ukrainians have had the opportunity to see this more than once. With such actions, the enemy is trying to sow panic among Ukrainians, bring division and distrust into our society, and justify their own crimes. After all, Russia tries to blame Ukraine for all war crimes committed by its own army without exception. Thus, Russian propaganda stubbornly calls the mass killings of civilians in Buch and other Ukrainian cities that were under occupation a -provocation and staging-, and the rocket attack on the -Okhmatdyt- children's hospital a -hit by an anti-missile missile of the Kyiv Air Defense Forces-. Don't let the enemy mislead you.

Title: -We were just landing and throwing grenades-: how -Tokha- and -Dobry- captured the Russians
Description: — He was the -three hundredth- at our platoon base… The enemy in that area entered between the positions, we were not told their exact number. As if they saw five. Therefore, in the morning we were assigned the task of going in to clear (landing. - Ed.) and pick up the wounded man, he could not walk, - recalls the soldier with the call sign -Good-. According to the words of serviceman Anton, he and -Dobry- in the -two- then went ahead with the landing: - We were clearing, and there were a lot of -beds-, positions. We just moved along the landing and threw grenades, because the landing was very dense: the leaves constantly shimmered when the sun broke through. It seemed that someone was sitting behind every bush. We fired, threw grenades, and moved as fast as we could to capture part of the landing. - -Toha- (Anton. - Ed.) says: -Do you see the enemy? Shove him.- The enemy then realized that it would not be very successful to fight with us, -Dobry- notes. Anton adds that the enemy was really confused: - Besides, they had no reinforcements. When I ran out and saw them, they just raised their hands. The only thing they kept shouting was -don't kill, don't kill!- -Dobry- clarifies that they were confronted by four Russians: - And the fifth escaped from them at night. The captives said that he threw the machine gun down the road to the position. As Anton points out, it was clear from the Russians that they did not really want to fight: - I understood that they had reached this landing and were waiting for reinforcements, because they did not understand where to go next. During the time they talked, they said that they were abandoned and forced to come here. They said that they have no use here at all. Although, according to the documents, there were also contract workers from 2018. Maybe the actors are good. The question arose, how to tie them, because I didn't have any tape or anything. I saw that one of them had a tourniquet on his bulletproof vest. He tied it with him… In the end, four were captured and very quickly took their fellow, the -three hundredth-, who was waiting for us. Anton says that the adventures did not end there. When the wounded man was brought to the evacuation point, the enemy noticed the car that was supposed to pick up our soldiers. — And the mortar shelling began. It was very hot, a -120- flew nearby and hit the car and the driver with the call sign -Timoha-. We very quickly jumped into the pickup truck and at a speed of 140 kilometers per hour we flew in the trunk across the field under heavy fire, Anton recalls. -Good- confirmed that our wounded man survived and is now in the hospital.

Title: -Queen- from an RPG: how an FPV drone is taught to fire a grenade launcher. Experience of the unit -...
Description: His responsibilities included the practical implementation of ideas and their direct technical implementation. Now he directs all his experience to the effective destruction of the enemy. An ArmyInform correspondent visited the -Bulava- strike drone unit, which was created on the initiative of the drones themselves in February 2023, and saw with her own eyes a new development - the -Queen of Hornets- drone, armed with a hand-held anti-tank grenade launcher. — We do a dark thing for a bright purpose. Most of us grew up on futuristic movies, Terminator is the same. And here is the year 2024 - an iron bird is flying, squealing from the air, - says the warrior. The work of the unit requires ingenuity, perseverance and imagination. And in this creative process there is an important goal - to use every opportunity where you can risk the life of a drone, and not the life of a person. Almost the entire team has infantry experience. These guys know from their own experience what defense in the trenches is like, and they deeply value the lives of their fellows. — The drone does not cost much. In any comparison. No matter how cynical it may sound, everything in war has its own price - a tank shot, a drone, a soldier's life. And I would like those who do not let it all pass through their hearts as much as we do, at least from a financial point of view - to lose a drone is cheaper than to lose a person, - says -Boas-. Discussion of that , how to try to shoot with a drone from a hand-held anti-tank grenade launcher, started in the unit a year ago. Everything rested on a platform capable of carrying the required weight, maneuverable and suitable for the price/quality ratio. — We had agricultural drones, but it was not so easy to set the right angle for them. Even if you are a super pilot, the risks of losing a drone are high, and this is a very expensive story. And then the -Queen of Hornets- appeared, which opened up a lot of possibilities. The idea has been in my head for a long time, and not only with us. We just took it and tried it, - says the fighter and adds: - The important point is that no one interfered with us. Ideas, developments, implementation. When your eyes are burning and you don't put sticks in your wheels, then there will be efficiency. -Queen of Hornets- is the largest Ukrainian FPV drone already in use on the battlefield. It was developed at the request of K-2 battalion commander Kirill Veres to create a relatively cheap and affordable FPV bomber. Due to its high carrying capacity, the drone can perform a number of tasks, in particular, increasing the range of other FPV drones by 25 km. The trigger mechanism for the RPG drone was developed by Serhiy, who has been designing UAVs since 2015. For a long time, he made drones for the front as a volunteer, and then he came to the unit as a soldier. - Our first dialogue was: -Oh, finally I see who assembled the same drones in the kitchen- - -Yes!- . I say: -Believe me, you'll stay here for a week and you'll see that the possibilities for creativity are unlimited,- Udav remembers their meeting with a smile. , in addition to the drone, assemble the jet installation. Colleagues kindly joke about the fact that sometimes an engineer finds an unexpected practical application for things that others would have left in the landfill. From the next room of the secret -creative center-, the duty watchers watch the course of events on monitors. at the front, how crews work. They identify problems in time and participate in the search for solutions. — You can get in touch quickly — wait, it's not like that, or don't fly there, because there is a EW. If, for example, we see that there is a large consumption of BC in the first half hour, then, without waiting for the command, we already pack — and in an hour the additional stock is ready. It's all by itself, by feel. As one organism. Time is very important in war. Roughly speaking, the problem has not yet been announced, but it is already being solved. This is experience, interaction, the full involvement of everyone and the desire to work for the result, - says -Udav-. Regarding the discussions about unified and non-unified components, the guys say that it is two in one - tasks and conditions for their constant fulfillment change, flexibility is needed. Each such unit must have a workshop and specialists capable of reworking the standard BC. — The factory line is unified, it goes without saying, but for specific tasks that may require solutions on the spot, there must be a workshop and SVP engineers. By the way, such a VOS exists, and our specialists are worth their weight in gold. The boys are mostly all self-taught. They traveled to the experienced grandfathers and learned. Any innovative development, in order to be scaled at the state level, must go through the seven circles of hell. The device is clumsy, so a lot hangs on such creative hubs. The power is in making it all work. Both above and below. Then there is a chance to effectively confront the enemy, - says -Uvad-. The pilots in the team are different - there are those who clearly make resets, there are those who -hit- (hit with FPV drones) masterfully at a moving target , feels the wind. On the day of training, we all felt the wind - the gusts knocked us off our feet, even though we were in -armor-. Usually they don't fly in this weather, but the guys said that the -Queen- will handle it. The pilot with the call sign -Skif- shot back and landed the bird near us, maneuvering between gusts of wind. As for the tactics of use, the creators of the flying RPG see it as effective in urban battles, supporting assaults and finishing off equipment. — When the drone returns, it takes less than two minutes to equip it. Taking into account the range, recharging, it's all very fast and convenient. When the situation is such that in one front room it is ours, and in the other it is ****, then it is possible to give people the opportunity to move away, take cover, sneak into the floor where the enemy has planted. Udav dreams that during drones with RPGs and assault rifles became the cover group for the assault. — Do you often come forward to shoot back when several of these are maneuvering around you? Let them hit aimlessly, but they will make them lie down. Or -rolling- goes, you stop it by various means. The equipment remains battered, but not destroyed. It takes several FPV flights to finish it off. You can spend 5 -birds-. And here such a repeated story can come in handy. When asked about criticism, -Udav- says with a smile that no development can do without it. Both a critical view and certain discussions are part of the process of improving anything. And already during constant combat use, new questions and new solutions will arise. He reminds that at the beginning of the use of FPV drones there was also a lot of criticism, and many points were changed and honed already in practical work. > — At one time, we began to waste time not because of a good life, but because we had few drones, and a lot of enemy equipment was in position. It was necessary to somehow stop them, scare them away from the infantry. In the summer of 2023, there was one position where, roughly speaking, there were 5 drones for one and a half pilots, and we were able to stop 12 pieces of equipment. Yes, we did not destroy them all. Rather, they were driven away from us by skid steers with a wheel mechanism. Not all self-propelled guns worked, but speed and skill did their job. We saved the lives of the infantrymen, - recalls -Udav-. We decided not to discuss the details of the constructive solutions, although the engineers state that absolutely everything we invent, the enemy will repeat in one way or another. — This is not a super closed technology. All components are easy to get. Both they and we have been doing this for years. The once narrow circle of amateurs and specialists has now become wide. I read their posts as much as they read ours. They have their own progress and their own troubles. Of course, there will be copying. No matter how vile the enemy, we must remember that they are not morons. They are better at scaling effective products. The same FPV. We were the first. Instead, they were filled with them at some point so that they all flew, it was clear that they did not regret it, as if from a conveyor belt. But they are less flexible than we are. This is my vision, - says -Boad-. The boys laugh - if you give them a notebook and a pen, not all of the virtuoso pilots will pass the theory easily, although they can do miracles with their hands. The unit is actively sending soldiers to pass exams for the flight VOS, so let's touch on a sore topic. In the military, there are situations when those who have been flying for more than a year have a bunch of confirmed damage to enemy equipment, awards, and the VOS is still the hundredth and the position is not related to the actual type of tasks. We regularly have to hear stories when some commanders send such specialists to -zero- as shooters. Which again raises the problem to the outside — in areas where there should be an effective system, the human factor dominates. - Everything is clear with us. The sector of responsibility is given. We are going on a reconnaissance. We choose where we can work effectively. Specialists are valued, promotion of self-improvement is maximum. For this to happen, there must be healthy vertical communication, the willingness of staff officers to learn the art of war, and we have been lucky with that. Well, the backbone of the unit is volunteers from February 2022, motivated. It happened differently, but we made our way to it, - the fighters say about their work. - We are open to other divisions to share experiences, we are interested in seeing this develop. Maybe someone will come up with something else. Maybe better. We will only be glad, - adds -Boa-. Photo of the author

Title: Our drones hit enemy self-propelled guns at a distance of 24 kilometers from the front line
Description: The video was released on September 20 on the regiment's channel. In addition to self-propelled guns, the Grad MLRS, several armored combat vehicles, a howitzer and a truck were also destroyed. -Dusk and night are ideal times for surprise strikes. Our Nemesis drone crew arrived at the deployment point and began their hunt. The target was determined, and in a few minutes the enemy equipment was destroyed. Technology and the professionalism of people is a combination that brings results. We continue to ruthlessly destroy the occupier, liberating our land step by step,- the regiment commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform: Russian armored vehicles were burned, enemy cars were blown to pieces, and the occupying infantry was destroyed - distinguished fighters of the 14th regiment of unmanned aviation complexes.

Title: They destroyed a tank and a lot of infantry — the paratroopers beat the enemy in the teeth in Donets...
Description: The video of the fight was released on September 20 on the brigade's channel. Losses of enemy personnel in the area of ​​responsibility of the brigade in just one day amounted to 22 killed and 49 wounded. The Czechoslovaks also destroyed an enemy tank that was hiding behind a high-rise building. It is clear to the naked eye that neither the equipment nor its crew will ever be harmed. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 25th Sicheslav Airborne Brigade hit the enemy self-propelled gun -Pion- in the Pokrovsky direction.

Title: They were surprised - two occupiers disguised themselves as a pile of shit and tried to attack
Description: The video appeared on September 20 on the brigade channel. It shows how two occupiers crawled under the camouflage net, took with them a EW and in this form crawled across the field to our positions. As long as our pilots were able to suppress their surprise and laughter, the Russians were able to get very close, but the disappointing end of their plan was the hit of the reset. After that, the invaders went about their usual business: they died long and painfully. -They adapt, trick, try their best, but everything fails. Is it a robot? Dog? Or maybe a saboteur? No! This is a Russian occupier!-, the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, gas -into the floor- and a 55-ton Leopard 2A4 tank of the 33rd Mechanized Brigade flies into the water and quickly crosses the river, moving to opposite shore

Title: More than a thousand shots and each one hit the target - the story of a locksmith who became a gunsm...
Description: The report about the soldier was released on September 20 on the Airborne Assault Forces channel of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -These were fierce battles, the Russian infantry, under the cover of a tank, started moving towards our units. I was brought up. Shot. Then another one. The first was stopped, the second was completely destroyed. When I looked at my calculations, it turned out that that shot was the anniversary, the thousandth shot,- Mudryi said. According to him, he has been counting the number of his shots since the beginning of his service. At first I wanted to count only effective ones, but then it turned out that the professionalism of the crew allows almost every shot to be effective. -I am a contractor. He deliberately joined the army in 2021. I passed the basic general military training, special training, coordination, and I met the -big war- trained and with a fully formed team that knew what to do. That is why my crew has thousands of tons of burned Russian iron and a considerable amount of enemy infantry,- Mudry assured. Before serving in the Armed Forces, he worked as a locksmith at one of the Zaporizhzhia factories. -If I hadn't left in 2021, I would certainly have joined the ranks of the Armed Forces in 2024. I don't understand why men sit at home and watch how p..ors (Russians of Putin's orientation, - ed.) destroy everything in their path, how they kill people are mocked. This is not the norm. This needs to be countered and countered as a group. Now part of my native Zaporizhzhia region is under occupation, so I understand very well why and for whom I am here now,- Mudryi said. His parents are waiting for him at home. The elder brother, as well as Mudry, is in the ranks of the 25th brigade. And almost all friends and relatives. There are no dodgers among relatives. -And for those who are hiding, who are trying to overstay, and especially for those who are -not my war-, I want to explain! Realize that there is a war in the country. You will either voluntarily join the army, or you will wake up one morning as Russian slaves. For now, you have this choice — to stand side by side with us and drive the enemy beyond the borders of our country. So don't wait! Join in!-, urged the Wise. As reported by ArmyInform, the Phantom fighter in his first battle /->knocked out the enemy's APC.

Title: -Everything burned, nothing survived!- — the first reviews of Russians on the work of our dragon dro...
Description: The first video recordings of the consequences of the operation of dragon drones from the Russian side appeared on September 20. Stunned invaders walk through the remains of their fortifications and find that nothing is left after the fire. Even the dugouts collapsed. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the -Sharp Cartuze- attack UAV unit of the National Guard of Ukraine launched a drone with a thermal charge at the enemy's position near the village of Liptsi.

Title: Collapse without a chance - an armored column of the occupiers was destroyed in Kharkiv Oblast
Description: The video appeared on September 20 on the brigade channel. The occupiers tried to attack in a convoy, but the accurate hits of drones and artillery forced the armor to stop the movement. In an open area, the fighters of the 3rd assault unit carried out control attacks and finally dismantled the column. The fighters of the Primus unit from the 1st assault unit, Revenge group from the 1st mechanized unit, Fatum from the anti-tank battalions, as well as the unmanned systems battalion, the self-propelled artillery division and the brigade artillery division took part in the destruction of the Russians. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy column moving towards the Ukrainian positions was spotted in time by the pilots of the 3rd Assault Brigade, whose units immediately began liquidation of the occupiers.

Title: Burned for treason — a fireman who started working for the occupiers received 15 years
Description: The State Bureau of Investigation reported this on September 20. Its employees continue the systematic work of exposing and bringing to justice traitors and collaborators who voluntarily cooperated with the occupiers after the Russian full-scale invasion of Ukraine. This week, according to the materials of the SBI, the court sentenced two traitors. Also, the Bureau sent charges against 14 defectors to the court, 4 more persons were notified of suspicion. A former employee of the law enforcement agency from Kupyansk, Kharkiv region, received 13 years of imprisonment with confiscation of property. The former commander of the anti-aircraft missile and artillery division of the military unit from Crimea faces up to 15 years in prison. As reported by ArmyInform, a demobilized conscript of the Armed Forces of Ukraine was detained, who -na-rozvidku-rf/->worked for military intelligence of the Russian Federation.

Title: The Office of Defense Innovations of the EU - Rustem Umyerov - was opened in Ukraine
Description: About this the head of the defense department announced on his Facebook page. -This is a new stage in our relations with the European Union in the field of defense technologies,- Rustem Umyerov emphasized. The main focus of this cooperation is to combine efforts to strengthen defense capabilities. Special attention is paid to joint developments in the field of IT and weapons production, which will be decisive for defeating Russian aggression. Strengthening the technological capabilities of Ukraine, the IT coalition has already attracted more than 70 million euros from 13 participating countries, creating a secure IT infrastructure for the Defense Forces. -Our drone coalition, which includes 16 participating countries, has provided more than 500 million euros in funding and transferred thousands of drones to Ukraine,- Rustem Umyerov said. The minister emphasized that over the past 2.5 years, Ukraine has rapidly become a world leader in drone technology. Today, more than 500 Ukrainian drone manufacturers and thousands of developers create advanced solutions for combat operations. With an annual production capacity of up to 3 million drones, Ukraine has established itself as a real defense and technical center. -Our country has a huge potential in defense technologies, and I urge European partners to invest in Ukrainian manufacturers. Together, we can significantly strengthen the defense capability not only of Ukraine, but also of the whole of Europe. Our main goals are the restoration of peace and stability on the continent, as well as ensuring the future of Ukraine as a full member of the EU,- the Minister of Defense emphasized.

Title: The Akhmat subdivision was transferred to Kharkiv Oblast: what does this indicate?
Description: About this on the broadcast of the -Suspilne Novosti- marathon told the commander of the battalion of shock air defense systems -Achilles- of the 92nd separate assault Captain Yury Fedorenko of the brigade named after Ivan Sirk, the basket captain. — On the Kharkiv section, the enemy transferred units such as -Ahmat-. When does -ahmat- come? -Akhmat- comes in when it is necessary to put everyone — cooks, technicians, and so on — into service in the Russian occupation forces, he said. The military explained that the -Akhmatians- have the actual permission and ability to take any action against servicemen of all other units of the Russian occupation forces with the aim of forcing them to unquestioningly obey all command orders, no matter how absurd or dangerous they may be. - They impose discipline, punish physically, send them into battle in case of non-fulfillment of tasks and end the life of the Russian occupier by firing squad, can beat them with sticks and many other things, - Yuriy Fedorenko explained. He emphasized that this shows that the enemy does not give up its initial intentions and will try to complete the task at any cost. -If we talk about Hlyboke, this is the maximum approach to the administrative borders of the city of Kharkiv, and accordingly, in one way or another, they will increase the ability to conduct shock and assault operations with the aim of advancing to the city of Kharkiv itself,- said the Achilles commander. The plans of the occupiers in Vovchansk also remain unchanged - they consist in the complete capture of the ruins of the city, which was practically wiped off the face of the earth by enemy artillery and aviation. — On the Kupyan section, the enemy is more active, they use a significant amount of manpower and equipment. Aviation with guided air bombs is used very intensively, the officer said. Here the enemy rushes to the left bank of the Oskil River. — It is fundamentally important for them to occupy a bridgehead there with its further expansion and, as a result, the occupation of the Left Bank of Kupyanshchyna. But at the moment, the Defense Forces managed to significantly stop the advance of the enemy, Yuriy Fedorenko said. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the enemy dropped an aerial bomb on Kup. Yanshchyna: two people died.

Title: In Toretsk, our drones filmed the stupid death of the Russian Spider-Man
Description: The unicum video was released on September 20 on the battalion channel. The invader climbed the balconies damaged by shelling, and then broke off and flew down. Having flown several floors, he clung to the ground and thus made the work of our pilots easier. -The Russian Vanka, like the entire population of Mordor, was often chased by intelligent thoughts, but he turned out to be faster than them,- the battalion jokingly commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 425th assault battalion -Skala- conducted an interrogation of a prisoner, who turned out to be a citizen of Ukraine who had embarked on the path of treason.

Title: DOT-Chain reduces more than 30,000 documents in the Armed Forces every week
Description: About this reported on September 20 by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Thanks to digitization, the process of ordering food for military units has become much easier — the need for about 30,000 paper applications every week has disappeared. The system also makes it possible to reduce the operational burden on the military. Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov noted that the introduction of the DOT-Chain system reduces paper bureaucracy, ensures transparency and efficiency in the processes of supplying rear property. -Digitalization is a key element in our strategy for efficient use of public funds. The MOU Partner portal allows you to attract new suppliers more efficiently and without unnecessary difficulties, which significantly increases the quality of purchases. These steps help us better respond to the needs of the Armed Forces and optimize resource management,- stressed Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. Currently, DOT-Chain covers the entire process of food supply — from submitting product applications to issuing invoices. In addition to military units, the system is also actively used by suppliers who can use their personal accounts: -Now we are also working on enabling the military to use the system through a smartphone. And in the future - to upload acts on low-quality products. We will also add the reports of inspections conducted by the DOT. The military and suppliers will be able to familiarize themselves with them. Such an approach will increase the transparency and accountability of the process, as well as have a qualitative impact on its effectiveness,- noted Alyona Zhuzha, IT adviser of the DOT. ArmyInform reported how useful new DOT-Chain system and how to use it.

Title: A heavy downpour dumped - washed away - the mortar positions of the occupiers in Donetsk region
Description: The video was published on Telegram channel 5 OSHBr On the southeastern outskirts of Bakhmut near the village of Ivanovske, the enemy set up mortar positions from which they fired at the positions of the Defense Forces. The successful operation made it possible to destroy the mortar, as well as the shelters and dugouts of the enemy. -The investigation revealed one of these positions, as well as the shelter of the settlement. As a result of the interaction of the attack UAV and aerial reconnaissance units of the 5th separate Kyiv assault brigade, the enemy's mortar, its settlement and shelter were destroyed. Damage was also inflicted on the enemy's position in the area of ​​the settlement of Ivanovske, enemy infantry and enemy fortifications were destroyed,- the communications department of the 5th separate assault brigade told ArmyInform. Previously ArmyInform showed a dramedy about the life and death of Russian tanks in three acts.

Title: Protection of energy and missile production — the President held a Stavka
Description: The President announced this on the evening of September 20. -The first is the protection of energy this winter. All the main representatives of the industry were there. Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal, Minister of Energy Herman Galushchenko reported. We reviewed the state of the engineering protection of the objects, the schedule for the completion of fortifications, the placement of electronic defense systems and air defense systems, in particular, taking into account the Patriot systems that we expect in the near future,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi. According to him, the second issue was own production of missiles, drones and electronic warfare equipment. Speeches by Deputy Prime Minister Mykhailo Fedorov, Minister of Defense Rustem Umyerov, and Minister of Foreign Affairs Andrii Sybiga were heard at Stavka. Decisions were considered that would enable our industry to realize its potential to the maximum: long-term contracts from the state and attraction of foreign investments. The situation at the front was also heard at Stavka. The reports were made by the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces, General Oleksandr Syrskyi, who talked about all the main directions. Kyrylo Budanov from GUR MOU and Oleg Ivashchenko from SZR reported to the heads of intelligence. As reported by ArmyInform, Volodymyr Zelensky met with Ursula von der Lyayen.

Title: The enemy dropped an aerial bomb on the Kupyan region: two people were killed
Description: reported this by the head of the Investigative Department of the GUNP in Serhiy Bolvinov of the Kharkiv region. A kindergarten, shops, the building of the utility company and the volunteer fire brigade were damaged. One of the stores was completely destroyed, a 53-year-old woman who worked as a saleswoman died there. Together with her, a 43-year-old buyer was fatally wounded. Two more women were injured in the shelling. According to explosives experts, the Russian military dropped a FAB-250 from UMPK on Kivsharivka. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the enemy hit Kharkiv with anti-aircraft missiles: three people were injured.

Title: The fund will be - our defenders captured the Russians
Description: The video of the battle was released on September 20 on the battalion channel. During the landing battle, our fighters surrounded the Russians, as they decided to surrender and thereby saved their lives. -Every enemy in our hands is another chance to bring home our heroes. We continue to fight until complete victory!-, the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 60th mechanized Ingulets brigade showed a complex repelling the Russian armored assault of their positions.

Title: The enemy hit Kharkov with anti-aircraft guns: three people were injured
Description: This was reported by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. Corrected KAB-250 air bombs from the UMPK were dropped by the Russian military from the Su-34 aircraft in the area of ​​the city of Belgorod, Russian Federation. As a result of an enemy airstrike, three civilians were injured, who received shrapnel injuries of moderate severity and are now in the hospital. Law enforcement officers entered information about another shelling of the city into the Unified Register of Pretrial Investigations under Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine, i.e. violation of the laws and customs of war. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the enemy has strengthened shelling the Kupyan region: four people were injured in the Kharkiv region.

Title: The Ministry of Defense said how many volunteers are recruited to the army per month
Description: About this reported on September 20 by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. More than 10 thousand vacancies are available for citizens, including cooks, repairmen, lawyers, UAV operators, doctors and others. You can be recruited to all Defense Forces, including the Armed Forces, the National Guard of Ukraine, the Security Service of Ukraine, the State Border Service of Ukraine and others. Summons will not be distributed in and around the Center - this is expressly prohibited by regulatory documents. You can get all the necessary information at the address: str. Baidy Vyshnevetskoho, 36. You can also consult and ask all the necessary questions by phone +38 (063) 048 94 93, or by writing to the email address: recrut.ck@ukr.net. As ArmiyaInform reported, the audience of the Rezerv+ application reached almost 3.5 million users.

Title: Two-legged, four-wheeled, stationary: peaceful Ukrainians destroy everything hostile in any form
Description: The video of another achievements of the guards was made public on the brigade's channel on September 20. -We, Ukrainians, are extremely peaceful. Therefore, we are doing everything so that there is nothing hostile to people on our land: neither technology, nor other creatures (which you can't even call people),- Ukrainian soldiers said in a comment. And they added that FPV drones are a great help in this matter. Earlier, ArmyInform showed dramedy of the life and death of Russian tanks in three acts: -Going, burning, burned-.

Title: 400,000 hryvnias of baseless combat — the head of the rear is suspected of abuse
Description: This was reported by the Special Prosecutor's Office of the Eastern Region on September 20. The investigation established that the 56-year-old major, understanding the scope of power and his official powers, developed a plan to seize the financial support of servicemen for participating in combat operations on the front line, while at the same time being at the point of permanent deployment of the military unit. In order to implement the criminal intent, he involved two servicemen of his unit, who in January and February 2024 were included in the lists of payment of additional compensation in the amount of UAH 100,000. 400,000 hryvnias were unjustifiably paid to the specified servicemen. Part of the funds from the said payments in the amount of UAH 85,000 was transferred to the suspect at his request. As reported by ArmyInform, a platoon commander was detained in Lviv Oblast material support, which traded in state fuel.

Title: He took dollars and hryvnias — the organizer of the evasioners was arrested in Ternopil Oblast
Description: This was reported on September 20 by the special prosecutor's office of the Western region. The suspect also promised to help avoid criminal liability for draft evasion. In order to implement illegal plans, the suspect had to influence the employees of the district police department and TCC. He estimated his services at almost 6 thousand US dollars and 23 thousand hryvnias. During the receipt of $500 of the second part of the stipulated amount of funds, the suspect was detained in accordance with Art. 208 of the CPC of Ukraine. The day before, he received an advance of $5,500. At present, the prosecutors have submitted to the court a request to choose a preventive measure against him. The involvement of other persons in the crime is being checked. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces or recruiting centers.

Title: The reforms of the Ministry of Defense are aimed at providing the soldier with what is necessary for...
Description: The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine reported this on September 20. The working group acts as a -one-stop shop- for communication with donors who support the reforms of the Department of Defense. Representatives of the Ministry of Defense presented progress in the areas of reforming the internal management system, corporate management of state-owned enterprises and infrastructure, digitalization, drone and IT coalitions, procurement, corruption prevention, military medicine and recruiting for the defense forces. Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Stanislav Hayder, who presided over the event, thanked foreign partners for the assistance provided. -All our activities are focused on providing the soldier with what is necessary to defeat the enemy through institutional changes. I would like to note that the Council of Donors is one of the effective mechanisms — a source of verification of the needs of the Ministry of Defense, which our allies can help meet. We offer partners to become part of our quality changes,- Stanislav Heyder said. Deputy Minister of Defense for Digital Development Kateryna Chernogorenko informed about the development of the field of digital transformation, in particular in cooperation with the participating countries of the IT Coalition and the Drone Coalition. -Thanks to the close cooperation of the team of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine and the Council of Donors, we launched a number of important initiatives. They will reduce the burden on the military, optimize processes in the field of defense, and also help in the development of technological innovations that give us an asymmetric advantage on the battlefield. We are especially grateful to our partners for their constant support within the IT coalition and the coalition of drones created in the Ramstein format, which daily accumulate international resources for the needs of the Armed Forces,- Kateryna Chernogorenko emphasized. The working group of the Council of Donors on Institutional Reforms was established in May 2024. It meets quarterly. Separate meetings are held on topics that have aroused interest from partners. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense created the Council of Donors institutional reforms.

Title: A marine with a leg amputee set a new Ukrainian record
Description: This was reported by the Army's own correspondent, Inform, on September 20. The maximum time of standing on one leg with additional weight among amputees was 8 minutes and 9 seconds. 46-year-old Dmytro, a serviceman of the 36th Marine Brigade under Rear Admiral Mykhailo Bilinskyi. He fought in the Zaporozhye direction, near the city of Vasylivka, as well as in the Donetsk, Kherson and Kharkiv directions. During the battle in the Kharkiv region, he was seriously wounded in the leg by stepping on a mine. However, the injury did not stop him: he refused offers to undergo rehabilitation abroad and immediately after receiving the prosthesis returned to the front to his comrades. For his services to Ukraine, Dmytro was awarded the Order -For Courage- of the 3rd degree. Despite the severe amputation of part of his leg, the marine continues to perform tasks in the hottest areas of the front. By the way, as it became known, the man is the first marine in the last 10 years to set a national record, arriving directly from the front line. -I am here to demonstrate the strength of spirit and indomitability of Ukrainian soldiers. This record shows that even in the most difficult trials, marines remain faithful to their oath and are ready to defend their Motherland,- said Dmytro. The very procedure of establishing the national record of Ukraine took place during the presentation of the exhibition -Unbreakable for the sake of peace: Faithful Always!-, which is dedicated to the International Day of Peace. This exhibition reflects not only the resilience and courage of marines of Ukraine, but also the importance of the values ​​of peace, justice and human dignity. The project also emphasizes the importance of inclusion and demonstrates that people with different physical abilities can be active and worthy members of society. This exhibition was a continuation of the photo project -2024 Martial Arts Photo Contest-, created for UNESCO by social photographer Iva-Karyna Zaiko, who was the initiator and coordinator of the project. The photographer was Roman Cheghrynets. The project was supported by the command of the Marine Corps of the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the -Loyal Always!- charity fund. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukrainian marines ran London Marathon to raise funds for prosthetics.

Title: Destroyed warehouse with one drop, night hunt for Russians: stream from a front-line city
Description: The enemy made another assault attempt on the position of the 60th mechanized brigade. Immediately, our fighters disabled the enemy BMP using the FPV drone. A Russian tank that tried to break through was also damaged by drones and eventually exploded on mines and burned to the ground. The Wild Division fighters showed a video of two Russians running away from the battlefield. It is very strange, but for some reason our drones turned out to be faster than the enemy runners, so the invaders were left lying in our land torn apart. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - junior lieutenant Serhiy Lipko and junior sergeant Volodymyr Kravchuk.

Title: Spy adventures of a deserter: the world caught him, caught him and sent him to prison for 16 years
Description: This was reported by the Security Service of Ukraine. SBU employees detained a Russian agent in March 2023. The extra was a 29-year-old former contractor of one of the military units of Ukraine, who on the first day of the full-scale war ran away from his place of service and hid in the front-line territory of the Donetsk region. Later, an FSB staff member approached him remotely and offered cooperation in exchange for money. In order not to -light up- during the execution of enemy missions, the agent -darkly- involved his acquaintance in collecting information about the places of temporary bases and the routes of movement of the Defense Forces. -The enemy was most interested in the approximate coordinates of the firing positions of the barrel and jet artillery of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, which kept under fire control the assault groups of the invaders attacking Bakhmut. The agent also sought out information about the consequences of enemy shelling on the territory of the district. To communicate with the Russian special service, the person involved used an anonymous chat in a popular messenger. In addition to text messages, he transmitted information in the form of voice messages,- the law enforcement officers said. During the arrest, the traitor was seized with 5 mobile phones and a laptop with evidence of intelligence and subversive activities in favor of the Russian Federation. According to the investigation materials of the Security Service, the court found the intruder guilty under two articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: Part 4 of Art. 408 (desertion committed under martial law); Part 2 of Art. 111 (treason committed under martial law). Taking into account the outstanding criminal record for illegal possession of weapons, he was sentenced to 16 years in prison. As reported by ArmyInform, demobilized conscript of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, who worked for military intelligence of the Russian Federation, was detained.

Title: The trawls did not help - the enemy's tank attack was drowned in fire
Description: The video of the battle appeared on September 20 on the brigade channel. Enemy tanks, some of which were equipped with anti-mine trawls, tried to reach our positions, but were stopped by drones and artillery. -In addition to the infantry, the enemy used heavy equipment, attacked the entire area of ​​responsibility of the 63rd brigade. But thanks to the resilience of our infantry, skilful reconnaissance work, strike drones of the unmanned systems battalion, accurate artillery fire and the support of our brothers from the 60th brigade, the Russian attack was repulsed,- the 63rd brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 63rd separate mechanized brigade noticed a group of Russian invaders near the forest strip, and then the occupiers struck a drone.

Title: She served the occupiers so well that they raised her salary: the accomplice of the enemy was convic...
Description: This was reported by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. During the occupation, the former senior inspector of the personnel support sector of the Kupyansk RVP of the National Security Service of Ukraine in Kharkiv region decided to work for the enemy on her own initiative. The woman voluntarily assumed the position of -and. at. inspector of the department for work with personnel- in the so-called -Investigator of the VGA of the Kharkiv Region-. For a month of work for the Russian invaders, the ex-policewoman received 43,000 Russian rubles. The following month, the occupiers even raised her salary by 2,000 rubles. Subsequently, the accused changed her -profile- and became -senior operational officer of the criminal investigation group of Police Station No. 2 (dislocation of Shevchenkivo village).- Before the counteroffensive of the Armed Forces, the female collaborator fled to the territory of the Russian Federation. Since the convict is still hiding from Ukrainian justice, the term of her sentence will begin to be calculated from the moment of her actual detention. As long as she avoids serving the sentence imposed on her by court verdict, the statute of limitations is suspended. The period for an appeal continues. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that ->in Kharkiv region, a man who became the -director- of a school during the occupation of the village was convicted.

Title: Ukraine unblocked the Black Sea and saved the world from starvation
Description: About this on September 20 on the broadcast of the marathon -Edyny Novyny- the spokesman of the Navy told of Ukraine, captain of the third rank Dmytro Pletenchuk. -Ukraine remains an important international player, including in the issue of ensuring food security. This is quite a serious issue, it can be underestimated. But it should be understood that there are serious problems related to hunger and instability in the countries. If these issues are not resolved, they will have consequences for Europe and beyond,- said Dmytro Pletenchuk. Despite the difficult situation at the front, Ukraine continues to participate in the process of protecting the world's food security. And the clearest example of that is the grain maritime corridor in the Black Sea. -We directly ensure the security of this corridor. As you can see, we succeed. We can talk about 70 million tons of cargo. This is already quite a serious number and we will continue to work on this issue,- stated the spokesperson of the Navy of Ukraine. Earlier, ArmyInform quoted the words of the spokesman of the Navy of Ukraine Dmytro Pletenchuk about teyakokupants turned into a scientific district of the Kinburn spit.

Title: With a flash of dangerous -lightning-: enemy drones were shot down by border guards
Description: Border guards shared photos of the wreckage of destroyed enemy UAVs on the brigade's channel. -The other day, fire teams of the Gart brigade did not let four enemy -birds- - a copter, two FPVs and a Lightning type - do their dirty work,- they wrote. Border guards noted that the -lightning bolt- is a particularly valuable trophy, as this jet-attack UAV is more dangerous than conventional kamikaze drones due to its high speed and longer flight range. Previously, ArmyInform showed what it looks like now has Zmiiny Island, a Ukrainian outpost in the Black Sea.

Title: The Danish money for production - Bogdan - went to the Ministry of Defense - Rustem Umyerov
Description: The department reported this on September 20. -This is an important step for strengthening our defense capability, because Denmark has allocated a total of €50 million for the production of 18 of the latest artillery and, most importantly, Ukrainian self-propelled guns -Bohdan-. The example of Denmark is a signal to all our partners about the importance of investing in the Ukrainian defense industry. Thank you to Denmark for the support and consistency,- said the Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umyerov. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense commented on the increase of defense spending by the Verkhovna Rada in 2024 by 495.3 billion hryvnias.

Title: Defense support, energy, frozen assets of the Russian Federation: Volodymyr Zelenskyi met with Ursul...
Description: This is stated in the message at website of the head of state. -Today's negotiations were as meaningful as possible. The priorities are obvious — the defense of Ukraine. Our positions, our soldiers, completely fair pressure on Russia for the war. Support for our stability — Ukraine and the whole of Europe. A particularly urgent issue now, before winter, is energy, protection and restoration of our infrastructure,- the President said. Volodymyr Zelenskyi and Ursula von der Leyen discussed in detail the support of the Ukrainian energy industry: needs, necessary resources and strengthening the protection of critical facilities. Separately, the President noted the decision announced the day before on additional support from the EU to prepare for winter in the amount of about 160 million euros, of which 100 million are from revenues from frozen Russian assets. The head of state emphasized that the full use of frozen Russian assets is necessary to protect Ukraine from Russian aggression, a clear mechanism for allocating those $50 billion for which there is agreement and a general decision at the political level, as well as strengthening sanctions against the aggressor state. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also noted joint work for the full implementation of the Peace Formula. According to him, it is necessary to strengthen Ukraine as much as possible in order to hold the second Peace Summit already this year. The leaders paid special attention to Ukraine's accession to the EU. -Our teams will work to speed up the process of such important negotiations for us,- added the President. Ursula von der Leyen noted that the European Commission has developed a plan to support the Ukrainian energy industry in the winter period. It provides for the restoration of 2.5 GW of energy capacity, as well as the continuation of Ukraine's accession to the European energy network. In addition, the EU plans to export 2 GW of electricity to Ukraine and ensure stable energy supply in all regions. Thanks to this, it will be possible to cover more than 25% of energy needs in winter. -Now we ship mobile gas turbines, solar panels. We also discussed issues related to the protection of power plants,- she said. The European Commission has also adopted proposals that will enable the EU to provide Ukraine with a loan of up to 35 billion euros from the aid package agreed upon by the Group of Seven. -It is very important that this loan will be transferred directly to your state budget. This will improve Ukraine's macro-financial stability and provide you with significant fiscal support. You will decide how best to use these funds,- said Ursula von der Leyen.

Title: Ukrainian outpost in the Black Sea: what the Snake Island looks like now
Description: This was reported to the DPSU. In particular, our units prevent enemy aircraft and warships from approaching the Ukrainian coast. -Today, Snake Island is a real outpost in the Black Sea,- — the message says. Recently, Russian Tu-22M3 long-range bombers released four Kh-22 cruise missiles in the area of ​​Zmiiny Island. As you know, on June 30, 2022, the Command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported that the occupier had left Zmiiny Island. Then the special forces of the CSO -A- of the SBU, together with their combat comrades from the GUR MOU and the ZSU carried out a unique and extremely important operation.

Title: He was attacking - he survived several hits, he was running - he ran into mines. History of the enem...
Description: The video appeared on September 20 on the brigade channel. The enemy attacked with the support of BMP and a tank. With an accurate hit of the FPV drone, the pilots disabled the enemy BMP and the tank that was trying to break through. He was hit numerous times by FPV drones, after which he decided to retreat. During the escape, the tank ran into mines and stopped. Only after that he was finished off by another FPV drone strike. -Another attempt by the enemy failed thanks to the skill of our defenders!-, the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 60th mechanized Ingulets brigade destroyed a Russian tank that was firing at their positions.

Title: The first group of Ukrainian pilots completed their training in France
Description: This is stated in the message of the French Armed Forces on the social network H. Ukrainian pilots from In March 2024, they were trained in France. It was previously reported that modified Alphajet aircraft transferred by Belgium are used for flight training of pilots, which are equipped with an instrument panel that imitates the one in the F-16 fighters. There are no F-16 fighters at the air base in France, for which Ukrainian pilots are being trained. Therefore, after completing the training, Ukrainian pilots will go to the training center in Romania.

Title: Corruption is afraid of your control: how to influence the transparency of government decisions
The occupiers no longer live there — a first-person account of a house in Toretsk
Description: The video appeared on September 20 on the brigade's channel. The enemy captured one of the houses on the outskirts of Toretsk and opened fire on our soldiers. The fighters of -Eneyu- responded powerfully and explosively. As reported by ArmyInform, the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces in Donetsk region visited assault brigade -Lyut-

Title: The Kadyriv commander was convicted of brutal treatment of civilians during the occupation of Kyiv r...
Description: This was reported by the Office of the Prosecutor General. The verdict of the Borodyansky district court of the Kyiv region sentenced the commander of the unified detachment of -Kadyrivtsi- to 11 years of imprisonment. Prosecutors proved in court that the convicted person participated in the attack of the aggressor state on Kyiv in February-March 2022. During the occupation of a part of the Kyiv region, together with his subordinate unit, he attacked a civilian object — the Borodyansky psychoneurological boarding school with a geriatric department. The civilian population was there, including the elderly, people with disabilities who need constant care. After searching the premises of the boarding school and making sure that there were no Ukrainian soldiers, the convict forced the director of the boarding school at gunpoint to give a videotaped testimony of gratitude to the President of the Russian Federation for the alleged release from the Nazi regime. Under the threat of death, the commander of the -Kadyrivets- forbade civilians to leave the premises of the boarding school. At the same time, contrary to the requirements of international humanitarian law, he did not take any measures to provide the civilian population of the medical facility with food, water, medicine, and heating equipment. Because of this, several wards of the boarding school died. In addition, after forbidding the staff and patients to leave the premises of the boarding school, the convict used civilians as human shields, since combat equipment was placed near the institution - the BM-21 -Grad- rocket salvo fire system, a self-propelled artillery installation, from which fire damage was carried out on the positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The trial was conducted according to the rules of special court proceedings.

Title: Servicemen were banned from using Telegram on official devices - NSDC
Description: This is stated in a message on the Facebook page of the National Security and Defense Council. . On September 19, a meeting of the National Coordination Center for Cyber ​​Security (NCCC), a key coordination and control body in the field of cyber security, took place. The meeting was attended by representatives of the leadership of the State Service for Special Communications and Information Protection of Ukraine, the National Police of Ukraine, the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the Security Service of Ukraine, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, the National Bank of Ukraine, the Ministry of Digital Transformation of Ukraine, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine, intelligence agencies, management of regulatory bodies in the field of electronic communications, as well as people's deputies of Ukraine. The key topic of the meeting was the discussion of threats to national security associated with the use of the Telegram messenger, especially during the Russian Federation's full-scale war against Ukraine. Kyrylo Budanov, head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs and Communications of Ukraine, cited substantiated data regarding the availability of Russian special services to the personal correspondence of Telegram users, even deleted messages, as well as their personal data. -I have always stood up and stand up for freedom of speech, but the issue of Telegram is not a matter of freedom of speech, it is a matter of national security,- he stressed. Representatives of the Security Service of Ukraine and the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine noted that Telegram is actively used by the enemy for cyber attacks, the distribution of phishing and malicious software, establishing the geolocation of users, correcting missile strikes, etc. In order to minimize these threats, a decision was made to ban the installation and use of Telegram on the official devices of employees of state authorities, military personnel, employees of the security and defense sector, as well as enterprises — operators of critical infrastructure. An exception will be only those persons for whom the use of this messenger is part of official duties. The decision concerns only correspondence and forwarding of documents via messenger.

Title: A collaborator who became a school director during the occupation of a village in the Kharkiv region...
Description: This was reported by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. He was sentenced to imprisonment for a term of 1 year and 6 months with deprivation of the right to hold positions related to the performance of organizational, managerial and administrative and economic functions in educational institutions for a term of 10 years. Prosecutors proved that during the occupation of the village of Yurchenkove, Chuguyiv district, a local resident voluntarily cooperated with the enemy. In the settlement, the occupiers -created- the educational institution -State budget organization -Yurchenkovskaya obscheobrazovatelnaya shkola I-III degrees- on the basis of the Ukrainian KZ -Yurchenkiv Lyceum of the Vovchan City Council-. The man voluntarily agreed to take the position of -director- of the school under the occupation authorities. He collected lists of teachers who agreed to go to the -advancement- courses in the city of Belgorod, Russian Federation. In addition, for the implementation of Russian standards of education in the educational institution, the -director- received from the representative of the -department of education- of the so-called -VGA Volchansky District of Kharkiv Region- methodical recommendations in electronic form regarding the organization of the educational process of primary and secondary education in accordance with Russian requirements. The occupiers also gave the -educator- Russian textbooks for children to study according to Russian educational standards, and a plan for holding parent meetings. According to the -script-, there should have been a poster or banner with Russian symbols in the audience. It was also planned to launch a -video appeal of the Minister of Education of the Russian Federation- for students and parents. The law enforcement officers exposed the collaborator. At the court hearing, he admitted his guilt and sincerely repented. The guilty verdict was handed down by the Chuguyiv city court of the Kharkiv region. The term for an appeal continues.

Title: In the South, the occupiers have minus two boats, a mortar and nine cars
Description: This is stated in message in the Telegram channel. The losses of the Russian invaders during the past day amounted to 88 people. Two boats, a mortar and nine vehicles were destroyed. An ammunition storage area, 12 dugouts, two observation posts and two firing positions were also hit. As reported by ArmyInform, the losses of the Russian army in the eastern direction on September 19 /-> made up 1149 units of personnel and 20 tanks.

Title: A man died in Kherson as a result of Russian shelling
Description: This was reported by the head of the Kherson State Administration Oleksandr Prokudin. As a result of the enemy attack, a 27-year-old man, who was on the street at the time of the shelling, received non-life-threatening injuries. In addition, today at around 10:30 a.m., the Russian military attacked a car in Kherson with a drone. As a result of dropping explosives, a 60-year-old man received an explosive injury, multiple shrapnel wounds to the head, torso, arms and legs. The victim was taken to the hospital in moderate condition. As reported by ArmyInform, on September 19, as a result of Russian shelling, three people died residents of Donetsk region: two in Chasovoy Yar and one in Kostyantynivka.

Title: They go, they burn, they are burned: a dramedy of the life and death of Russian tanks in three acts
Description: Video released on the unit's channel on September 20. -Enemy tanks were burned on the move.
