Title: Mobilized in Britain: -cloak-coat- and -dragon fire- on -forest exercises- Interflex
Description: We are camping near the lake. In the morning, fog hangs and swirls on the surface of the water. Today is the last day of the -forest- trip, and we are finally lucky - for the first time in three days, the rain subsided, and then the rain stopped. As soon as the sun rises over our -Sherwood- forest, thick steam rises from the ground, grass, trees and wet clothing. The rays burn as mercilessly as the cold rain poured down before it. Such is the climate and weather of the British Isles in the middle of the sea. For the next lesson, instructors gather at our branch on the lake shore. We wait for several minutes until the other departments come up - they are a little further, so they have to go longer. At this time, we are quizzed to find out how well we remembered the content of yesterday's lessons. I catch myself thinking that it is easier to do the task correctly than to explain how and why exactly you do it. It's not a language barrier - our translators do an excellent job. The point is in the nature of the memorization itself - it happened at the bodily level of muscle memory, so in order to realize it, it is necessary to first reproduce the sequence of actions. Some rush not to tell, but to show. Instructors do not deny that in battle you need to do, and not explain how you do it. Doing the task is better than talking about it, and the teachers are happy with the students, which is what they wanted. In the end, the whole platoon gathers on the shore and we are shown the content of the next lesson. The instructors remind once again that a good soldier must always take care of himself. Good health and physical fitness, sufficient sleep and rest, adequate nutrition and comfortable living conditions determine the combat effectiveness of personnel, and therefore the effectiveness of combat missions. The instructors note that in the rain we all got soaked. In addition, they explain, during the hostilities we will have to overcome water obstacles one way or another, which is why we were gathered on the shore of the lake. So now there will be hands-on training with elements of immersion in reality and we will be taught how to dry quickly even if we get wet even worse than we already got wet in the rain. The hint becomes more than transparent - we guess that now at least part of the lake will have to be waded along the shore. -Hell, I think, why get up an hour before the official climb and dry my uniform - I'd rather sleep.- The next thought is about where the children's clock goes - I have an ordinary office clock and in the rain it has already fogged up from the inside from excessive moisture, although the hands are still moving. Diving would leave him no chance of survival. The intrigue is intensifying, but we still haven't received an order to swim across the lake or even enter it. Realizing exactly what we are afraid of, the instructors look at each other conspiratorially and smile. I watch how the second hand crawls behind the fogged glass, and I decide to drown the watch for good. The house, the mountains and the barn burned down - we had to buy a waterproof one. I don't want to get into the water in a dry form, but I'm already mentally ready for that. Everything is resolved unexpectedly - another one of the instructors just swims up to us from the depths of the lake. For at least 20 minutes, he watched us from the cold water near the shore. Now, using his own example, he will show us how to quickly dry thoroughly soaked clothes and shoes. We will dry our already wet uniforms - there is no need to get into the lake for this. The technology of self-drying is simple - we have already described it and shown it a little earlier. In about the same way, I dried myself before waking up. However, the instructors now show and describe important details that we might not have paid enough attention to. The basic things you need for drying are a fire source and dry fuel, ours is FireDragon - -dragon fire- or -dragon fire- as you prefer. It is desirable to also have some kind of stand on which you can place a mini-fireplace, but in extreme cases, an ordinary stone or a fragment of a brick will also do. The most interesting element is the -cloak-coat-, which we just called - a poncho, a tent, a cape, and a cover. The variety of names is due to the versatility and multi-functionality of this rectangular sheet. With the help of a -cloak-coat-, you can arrange the simplest shelter - a mini-tent or a cover. You can simply cover your gear and supplies with it, or wrap yourself in it. A camouflage-colored waterproof -cloak-coat- is necessary so that no one notices you during a stop. It is able to protect both from a heavy downpour and from the scorching rays of the sun. And during drying, the -cloak-coat- helps to create a special microenvironment around the fighter dressed in thoroughly soaked clothes, in which the high temperature allows for rapid warming, and the intense evaporation - to expel moisture from the clothes. The main thing is to be careful not to burn the -cloak-coat- with -dragon fire-. But this is already a matter of vigilance and the minimum necessary skills. The instructor easily advises on this, as long as his colleague explains the best way to dry the shoes. Read also: The General Staff showed what equipment Ukrainians receive during training in Great Britain Finally, we they ask if we noticed the newcomer from the lake before they invited him out. We did not notice - under some branches hanging from the shore and natural debris, the instructor was extremely well camouflaged. Careful local camouflage will be one of our next lessons. The Interflex Intensive continues with another action-packed day.

Title: Combat Boat 90: the expert talked about the advantages of combat boats that Ukraine will receive fro...
Description: The purpose, tactical properties and combat capabilities of the SV90, as well as the likely scenarios for the use of these boats, in particular in the Azov-Black Sea region, were told to the ArmyInform correspondent by the officer of the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, retired captain 1st rank, candidate of military sciences Stepan Yakymyak. It is known that these boats are the best in their class, as evidenced by their use by many countries, including the United States. It is no secret that the so-called -great maritime power- of the Russian Federation also at one time purchased several samples of such boats from a Swedish manufacturing company and built one and a half dozen such boats. Swedish SV90 combat boats were produced in different versions and for various tasks, but during their design and creation, the main task was the rapid deployment and landing of amphibious assault groups on the coast. This is evidenced by the special bow gear, the ability to transport a relatively large number of people in a special protected room and the small draft of the boat (0.8 m), which allows a direct approach to the shore. According to Stepan Yakymyak, these boats are primarily capable of quickly and safely delivering personnel over considerable distances and covertly evacuating them. — For example, in the conditions of hostilities on rivers 2 km wide, a group of six such boats can transfer a company of paratroopers in full equipment from one bank to another within 1.5-2 minutes. In sea areas, this unit can be overturned by the same group of boats over a distance of more than 400 km in about ten hours with the mandatory condition of providing combat support for this group and support, primarily from air strikes, Stepan Yakymyak noted. Other advantages include increased maneuverability and the ability to approach directly to different types of coasts (rocky, sandy, marshy, etc.). — In addition to amphibious, assault, and special operations, combat boats of the SV90 type, if used by the Defense Forces of Ukraine, can be used to lay mines, to perform patrolling tasks, transport troops and property, and evacuate the wounded. Also, these boats can perform tasks in the protection of sea and river communications and in combat support of forces operating in river and sea areas and on the coast. In the case of operations along the sea coast and ensuring greater stealth of operations, the task of transferring several special-purpose groups to the coast controlled by the enemy can be successfully accomplished. When using such boats, it is necessary to carefully plan reconnaissance, surveillance and cover them from the air against the strikes of UAVs and enemy fighter-bomber aircraft. So, the range of tasks, taking into account the actual areas of operation of the Defense Forces of Ukraine on rivers, estuaries and the Black Sea, is actually very wide. However, as Stepan Yakymyak adds, a much larger number of such boats is needed, which is due to the scale and scope of the areas of military operations and the combat capabilities of the enemy. If their number is sufficient, they could perform up to 40-60% of the main combat tasks of the surface forces of the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine at sea and rivers. By the way, about the options for the use of these boats told the spokesman of the Navy, captain of the third rank, Dmytro Pletenchuk.

Title: Stolen icons, hanged children and a shot train: fakes about Kurshchyna, with which the Kremlin scare...
Description: In August, screenshots of ads allegedly posted on the OLX service appeared on z-channels. They depict Orthodox icons that were allegedly taken by the Ukrainian military from the Kursk region. The most common selection published by Telegram scammers includes five allegedly stolen icons. >Estonian resource provereno.media found the originals of these images. As it turned out, the icons come from Konotop, Zaporizhzhia, Kyiv, Kremenchuk and Lviv Oblast. One technical detail unites all the fake images: the top line shows the location — Kursk Oblast and Kursk. But everyone who uses the Ukrainian OLX service knows that only Ukrainian regions can be selected there. Kyiv and Kirovohrad regions, as well as Crimea (ARC) are represented on the site under the letter K. The purpose of spreading this fake is obvious — to accuse the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of looting. ArmyInform already wrote about the -reflection- tactic, which Russian propagandists actively use when talking about Kurshchyna. This is how they try to accuse Ukraine of war crimes similar to those committed by the Russians in 2022 in Buch, Mariupol, Izyum and other Ukrainian cities and villages. Recently, propagandists have been terrorizing their citizens with particularly brutal -units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine- , formed from Georgian, Polish, French and American mercenaries-, who -hanged 8 children in a barn-, or that -The command of the Armed Forces during the attack on the Kursk region ordered to shoot a passenger train.- In Ukraine and in the West, such lies no longer work, because many representatives of foreign, influential and truly independent media have already visited the occupied Armed Forces territory of the Kursk region. In their reports, foreign media persons claim that they did not see traces of -atrocities- similar to Russian prisoners, as well as to civilians — that is why Moscow is so nervous about uncontrolled mass media in a territory it does not control. In addition, it was the Kremlin that refused to provide a humanitarian corridor for the evacuation of civilians from the territory of Kurshchyna, which is controlled by the Armed Forces of Ukraine. That's why many questions about Putin and his managerial vertical arise already in Russia itself. After all, the Kremlin dictator uses Russian citizens in the war only as consumables.

Title: Volodymyr Zelenskyy told the details of Ukraine's victory plan
Description: The head of state told about this in interview CNN. -I will personally speak with Joe Biden before the Peace Summit about how to strengthen us so that we are in a strong position. Because diplomatic solutions are good if you are strong. Otherwise, Putin will not even participate in this. And I think that under other circumstances they would not be interested in stopping the war,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy said. The President noted that victory for Ukraine means being very strong and being ready for strong diplomacy. -And that is why I have prepared several points. Four of them are the main points. Plus one that we need after the war. I will share them with President Biden. It is about security, geopolitical location of Ukraine, very strong military support of Ukraine. And about the fact that we should freely decide how to use this or that thing. We are talking about decisions on economic support,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy said. He added that he is ready to accept proposals for this plan from Joe Biden's team if they strengthen the peace plan and Ukraine's position. -I think it will be fair and proper to share this plan with both candidates for the presidency of the United States - Kamala Harris and Donald Trump. And a lot also depends on the decisions of the US Congress, so we would like to share with Congress as well. After these steps, we are ready to share the plan with everyone,- said the President of Ukraine. Earlier, Volodymyr Zelenskyy said that Ukraine is asking the United States to grant permission to use long-range weapons to attack Russian airfields, but not received it yet.

Title: Vovchansk is under fire control: the occupiers are hiding in the woods
Description: A military man with the call sign -Stig- told about this on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyny- - officer of the 2nd separate detachment of the Special Purpose Center -OMEGA- of the National Guard of Ukraine. — The city is almost completely destroyed, there is not a single whole building. We are right now in the suburbs of Vovchansk, so I can confidently tell you that there is not a single whole building in the city, he said. The degree of destruction of Vovchansk is catastrophic - the battles are taking place right in the urban development. — The city is completely under fire control both from the enemy's side and from our side. Right now, an artillery duel is going on, the city is being covered by enemy artillery, our artillery is working, our strike drones are working, the military said. The occupiers do not stop trying to advance and gain a foothold in the city ruins. — The enemy is trying to advance with reconnaissance groups, small infantry groups to some new positions. However, it faces resistance from the Security and Defense Forces and loses its offensive potential. But he will not stop trying to move forward through the city, the officer said. At the same time, the occupiers cannot set up positions in the city, so they mostly entrench themselves in the surrounding forests. - They try to hide mostly in the forests. Very good vegetation here, very good terrain from the point of view of shelters. Therefore, most of them hide in dense forests. -Unfortunately, this is a problem, because even in winter, if it is a coniferous forest, it is very difficult to recognize and hit the enemy,- explained the Ukrainian drone commander. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Vovchansk, the occupiers are resorting to single infiltration tactics , and fights in the city take place just inside high-rise buildings a>.

Title: The key to reducing the number of KAB strikes is the destruction of enemy reconnaissance UAVs
Description: A military man with the call sign -Stig- told about this on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyny- - officer of the 2nd separate detachment of the Special Purpose Center -OMEGA- of the National Guard of Ukraine. — The enemy makes very extensive use of strike and reconnaissance drones. There are already fewer reconnaissance units, but there are more and more shock units, he said. He noted that combating the enemy's reconnaissance UAVs helps reduce the number of UAV strikes. — In the Vovchan direction, the activity of the use of anti-aircraft missiles has decreased a little over the last week or two, because the Russians lost a lot of long-range reconnaissance UAVs, which corrected the use of tactical aviation, including when using anti-aircraft missiles. In the last two weeks, they have not used the KABs much. And for the last week, reconnaissance UAVs do not even fly into the deep rear during the day, - said the military man. Title: Pointed Russian missiles at Kharkiv: the enemy informant was sentenced
Description: The sentence became known from the sentence of the court register, the identity of the convicted installed Kharkiv Anti-Corruption Center (KHAC). According to the HAC, it is about Yuriy Panfilov, who was accused of disseminating information about the deployment of the Armed Forces and justifying Russian aggression. The court recognized the man as an informant of the Russian special services, who adjusted Russian airstrikes against the critical infrastructure of Kharkiv. Among the main targets of the enemy were strategically important enterprises, in particular the defense-industrial complex. For greater effectiveness of missile and drone attacks, the Russians expected to receive from Panfilov the geolocation of Ukrainian air defense. In case of receiving such information, the invaders hoped to -bypass- the air defense systems of the Armed Forces of Ukraine or carry out a targeted attack on them. To collect intelligence, the convict found the places of -arrivals-, and then took hidden photos and videos there. The man forwarded all the information he received to several chat rooms of pro-Kremlin Telegram channels controlled by the special services of the aggressor country. Also, in September 2023, he videotaped the consequences of the Russian shelling of the state-owned enterprise Kharkiv Armored Plant. The convict began transmitting data to the enemy in the fall of 2023. Before that, Panfilov distinguished himself by publishing posts and comments on Facebook in which he tried to discredit Ukrainian defenders and admired the aggressor state. In addition, he denied that residential buildings in Kharkiv were being shelled by the aggressor state, and he called the tragedy in Buch, which was staged by the Russian military, a theater and a fake. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that law enforcement officers reported the suspicion to the Russian general, who ordered the capture of -Kharkiv in 5 days-.

The defenders of the Ukrainian land repelled six enemy attacks. Two more clashes are ongoing. The settlements of Siversk, Mykolaivka and Pereizne were hit by enemy air defense systems. In the Toretsk direction, 11 enemy attacks took place in the area of ​​Toretsk, Dachny, Shcherbinivka and Nelipivka. Ukrainian soldiers repelled eight enemy attacks, three more battles continue. In the Kurakhiv direction, the invaders attacked 22 times in the direction of Zhelanny Drugo, Ukranian, Selidovy, Dolynivka, Georgiivka, Katerynivka, and Kostyantynivka. Fifteen attempts by the occupiers to advance have already been repulsed. In the Vremivsk direction there were six enemy attacks near Vodyanyi, Katerynivka and Makarivka. Title: The head of the IOU GUR considers Russia's statements about a new escalation to be myths
Description: This was stated by the head of the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, Lieutenant General Kyrylo Budanov, during a panel discussion at the annual meeting of the Yalta European Strategy (YES) in Kyiv, ArmiyaInform reports. -I have been hearing all these myths about escalation since 2014. What is escalation when we are fighting a fully conventional, all-out war? Absolutely all types of weapons that exist in the world have already been used. Well, how else can the situation be escalated?- said the head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs and Communications of the Ministry of Internal Affairs. Kyrylo Budanov rejected the seriousness of the suggestion that the president of the Russian Federation would provide much more aid to countries and groups in the Middle East with the aim of escalating the war there. -How can he help when he himself asks for help from others? How will it help globally? Yes, you can send a special forces unit, no problem. You can transfer, for example, 50 MANPADS. But what next? Everything is fighting here, the entire Russian army, everything that is produced goes directly from the assembly line to the front. Everything they buy - by the way, no one gives them anything for free - everything goes to the front. How will they help?-, the head of the GUR of the Ministry of Defense argued his position. -Globally, they cannot do anything as long as the war in Ukraine continues,- Kyrylo Budanov concluded. As reported by ArmyInform, from the summer of 2025 in Russia serious problems will begin in the economy and there will be a need for mobilization, which can undermine the socio-political situation in the aggressor country.

This greatly affected their social and psychological condition. He noted that previously Russians were convinced that their country was one of the strongest in the world, but this myth was destroyed with the first explosions in Moscow. Title: The US Army intends to conduct another test of hypersonic weapons by the end of 2024
Description: According to information profile resource Defense News, the head of the procurement department of the US Army, Doug Bush, made a corresponding statement. ArmyInform reports. Common Hypersonic Glide Body (C-HGB, -Common Hypersonic Glide Body-), which is a universal projectile developed jointly with the US Navy, was successfully tested at the beginning of 2024. The Navy envisions using the munition to be launched from ship-based launchers, while the US Army plans to integrate the munition for a land-based launch station. Defense News reports that the US Army has long worked with Leidos' Dynetics with the goal of creating an industrial base for the Common Hypersonic Glide Body, which will enter the armament of both the ground forces and the Navy. Previously, American private business had never been involved in the development of hypersonic weapons. -Following the Navy tests, we need to make sure that we have a full end-to-end test as close as possible to an operational test that will be successful,- Bush told reporters at a Pentagon briefing. The official also added that it is necessary to have confidence that weapons can be safely transferred to a unit that -may have to go to war.- The Army has yet to conduct fully successful trials. But, as Bush said, the military hopes that such a test will take place this year. If the tests are successful, the service will be able to transfer the hypersonic unit to the first unit as an initial operational capability as early as next year. Hypersonic missiles are capable of reaching a speed of Mach 5 (about 6,000 km per hour). The glider unit can maneuver at altitude, which makes detection by anti-missile systems difficult. According to the Pentagon, the battery of the ground complex consists of a command and staff vehicle and four heavy transporters with two containers on each with hypersonic missiles. The project range of the missile is 2775 km. The first US Army unit to receive hypersonic weapons (with the exception of universal munitions) was the 5th Battalion, 3rd Regiment, 17th Field Artillery Brigade at Joint Base Lewis-McChord (Washington State). The unit is part of the 1st multidisciplinary task force. The delivery took place two days before the scheduled commissioning date at the end of the 2021 fiscal year. The C-HGB consists of a warhead, a guidance system, cables and a protective heat shield. In August, Lt. Gen. Robert Rush, director of the Rapid Capabilities and Critical Technologies Office, said the Army was -really close- to deploying hypersonic weapons. But he cautioned that more tests would need to be conducted before any decision could be made about the future of the ground-based hypersonic missile. In May 2024, the US Navy conducted flight tests of an industrially produced missile in Hawaii. The tests were highly anticipated after a series of failed or aborted Common Hypersonic Glide Body tests. In 2023, the army and navy had to interrupt flight tests three times due to problems with the preparation of the missile for launch. As General Rush pointed out, it usually takes about ten years to develop missiles, but the hypersonic weapons program took only five years. According to him, it is necessary to make sure that -everything works-. If a decision is made to introduce a new weapon, there are strong strategic reasons for this. Video: Testing of a hypersonic weapon prototype by the Pentagon. Video: USNI News Video

Title: -Double blow-: on the army and the economy. Expert on the consequences of damage to enemy refineries
Description: What is the effect of these attacks, how will it affect Russia's economy and its ability to continue to maintain the Russian Army's combat capability to wage a war of aggression against Ukraine? Military expert Petro Chernyk told ArmyInform about this: -We will divide this issue (strikes on the oil industry of the Russian Federation - ed.) into two parts. The first is the political and ideological part, and the second is purely technical and economic. In the political part, the myth that it is impossible to strike on the territory of Russia is finally dispelled. That is, a nuclear state cannot be struck, because it is not known what will happen. There is already the experience of the successful Kursk operation, and we have been hitting their oil industry for a good year and no nuclear apocalypse has happened. So, it turns out that it is possible to inflict fire damage on a nuclear state. To be fair, this is not the only case in history, as there are some experts who say it never happened. But, as it turns out, a similar situation has already happened, in 1982 non-nuclear Argentina attacked nuclear Britain, and Britain did not respond with nuclear weapons. By the way, the same Soviet Union survived an attack from the Chinese on Damansky Island in 1969, and no disaster happened either. That is, this ideological factor that it is possible to carry out complex strikes on their territory not only for military purposes, but especially for oil purposes, is very important.- We understand that as long as Russia sells oil abroad, as long as it lives as a country. That is, 40% of their budget is formed exclusively thanks to revenues from the oil and gas sector. The more strikes there, the less they will sell oil to foreign markets and receive hard currency. In this context, it is important to note that the Iskander-M missile has 27 foreign-made parts in its configuration. The Kh-47 -Kinzhal- missile has 130 foreign-made parts. And their most massive reconnaissance drone -Orlan-10- is half-equipped with foreign-made parts. That is, the less currency the Russians have, the less they will be able to purchase the necessary parts from which weapons will be made. Plus, fuel itself, as such, is one of the key aspects in today's war between the Russian Federation and Ukraine. After all, this is a war of military equipment, primarily heavy. Let me remind you that a T-90 tank consumes up to one ton of fuel and up to 100 kilograms of lubricant per day. If the enemy has around three thousand tanks along the demarcation line, then the Russians need three thousand fuel, in particular diesel, per day. Plus, the most elementary thing that worries us at the moment is enemy aviation. The same Su-34, Su-25, Su-24, Su-30 and so on. And plus enemy helicopters can also refuel with aviation kerosene. That is, to provide all this equipment, the occupiers need a lot of fuel resources. The most powerful blow that the Defense Forces of Ukraine inflicted was when an oil depot in the Rostov region of the Russian Federation burned for more than 9 days. There, first of all, tanks with aviation kerosene burned out. Of course, it is still a little early to say that the Ukrainian strikes will really affect their entire oil-refining sector of the Russian economy. After all, they have 30 large factories and 50 small ones, which is a lot. And in the area of ​​oil refining, Russians are definitely among the top three countries in the world. But the fact that this process (destruction or damage to enterprises of the oil and gas industry of the Russian Federation - ed.) is increasing and that each time they have fewer and fewer resources, for example, for oil processing, this is extremely important today. I will give an interesting example. If today there is a question of buying microelectronics, it can, of course, be bought on world markets in such a way that no one will understand who is buying it. Because it can be implemented, relatively speaking, through 5-10 procurement chains. Let's take a company from Iran. It ordered the necessary microelectronics from somewhere, say, Mexico, and the documents show that it is for household appliances. Then it (microelectronics - ed.) was taken and bought from the Americans and it got back to Iran. Who will control them? This is impossible to do. However, if a company in Paraguay were to come to Denmark, France, Germany and say -sell us the oil equipment- that has now burned down in Russia, it will become obvious to everyone who is the ultimate beneficiary and who is the ultimate buyer. Therefore, Russians will no longer be able to buy the necessary equipment on these global markets. And they cannot produce them themselves, especially atmospheric-vacuum pipes, where the distillation of oil and corresponding oil products takes place. Therefore, this (hitting Russian oil and gas industry enterprises - ed.) is simply a fantastic, wonderful, asymmetric response to our enemy. It (the answer - ed.) should grow and it will eventually give results. My favorite historical parallel. Hitler's Germany really fell when the Americans and the British destroyed 12 German plants for the production of synthetic gasoline. That's when things got bad for the Germans. Sooner or later, things will get bad for the Russians too.

Title: Church Laundry Lies: Enemy Propaganda Does Not Fear God
Description: Recently, fake information began to spread in social networks and on various pro-Kremlin Telegram channels that a laundry was allegedly opened in Lutsk in a church selected by the MP. As -evidence-, a photo of the church is attached, at the entrance of which the inscription -Clean - and Laundry- can be seen. StopFake investigators discovered that this is a photo of the bell tower of the Greek-Catholic Church of the Sending of the Holy Spirit in the city of Terebovlia, in the Ternopil region. A social laundry was opened there last year. According to notification of the Terebovlia City Council, the Greek Catholic parish was the winner of the mini-grant within the framework of the project -Development of social services for community cohesion to support IDPs and vulnerable groups at the parish level-. Parishioners monitored the situation in the community, drew up a map of needs and identified vulnerable categories of the population. They came to the conclusion that there is a need for a social laundry in Terebovla. After all, there are many seriously ill people in the community who need such a service and cannot take their clothes to Ternopil or Chortkiv. That is why they decided to implement such a social initiative. But the Russian agitprop decided to use this initiative to create another fake about the alleged -oppression- of the Moscow Patriarchate of the Ukrainian Orthodox Church and the -religious apocalypse- in Ukraine.

Title: What is known about one of the first F-16 pilots: the story of the fallen officer Oleksiy Mesia
Description: … The year is 2022. ZSU pilots Oleksiy Mes and Andriy Pilshchikov meet with American government officials to convince them: the Ukrainian army needs fighter jets. To strengthen the position of the pilots, they were then joined by Hollywood actor Sean Penn. … 2024 year. Already on board the F-16 in the sky of Ukraine, Oleksiy Mes repels a massive Russian combined air and missile strike. He destroyed three cruise missiles and one attack UAV — saving Ukrainians from enemy weapons. But, unfortunately, at the cost of his own life. What kind of officer was Mes and how he helped our state to become stronger and more effective in beating the enemy - in the ArmyInform material. Born on October 20, 1993 in Shepetivka, Khmelnytskyi. There he studied at a local school, which he graduated with a gold medal. Subsequently, he studied at the Kharkiv National University of the Air Force named after Ivan Kozhedub. Graduated from university in 2016. It is interesting that Mes and Andriy Pilshchikov with the call sign -Jus- were peers and studied together at KhNUPS. And died with a difference of 1 year and 1 day. -This is our issue, of which the whole of Ukraine and the Air Force are proud. I was lucky to be the instructor who gave him a ticket to the sky on the MiG-29 aircraft,- said Brigadier General Serhiy Golubtsov, Chief of Aviation of the Air Force Command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, at Oleksiy's farewell. Back in 2014, Mes went to Norway - at that time he was studying in the fourth year of KhNUPS. Told partners about participation in the OOS, exchanged experience, etc. And then there is the military service under the contract. He was enrolled in the personnel of the military unit in the position of squadron support commander - deputy commander of the operational group. In September 2022, the pilot was awarded the medal -For military service to Ukraine- - for personal courage and selfless actions shown in the defense of the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, loyalty to the military oath. The nickname -Moonfish- (-Fish-moon-) Mes got because of one of the curious cases, about which the man chose not to tell. As of June 2022, Mes was the commander of a squadron of Ukrainian MiG-29 fighters. At the age of 29, he had the rank of lieutenant colonel. Mes lobbied for the transfer of F-16 fighters to Ukraine. Pilots traveled to the United States, talked with the media and officials. He was fluent in English and could equally argue the need to protect the sky. -Moonfish- became the real face of Ukraine's F-16 lobbying campaign. Yes, back in June 2022, Ukrainian pilots flew to Washington to meet with members of the US Congress. There they spoke with Senator Mark Kelly, a former pilot and astronaut. After all, Moonfish was one of the first eight Ukrainian pilots to learn to fly the F-16 in Denmark in the fall of 2023. In September 2023, the Armed Forces wrote that an officer with the call sign -Moonfish- was undergoing F-16 training in Great Britain. He is one of those pilots called media. And after Juice and Moonfish met in Washington with Republican Congressman Adam Kinzinger, he introduced the Ukraine Fighter Pilots Act to the US House of Representatives. Moonfish was also one of the first Ukrainian pilots who went to the United States to learn how to fly the F-16. In September 2023, his training moved from the simulator cockpit to a real F-16 aircraft. At one time, Mes told about the training of Ukrainians on Western fighter jets on the air of a national telethon: -I would compare our planes that we have in our arsenal with the F-16 - it's like switching from a push-button phone to a 16th iPhone.- On August 26, 2024, the Russians launched another massive air-missile strike. Pilot Mesy on board the F-16 managed to destroy three cruise missiles and one attack UAV. -Aleksii saved Ukrainians from deadly Russian missiles. Unfortunately, at the cost of his own life. Oleksiy Mes was a strong and devoted soldier, a high-class pilot, a leader on earth and in the sky, a good friend, a loving son, father, husband, patriot of his country,- said the message of the Air Force Command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The soldier was buried on August 29. During the farewell ceremony, a pair of MiG-29 fighter jets paid tribute to the fallen pilot - Mesia's native MiGs, on which he began his pilot career. The pilot is survived by his wife Yulia, daughter, mother, father, sister. -His name was Oleksiy Mes, and he was the best pilot in Ukraine. He managed the entire F-16 project, he actually replaced the functional air attaché, he was a very funny guy and he loved his daughter very much. He was an excellent student who wanted to be a nuclear physicist and defended a research paper at the National Academy of Sciences about some incredible technology in dentistry,- recalls the officer, public activist Melania Podolyak. By order of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, lieutenant colonel Oleksiy Mesy was posthumously awarded the military rank of colonel. The reasons for the crash of the F-16 plane piloted by Oleksiy Mes are currently being investigated. More archival photos of Oleksiy Mesia- from university studies, trips to Norway, etc.: Photos from open sources and the personal archive of Lilia Averyanova

Title: Hopelessness forces the occupiers to surrender: in Kharkiv Oblast, the number of captured Russians h...
Description: Colonel Vitaly Sarantsev, the spokesman of Kharkiv OTU, told about this on the air of the national telethon -Yedini Novyni- . — The number is growing little by little. We report this in our daily summaries. This indicates that the enemy's personnel understands the complete hopelessness of their position and it has begun to dawn on them that in order to save their lives, they still need to raise their hands and surrender to the Ukrainian military, he said. The military emphasized that Ukraine strictly adheres to all norms of international law regarding the treatment of prisoners of war and called on Russian soldiers to surrender. — Unlike the Russians, we respect international humanitarian law. We treat prisoners normally and nothing terrible awaits them in captivity. Therefore, of course, we tolerate the enemy's decision to surrender and call on those who have not yet made a final decision to take an example from their comrades, the spokesman said. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that fighters of the 13th Special Forces Brigade -Charter- of the National Guard of Ukraine once again captured Russian servicemen in the Kharkiv direction.

Title: Russians are fighting with people at public transport stops in the South
Description: spokeon the air of the national telethon -Yedini Novyny- about the terror against civilians, which the invaders staged in the South of Ukraine. a> spokesman of the -Tavria- OUV, Captain Dmytro Lykhovii. — the Russians are already overstepping their bounds when they just plainly go to war with the civilian population just because they can. Over the course of yesterday, in addition to Kherson, they shelled 9 more settlements in the Kherson region. As a result, one civilian was killed, and 7 more civilians were injured, he said. Three more civilians were killed today as a result of an attack on an agricultural enterprise in Gulyajpilsk community in Zaporizhzhia. Also, civilian houses, private buildings, high-rise buildings, a school, a hospital canteen, a bus, and civilian cars were damaged as a result of enemy shelling. — In fact, they are fighting with public transport stops when a drop drone or an FPV drone or an impact drone flies there. Since he can't go back, and they don't see military goals there, they just attack civilians, in violation of all the Geneva Conventions, the spokesman said. The response to the terror of the Russian occupiers against civilians should be strengthening the means of radio-electronic warfare, strengthening anti-aircraft defense, and strengthening countermeasures against Russian UAVs. Also, the line of combat should be pushed as far away from Kherson as possible, so that the Russians have as few opportunities as possible to shell the regional center. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Kherson two people were injured as a result of the Russian shelling.

Title: In the north of Kharkiv Oblast, the enemy was terrorized by FPV drones
Description: Colonel Vitaly Sarantsev, the spokesman of Kharkiv OTU, told about this on the air of the national telethon -Yedini Novyni- . — The extreme activity of our FPV drones prevents the enemy from making any movements, providing logistical support to units. The enemy there in the forward positions does not receive provisions or water, does not replenish ammunition stocks, he said. As a result, desertion and refusal to obey orders are becoming more common among enemy personnel, because it is extremely difficult for the occupiers to carry out any tasks due to the effective actions of Ukrainian drones. At the same time, the spokesman noted that the Ukrainian defenders do not have a complete advantage over the enemy in the use of drones - it is more about parity. — Both sides quite actively use this type of ammunition. We have 30 to 40 strikes per day, which are done precisely with the help of FPV drones. Therefore, it is difficult to say about any advantage in the air, it would be more correct to note that this is a certain parity in this armament, said Vitaly Sarantsev. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that ->in the north of Kharkiv Oblast, Ukrainian drones put the invaders on starvation rations, resulting in extremely high losses Russian soldiers increasingly resort to desertion.

Title: Summonses are being prepared to be served automatically: what is known
Description: the head of the Department of Information Technologies of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Oleg Berestovy told about this in DOU Podcast. -How are subpoenas being issued now? They are written out by hand, printed, and then the stack of paper comes to the head of the TCC, who must sign them, put a seal, and then the summonses are distributed. This is an inefficient process. That is why we have now created a function so that the summons can be generated in the -Oberig- registry, signed with the electronic signature of the head of the TCC, and not even printed directly in the TCC. It will go immediately to centralized printing, from there to Ukrposhta, it will deliver it, and we will have information on where the summons is located: whether it was delivered or not, whether it was lost somewhere, how long it took for delivery, etc.,- explains Oleg Berestovy . According to him, the process will be transparent and -it will allow the military-political leadership to have more relevant information than is available now.- -In order to understand the -funnel-, at which stage we are and what needs to be decided in order to expand the -funnel- in the end,- emphasizes Oleg Berestovy. And he adds: -Accordingly, when you sign this summons with an electronic signature, there won't be any signature signature; and you should be sure that you were not sent some kind of phishing or something, and that your TCC did indeed sign this subpoena. Therefore, Rezerv+ will have a function: how to use a QR scanner to check whether the head of the TCC really signed this summons, whether it is legal, valid, legal and no one else signed it on the way to the bus stop. This is a function that will allow to protect a person as a conscript.- Also, Oleg Berestovy emphasized once again that there will be no summons to Reserve+. -We are not planning this. We have a backlog until the middle of spring - there are no subpoenas. But we are planning to develop functionality to at least slightly automate and civilize the delivery of summons with the help of Ukrposhta and certain automated processes on the backend,- summarized the head of the IT Department of the Ministry of Education and Culture. As ArmiyaInform wrote, users of the Rezerv+ application will be able to check the authenticity of the written summons received from the TCC and SP.

Title: The nightmare of the occupiers - how the bomber's calculation works -Baba Yaga-
Description: A video about the work of the air strike reconnaissance units was published on September 14 on the detachment's page. -Coordinated calculation work of the unmanned aircraft complex -Vampire- is one of the most effective methods of destroying the enemy in the dark. Our calculations, thanks to impeccable coordination and high skills, skillfully use advanced technologies - as a result, -Baba-Yaga- strikes enemy positions with maximum accuracy, even in conditions of limited visibility,- the detachment commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, -Baba Yaga- buried the Russians in their hideout in the Pokrovsky direction .

Title: The stigma of the captive: why Russians choose suicide over captivity
Description: The reasons for the reckless behavior of the occupiers on the battlefield on the air of the -Suspilne Novosti- marathon explained by the commander of the BPAC shock battalion - Achilles- of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after the basket chieftain Ivan Sirk, captain Yury Fedorenko. According to him, Russians surrender only when they have no other choice and they cannot even commit suicide - shoot themselves or blow themselves up with a grenade. One of the main reasons for this behavior of the occupiers is intimidation by Russian propaganda, which tells about the fictitious abuses that Russians allegedly suffer in Ukrainian captivity. - This shows that the Russian occupier has very, very much, and, I will emphasize once again for the third time - very much! — the propaganda machine is working powerfully. They either do not see or do not want to see how, for example, exchanges of prisoners of war take place. What Ukraine gives - with such well-fed faces, polished teeth and in the body, so-called. That is, they deal with people. And who are given to us — tortured, murdered, emaciated, where the occupier deliberately works to deprive them of their health and, as a result, after release from captivity, so that a person loses his life as well, - said the military man. As a result, Russians are simply afraid to surrender. Having believed the false propaganda, they believe that the Ukrainians will mock and abuse them. — Accordingly, the propaganda machine in the Russian Federation works in such a way that the occupier is objectively afraid to surrender, because he thinks that we do not follow international rules and norms, in particular the convention. That we will face. This is not true, - Yuriy Fedorenko emphasized. The second reason for the reluctance of Russian soldiers to surrender is even more interesting. It consists in the fear of returning to Russia for exchanges and being condemned and abused already there. -It is scary enough for the enemy to surrender, because he understands that even after the exchange, he will be abused already on the territory of the Russian Federation,- explained the commander of the Ukrainian drones. This is what forces the occupiers to choose suicide between captivity and suicide. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the Kharkiv direction, the Russian command involves military personnel in the conduct of hostilities.

Title: In the Zaporozhye direction, the enemy lacks forces for assault operations
Description: The reasons for the decrease in the offensive activity of the enemy in the Zaporizhzhia direction on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyni- explained the spokesperson of the OUV - Tavria- captain Dmytro Lykhovii. - The number of combat clashes and assaults on the part of Muscovites can be counted on the fingers of one hand. For example, today until 4 p.m. they were not there at all. Yesterday, there were also none for the whole day, and in the three previous days there were only four of them, he said. The reason for the relative calm, compared to a number of other directions, is a significant lack of resources and reserves for the occupiers to storm in several directions at the same time. — Of course, Pokrovsky and Kurakhiv directions in the Donetsk region are now a priority for them. In addition, they have a huge area of ​​responsibility and, for many reasons, they need to transfer units to the Kursk direction, where they strengthen their forces in order to somehow respond to the offensive of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the spokesman said. In view of this, the occupiers were forced to transfer their forces from the Zaporozhye direction to other, more important for them directions of hostilities. — From the Zaporizhzhia region a few weeks ago - you can say she acted as a donor - they partially took units at the level of battalions, regiments, and brigades. That is why they are undergoing a certain reorganization, such an operational pause, Dmytro Lykhova said. At the same time, this does not mean that hostilities in Zaporozhye have completely stopped. The calm there can only be considered relative against the background of other directions. — The enemy is actively using all types of damage — artillery, missile weapons, attack drones, anti-aircraft missiles. Yesterday, 10 guided aerial bombs and 50 unguided aerial missiles flew in the direction of Orihiv. Today, the enemy has already carried out 2 airstrikes in the direction of Orihiv, closer to Zaporizhzhia, and, unfortunately, the civilian population and civilian infrastructure are suffering. Three civilians were killed today as a result of an attack on an agricultural enterprise in the Gulyajpil community, said the spokesman of the -Tavria- OUV. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that ->in the South, the occupiers rush to the Dnipro - attack with a whole zoo of brigades and regiments.

Title: One step before assaults: how conscripts are used in the Russian army in the Kharkiv direction
Description: Exactly how the Russian command uses them on the air of the national telethon -Yedini Novyni- explained the spokesman of the OTU -Kharkiv- Colonel Vitaly Sarantsev. — The adversary began to use conscripts, this is indeed confirmed by intelligence data and other sources. But this does not mean that there are massive use of military personnel and that they throw them on assaults. These are conscripts who perform logistics tasks, serve as drivers or perform some other task, he said. Currently, there are no conscript soldiers of the Russian army directly on the contact line in the assault units in the combat zone. -But they are located in territories that border on non-attacked areas, they perform territory control tasks, communication tasks and many other tasks that are not directly related to the conduct of hostilities,- explained the spokesman. At the same time, he noted that the personnel of enemy units involved in hostilities in the north of Kharkiv Region have an extremely low level of training and motivation. In particular, we are talking about servicemen of the Russian Federation, who replenished the losses in the Vovchansk region. — They don't have enough experience, they don't even know how to orient themselves in a certain way in the local area. This indicates that the adversary is already trying to squeeze everything he has into this direction that is important to him. He tries everything to plug his holes both in defense and in those units that engage in active offensive actions, Vitaliy Sarantsev emphasized. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the Kharkiv direction, the Russian occupation forces began to recruit conscript soldiers.

Title: Digital recruiting will be launched in Ukraine: the first details from the Ministry of Defense
Description: the head of the Department of Information Technologies of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Oleg Berestovy told about this in DOU Podcast. -Now, for example, it is possible to sign contracts directly with military units. For this function, we are currently doing digital recruiting in Reserve+. We want to gamify this story a little - there will be swipes, a match with brigades (smiles - ed). But first there are more urgent tasks - and then we will gamify,- said Oleg Berestovy. The pre-release stage of digital recruiting, according to the head of the IT Department of the MoU, should be -from week to week.- As ArmyInform wrote, as of the beginning of September 2024 -profesiyi/->there are about 4,000 vacancies in the Defense Forces of Ukraine.

Title: Mass withdrawal of Russian missile carriers in the Black Sea: the Navy explained what this threatens
Description: The spokesperson of the Navy of Ukraine stated this in -Suspilne.Novyny- air captain 3rd rank Dmytro Pletenchuk. -Probably, if the eighth missile carrier was not currently undergoing repairs in Novorossiysk, they would have taken it out to sea as well. But I can't say that this somehow affects the security level now,- he said. However, according to him, these are missile carriers, so the threat of their use remains. It should be taken into account. -But it was also preserved when they were directly at the Novorossiy base. Because it is a matter of a few hours to go to an external raid and shoot. This does not affect the overall distribution of forces and the situation. At least I haven't seen such reasons yet,- assured Dmytro Pletenchuk. The spokesman of the Navy noted that later we will find out the real reasons why the leadership of the Black Sea Fleet of the Russian Federation made such a decision. He explained that Russia usually uses Kalibr from the Black Sea in order to maximally load Ukrainian air defense units. -The technical characteristics of these missiles actually no longer allow them to be used as a separate weapon. That is, the Ukrainian air defense has learned to fight them skillfully. The last shot down of the use of such missiles was 100%. There were more than 20 of them,- the Navy spokesman recalled. As reported by ArmyInform, on September 14, the occupiers took an unusually large number of ships into the Black Sea, including Caliber carriers. In the Black Sea there are 16 enemy ships, 7 of which are carriers of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 48 missiles. There are 5 enemy ships in the Mediterranean Sea, four of which are -caliber- carriers with a total volley of up to 24 missiles.

Title: In the South, the occupiers rush to the Dnipro — they attack with a whole zoo of brigades and regime...
Description: informed about the current situation and the forces that the occupiers threw at the assaults in the Dnieper direction on the air of the national telethon -Yedini Novyni- /a> spokesman of the -Tavria- OUV, Captain Dmytro Lykhovii. — From the beginning of this day until 4 p.m., two assaults took place, which were unsuccessful for the enemy. There were 5 storms yesterday, he said. Obviously, the spokesman suggested, the enemy is trying to get as close as possible to the Dnieper and take control of its main course. — He throws additional forces there. It can be observed that Russian units from the 144th Motorized Rifle Brigade, 205th Motorized Rifle Brigade, 337th Airborne Assault Regiment, 28th Motorized Rifle Regiment, 126th Separate Coastal Defense Brigade and the 61st Marine Brigade are participating in these battles for the islands. This is how a variety of Russian security forces from different structures of their occupation army are involved in solving certain tasks on the Left Bank of the Dnieper and on the islands, Dmytro Lykhova said. The spokesman suggested that the aim of the occupiers is to get closer to Kherson in order to further increase the shelling of the city. Earlier, ArmyInform reported on a sharp escalation in difficult terrain near the Dnipro: 60 enemy assaults took place over the past week.

Title: Russian troops fired at residents of Dniprovshchyna and hit a power line
Description: reported this by the head of Dnipropetrovsk OVA Serhii Lysak. A 67-year-old woman was injured in the Marganets community in Nikopol region. A fire broke out in a private house. It was extinguished. -The Russians also targeted Nikopol. And also - in Myrivska, Pokrovska and Chervonogrigorivska communities. In the district center, the fire engulfed a five-story apartment. He was tamed. 4 apartment buildings, a bus and a car were also damaged,- the report said. Also, in other settlements, as a result of Russian aggression, a lyceum, 8 houses, 3 farm buildings and a power line were damaged. -The enemy directed a kamikaze drone at the Zelenodol community of Kryvorizhia. There, the agricultural enterprise was affected. People are whole,- noted Serhiy Lysak. As reported by ArmyInform, the troops of the aggressor country yesterday evening and at night >attackedNikopol with kamikaze drones and artillery shells.

Title: The Red Cross office in Dnipro will suspend work after the attack on the mission in Donetsk region
Description: About this told spokesman of the delegation of the International Committee of the Red Cross in Ukraine, Oleksandr Vlasenko. According to him, after this attack, the Red Cross will review the security rules that the committee's employees followed and that worked -very well- with 2014. -We have offices in Kharkiv, Dnipro and Odesa, as well as the main office in Kyiv and an office in Lviv, and on the opposite side in Donetsk and Luhansk. So far, our Dnipro office has stopped working for some time. We will conduct our own investigation into this situation, we will try to understand whether there were any mistakes on our part,- said Vlasenko. At the same time, he noted that in the near future the ICRC in Ukraine will return to its usual mode of operation, as there are still many people in the frontline regions who need help.

Title: Polish tanks crush the Russians – PT-91 Twardy successfully repulse -meaty- assaults
Description: This is discussed in the ArmiyaTV story. The PT-91 Twardy battle tank is a licensed version of the Soviet T-72M1, which was produced in Poland. It is noted that, unlike the Soviet prototype, -Twardy- received several modernizations. According to the commander of the vehicle, when the Russians once again resort to meat assaults, it is the -Twardy- that drives them away, equipped with new armor and a modern fire control system. In particular, Polish developers installed new gun stabilizers and a gunner's thermal sight. One of these tanks was given the call sign - -Grandfather-. When asked by a journalist how the PT-91 Twardy differs from the T-72, one of the crew members answers: -The difference is in the engine, it is more boosted and more powerful than the 72's. Well, you can see for yourself by the active armor: this is not -Kontakt-1-, not -Kontakt-2-. This is Polish armor, which they patented here,- says the army man. Our military learned to manage these units in Poland for 40 days. The targets on which our tankers work are mainly enemy infantry. -They arrange enemy assaults, attack with infantry. They crawl like locusts. Therefore, on foot. -Shooting- with a high-explosive fragmentation projectile is a -hooray,- comments a military man. As ArmiyaInform wrote, today Ukraine celebrates the Day of Tank Troops of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces General Olexander Syrsky congratulated the soldiers -tankers, reminding that tank troops are the steel fist of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: The Ministry of Defense is preparing to launch automated postponements of mobilization
Description: the head of the Department of Information Technologies of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Oleg Berestovy told about this in DOU Podcast. -Automated deferrals are a hot topic. I understand that this is necessary, first of all, out of respect for those people who need it. And for release from work, which can not be done in the TCC. For example: people with disabilities. If the state knows about you that you have a certain group of disabilities and you are not suitable for service a priori, then why reconfirm, regularly pass the VLK? It is necessary to regulate both normatively and technically. We are working on it. We know how to do it, and in the coming weeks we will approach it,- said Oleg Berestovy. Also, according to him, automated deferrals will apply to guardians of three or more children. And also — deferrals for people who are studying, getting their first higher education. In addition, Oleg Berestovy called online military registration another important and popular function. As ArmyInform wrote, at the end of August the Verkhovna Rada supported in general draft law No. 11391 on expanding the range of conscripts who have the right to postpone conscription for military service during mobilization.

Title: We are fighting for the security of the entire European continent — Rustem Umyerov
Description: He informs about this14 September in social networks. -We are fighting for the security of the entire European continent, and our needs remain the same. First of all, this is an acceleration and increase in the amount of military aid: equipment, projectiles, long-range ammunition, mines and demining means, EW systems, spare parts,- he said. According to him, a critically important topic is the strengthening of Ukrainian air defense forces to protect critical infrastructure from Russian terrorist attacks. -We need not only more air defense systems, but also a reliable supply of ammunition for them,- Rustem Umyerov emphasized. He recalled that in August, Ukraine used F-16 aircraft for the first time to repel a massive air attack. The Minister of Defense of Ukraine hopes for the expansion of pilot training programs and the timely replenishment of the stocks of guided air missiles. -Also, more and more of our partners share the position of giving Ukraine the opportunity to strike with long-range Western-made weapons at military facilities on the territory of the Russian Federation. I thank the organizers and participants for their constant support of Ukraine on the way to victory,- he summarized. Earlier ArmyInform reported that the Minister of Defense of Ukraine met with the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Lithuania. Rustem Umerov discussed with Gabrielus Landsbergis the situation at the front, as well as the daily shelling of our cities, during which the enemy continues to kill civilians. Also today, the head of the Ukrainian Ministry of Defense met with the delegation headed by the Minister of Defense of Denmark Troels Lund Poulsen.

Title: by Russian air defense systems — across Russia: as a result of the Kursk operation, the enemy is she...
Description: Vadim Mysnyk, the spokesman of OTU -Siversk- drew attention to this on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyny- . — During the past day, the enemy carried out 82 shellings on the territory of Chernihiv and Sumy regions. And on the territory of the district of the Kursk region, which is controlled by the Defense Forces, there were 127 shellings, including 37 anti-aircraft missiles, he said. This indicates that one of the tasks of the Kursk operation has been achieved - the enemy is forced to strike more intensively on its own territory, instead of shelling Ukrainian settlements. True, the Russian aggressors did not completely abandon the tactics of shelling the Ukrainian border. For this purpose, the enemy mainly uses weapons that can strike from deep within the territory, because units of the Defense Forces of Ukraine do not allow him to approach the border. — As for the Sumy direction, there are certain results of the Kursk operation. The enemy is trying to increase the intensity of shelling, but we also take our measures in response and do not allow him to hit our territory, the spokesman emphasized. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that Defense Forces forced the enemy to practically abandon the use of DRG in Sumshchyna, their zajmayutsya-drg/->detected with the help of UAVs and other technical means of monitoring the area. Therefore, Russian saboteurs on the northern border focused on mining area. Instead, thanks to the Kursk operation, Ukrainian defenders are able to significantly strengthen border protection in Sumshchyna /a>.

Title: In the Toretsk direction, the number of enemy attacks increased to six - the General Staff of the Ar...
Description: This is reported in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 16 :00 September 14. The occupier continues to use aviation and artillery in the border areas of the Sumy region. On the Kharkiv direction, Russian terrorists stormed the positions of our units in the Vovchansk district three times. Four times the enemy attacked in the Kupyansk direction. In the direction of Lozova and Sinkivka. One attack was repulsed by the Defense Forces, three engagements are ongoing. On the Lymanskyi direction, the enemy attacked in the districts of Druzhelyubivka, Makiivka, Nevsky, Novosadovo, Zarichny, Serebryanka, and Terni. Since the beginning of the day, there have already been 11 clashes in this direction, five are still ongoing. The situation is under control. The enemy continues to try to break through the defense of our troops in the Seversky direction, however, receives a strong rebuff from Ukrainian units. So, near Verkhnyokamyanskyi and Vyimka, the occupiers twice tried to suppress our units, at the moment one battle has not ended. In the Kramatorsk direction, the invaders made one assault near Andriivka. In the Toretsk direction, the number of enemy attacks increased to six. The enemy, with the support of aviation, is attacking near the settlements of Toretsk, where our defenders repelled two attacks, Druzhba and Nelipivka, where four attacks have already been repelled, two more clashes are ongoing. Kostyantynivka, Kleban-Byk, and Katerynivka were hit by anti-aircraft missile defense systems, the settlement of Druzhba was hit by unguided air missiles. The enemy is intensively attacking the Ukrainian defenders in the Pokrovsky direction. Here, during the day, the aggressor carried out 23 attacks in the districts of Sukhoi Balka, Vozdvizhenka, Zeleny Polya, Novooleksandrivka, Novotoretsk, Grodivka, Krasny Yar, Novogrodivka, and Marynivka. The defense forces are holding back the onslaught and have repulsed 23 enemy attacks, six battles are still ongoing. In the Kurakhiv direction, since the beginning of the day, the invader has attacked our units 27 times. Tried to advance near Selidovoy, Ukrainian, Krasnohorivka, Dolynivka, Zhelany Drugo, Georgiyivka, Kostyantynivka, and Katerynivka, currently there are three skirmishes near Georgiyivka and Kostyantynivka. In the Vremivsk direction, our troops repelled two attacks in the direction of Vodyanyi and Zolota Niva, attempts to advance to the enemy did not bring success. The settlements of Pyatikhatki and Lobkove in the Orihiv direction were hit by unguided air missiles. In the Dnieper direction, two attacks by the invaders were unsuccessful. The command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine is taking all necessary measures to deter the enemy's offensive and stabilize the situation. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy lost more than 1,200 soldiers, 25 guns, one MLRS and anti-aircraft missile each.

Title: Khana -buhankam- - more than ten busiks -uaz- were burned by our drones
Description: The video of the hits appeared on September 14 on the channel of the Inquisition unmanned systems battalion of the 59th brigade. Part of the enemy's equipment was destroyed in shelters, but the majority - right during the movement. -Baltica group has a bit of a fire here with the technicians. All of us are a little pale...-, the battalion commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the battalion of unmanned systems -Inquisition- of the 59th motorized infantry brigade named after Yakov Handziuk found and destroyed enemy aerial scouts.

Title: Immortal Tank Shed - after at least 5 hits, the enemy vehicle was able to escape
Description: The video of the battle appeared on September 14 on the 60 Brigade channel. Our fighters repelled the assault of the Russians in the direction of Lyman. Two MTLB managed to disembark the infantry, but did not return. The infantry itself was also well received, hiding in the landings. A tank shed also took part in the assault, but after receiving a full one, it fled home with the injured crew,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Lyman region destroyed a very hardy enemy tank.

Title: Russian troops are transferring reserves to Kurshchyna, the Defense Forces have estimated their numb...
Description: About this on the air of the national telethon -The only news- 14 Vadym Mysnyk, the spokesman of OTU -Siversk- said on September. -As we can see from open sources, at the beginning of our Kursk operation, the enemy held about 11 thousand military personnel in this direction. Now, according to various estimates, there are 30,000 to 45,000. That is, we see that there are results. The enemy is trying to pull up (reserves — ed.) to slow down our offensive actions and in general what we are doing on the territory of Kurshchyna,- commented Vadim Mysnyk. According to him, these units of the enemy are of different type and level of training. Yes, there are conscripts and border guards, who are mostly located along the state border. -And it is — hundreds of kilometers, and the enemy also has the power to hold such a defense line... It is very difficult for them. But there are also prepared units: marine brigades, assault units, they are forced to transfer from other directions of the front. And this — is also a certain result of the Kursk operation. And we are already meeting them here... very good-, — Vadym Mysnyk summarized. As ArmiyaInform wrote, the activity of Russian sabotage and intelligence groups in the Ukrainian border in the Sumy region significantly decreased, but the Russians continue to try to enter the territory of Ukraine. They are detected using UAVs and other technical means of terrain control.

Title: First. Killed! Second. Killed! — incredible accuracy from mountain attack aircraft
Description: The video of the successful hunt was published on September 14 on the battalion page . the Russians wanted to break through our defenses, but they only broke through hell. As reported by ArmyInform, for the first time in the history of the 10th Mountain Assault Brigade -Edelweiss- the drones of the 109th Mountain Assault Battalion using an FPV drone destroyed an enemy unmanned aerial vehicle of the Merlin-VR wing type.

Title: The President changed the composition of the National Security Council
Description: The corresponding document is published on site of the head of state. The staff of the NSDC includes Minister of Foreign Affairs Andrii Sybigu, Minister of Strategic Industry Herman Smetanin, and Deputy Prime Minister for European and Euro-Atlantic Integration of Ukraine — Minister of Justice Olga Stefanishyna. The former head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Dmytro Kuleba, and the ex-head of the Ministry of Strategy and Industry, Oleksandr Kamyshin, were removed from the NSDC. This decree entered into force on the day of its publication.

Title: Happy holiday! Before the Ukrainian Day of Tank Troops, a Russian column was burned in the Pokrovsky...
Description: The video of the assault appeared on September 14 on the Presidential Brigade channel named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytskyi. The pilots of the -Titans- unit of the 21st special purpose battalion, as well as the 46th airmobile and 59th motorized infantry brigades participated in repelling the assault. -Congratulations to Ukraine on the Day of Tank Troops by reducing the number of tanks of the Russian Federation,- the Presidential Brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 21st Special Forces Battalion of the Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytskyi showed the night work of their bomber drone.

Title: A new exchange of prisoners: defenders of Mariupol and soldiers of special forces returned home
Description: This was reported by the Coordination Headquarters for the Treatment of Prisoners of War. Eight border guards, four policemen also returned home. 21 military sailors, three representatives of the State Special Transport Service, one — the State Emergency Service of Ukraine. All those released this time are men: 82 soldiers and sergeants; 21 servicemen are officers. Discharged servicemen took part in the defense against the Russian occupiers of the city of Mariupol - 69 people (including the defenders of -Azovstal- - 31 people), Donetsk region, Luhansk region, Zaporozhye, Kherson, Kharkiv and Kyiv directions. Among them are also two guards of the Chernobyl nuclear power plant. Most have suffered serious injuries or wounds, have serious illnesses, and need immediate medical assistance. Ukraine has been working for a long time to organize the return of these fellow citizens of ours. Ukraine expresses its gratitude to the United Arab Emirates for its help in organizing another exchange. All those released from Russian captivity will undergo a medical examination, receive the opportunity for physical and psychological rehabilitation, as well as proper payments for the entire time of captivity and reintegration into society.

Title: Russian soldier? Go on foot. Marines restore order on the roads of Kurshchyna
Description: Video of the damage appeared on September 14 on the unit's channel. -While such a structure as the patrol police has not yet been formed in the young republic, our pilots have taken over its duties,- commented the video in -Griffon-. As reported by ArmyInform, marines repelled the enemy attack on the Kurshchyna with a single hit.

Title: The occupiers are fleeing to the Northwest Territories in the Kharkiv direction: desertion has becom...
Description: informed about the situation and losses of the enemy in the Kharkiv direction in detail at OTU -Kharkiv-. In the area of ​​the settlement Hlyboke, the enemy carried out evacuation measures. Cases of desertion continue in units of the 79th separate motorized rifle regiment of the 18th motorized rifle division. In the vicinity of Lukyantsi, the enemy is carrying out preparations for assault operations, conducting engineering reconnaissance of advance routes. In Vovchansk, the enemy continues its assault in the area of ​​a multi-story building, carries out aerial reconnaissance in order to identify units of the Defense Forces of Ukraine. Conducts measures to evacuate sanitary losses. As a result of the successful actions of the Defense Forces of Ukraine, one enemy position was destroyed in the area of ​​the settlement Tikhe. During the past day, 4 combat clashes took place. the Russian occupiers also carried out 1 air strike using 1 anti-aircraft missile. 35 kamikaze drone strikes were carried out. The occupiers shelled the positions of the Defense Forces of Ukraine 369 times. The defense forces of Ukraine adequately respond to the actions and continue to destroy the manpower, weapons and military equipment of the Russian occupiers. The enemy's losses during the past day amounted to 115 creatures, of which 45 were irretrievable, and 70 were sanitary. Also the enemy lost 66 units of weapons and military equipment destroyed and damaged, in particular: Also on In the Kharkiv direction, the Defense Forces destroyed 40 shelters for enemy personnel and 3 ammunition storage sites of the Russian occupiers. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that due to significant losses and the lack of elementary provision of water and food, Russian soldiers in the north of the Kharkiv region voluntarily leave the units of the occupying forces.

Title: Arrived on 2 BMPs, burned in 2 BMPs — the presidential brigade left no chance for the enemy
Description: The video of the battle appeared on September 14 on the battalion channel. -Early in the morning, the enemy tried to storm the positions of two BMPs with infantry. Both infantry fighting vehicles, along with the infantry, were destroyed by FPV drones,- the 4th mechbat commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 21st Special Forces Battalion of the Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytsky showed the night work of their bomber drone.

Title: -Ukraine uses drones with molten metal!- — Russian propaganda in shock from Ukrainian drones--dragon...
Description: A selection of Russian news about our -dragon- drones appeared on September 14 on the unit's channel Khorne group 116 mechanized brigade. Putin's propagandists claim that new Ukrainian weapons use Hitler's designs. Did the Nazis use drones? Although Russian television is capable of carrying any kind of delusion. -The comments of the Russian media are music to our ears,- the Khorne group commented on the video. There is no arguing: recognition is recognition. ArmyInform offers to imagine the howl of Russian propaganda when ours use robopes with a flamethrower!

Title: Ukrainian paratroopers defeated a unit of Russian widows in Kurshchyna
Description: This was reported in the command of the Airborne Assault Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The troops of the aggressor state resort to desperate attempts to oust units and military units of the Defense Forces of Ukraine from the Kursk region. However, this attempt to break through the defense of the positions of the Armed Forces of Ukraine turned out to be a failure: in during a difficult battle that lasted for several hours, the Ukrainian paratroopers proved that they are better at military matters, having mastered the science of winning -excellently-. As a result, there were five BMDs, a tank and an enemy armored personnel carrier on the battlefield, as well as several dozen Russian 200s. The rest of the surviving Russian -Vedeveshniks- were nudged with their heels. As reported by ArmyInform, President Volodymyr Zelensky reported that thanks to the Kursk operation, it was possible to stop the enemy in the Kharkiv direction and slow down the advance of the Russians in the Donetsk region.

Title: Ukraine returned 103 soldiers from Russian captivity
Description: This is stated in a message in telegram channel of the head of state. 82 privates and sergeants and 21 officers were returned to Ukraine. Among them are defenders of Kyiv Oblast, Donetsk Oblast, Mariupol and Azovstal, Luhansk Oblast, Zaporizhzhia, Kharkiv Oblast. Soldiers of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the National Guard of Ukraine, border guards, and policemen returned home today. -I thank our exchange team for such good news for Ukraine,- the head of state added. As reported by ArmyInform, on September 13, from Russian captivity nyh-geroj-ukrayiny/->49 Ukrainians returned, in particular, Leniye Umyerova, a girl who was taken hostage by the Russians when she came to take care of her sick father.

Title: The Ministry of Defense reported how many Haitians are currently serving
Description: About this told head of the Department of Information Technologies of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Oleg Berestovy in DOU Podcast. When asked by the host whether this number of people was not enough, he answered in the affirmative and added: -Up to five thousand – would be enough. We would have time to do what we have already thought of and come up with something else... But it is not necessary to have a developer directly from among sergeants, officers or soldiers and that he sit in a military uniform. It is about 5 thousand people in principle. It is possible to outsource some civilian company that can develop some solution...-, Oleg Berestovy said. He emphasized that such processes already exist. -I currently have about 17 contracts in development for cooperation with civilian companies,- Oleg Berestovy summarized. As ArmyInform wrote, as of September 12, two hundred thousand soldiers successfully passed authorization in the Army+ application. In a month 4,000 reports were submitted by users of army work through Army+.

Title: The occupiers shot at our dragon drone and shot it down. On their heads
