Title: propaganda -reflects- information about Kurshchyna: why is Bucha here?
Description: The situation is especially cynicized by the fact that, in the case of the shops, the propagandists show footage of the soldiers of the Soviet Union engaged in their usual looting business - only not in Ukraine, but in their -native- Kursk region! At the same time, the representative of the Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Maria Sakharova, calls on international structures -not to turn a blind eye to the terrorist acts of the Kyiv regime on the territory of the Russian Federation.- This tactic, typical of Russian propaganda, is called -mirroring.- Propagandists make the same accusations against Ukraine that we once made against Russia, in particular regarding the events in Buch. That is, they often do not even invent fakes, but simply copy news items from Ukrainian news. The average Russian who consumes this information willingly believes it, because he would have behaved the same way in a foreign country (which the Ukrainians were able to see many times) — he looted, shot, raped. Therefore, Sakharova's appeal to international structures is completely hopeless. After all, apart from unspoken accusations of crimes, the Russians cannot provide any evidence of illegal actions by the Armed Forces. It is Russia that systematically uses terrorist methods of warfare and violates international humanitarian law, while Ukraine protects its territory and citizens from the aggressor. Regarding the war crimes committed by the Russians in Ukraine, a significant evidence base has been collected, both Ukrainian and independent world media wrote about them and continue to write about them. Therefore, the Russians use -reflection- primarily to divert attention from their failure in Kurshchyna and the inevitable defeat in the war that they themselves started.

Title: Howitzer M101A1: the history of the gun — the record holder
Description: This extraordinary howitzer certainly deserves a more detailed account. The correspondent of ArmiyaInform talked about it with Andriy Kharuk, a well-known weapons researcher, author of a personal profile art blog, doctor of historical sciences, professor of the Department of Humanities of the National Academy of Land Forces named after Hetman Petro Sahaydachny. The first part of the conversation was published by last week, and today we bring to your attention the second part of the conversation. — In addition to the modernization of the gun itself, as far as is known, the cartridges for it also underwent changes… — After the refusal in 1934 to use shrapnel in the ammunition of American 105-mm howitzers only two types of projectiles remained - high-explosive M1 with a mass of 14.97 kg and smoke. Already during the Second World War, an armor-piercing projectile, an aiming projectile (with colored smoke) and a cluster fragmentation projectile (used primarily in the Pacific theater of war) were adopted as weapons. The M1 projectile had two modifications - standard and -deep penetration- (with a reinforced case, but with a reduced charge mass). TNT or -composition B- - a mixture of TNT and RDX - was used for the equipment. The explosive mass for the standard projectile was 2.3 kg (for -composition B-) or 2.177 kg (for TNT); for a deep penetration projectile - 2.087 kg or 1.93 kg, respectively. The armor-piercing projectile weighed 13.25 kg and was equipped with a mixture of pentrite and TNT weighing 1.33 kg. The charge was profiled to form a cumulative jet. The initial speed of this projectile was 381 m/s. It could penetrate armor 102 mm thick at a distance of up to 1,800 m. Howitzer loading is semi-unitary (cases with charges were transported separately from shells, but were connected before loading). Seven variable shells were used for firing. — Mr. Professor, I ask you to clarify the marking system of this howitzer, because some informative sources create confusion in these markings. — In 1962, the M2A1 howitzer on the M2A1 carriage was given the designation M101 , and on the carriage M2A2 - M101A1. In both cases, barrels of two modifications could be used - M2A1 or M2A2, as well as anti-recoil devices of one of five modifications - from M2A1 to M2A5. Sights were improved and included: Elbow M16A1D telescopic sight for direct fire (3x magnification, 13° field of view); panoramic sight Panoramic M12A7S (4x magnification, field of view - 10°); quadrant M4A1. Ammunition, as before, consisted of semi-unitary shots, but their range was expanded and included the following types of shells: — This howitzer— no only an old-timer and a participant in many military campaigns, but also one of the record holders for the number of copies produced. - Mass production of howitzers at the Rock Island Arsenal continued until 1953, the total number of M2A1s produced was brought to 10,202 units. However, in the following years, the production of M101A1 howitzers was periodically renewed to fulfill export orders. The last such order (for 133 howitzers) was received in 1981 from Indonesia, the company fulfilled it by November 1983. —From the historical perspective and tactical and technical features, Andriy Ivanovych, let's focus on the direct service of this weapon. Which units of the US Army were they sent to? - In the late 1930s, the US Army began transitioning its infantry divisions to a new, -triangular- structure. The artillery of such a division was to consist of three divisions of 75-mm guns and one division of 105-mm howitzers (12 artillery systems in a division). Since there were no serial samples of 105-mm howitzers yet, the old 155-mm howitzers M1917 of the Schneider system were introduced in the division instead of these guns. Following the German Blitzkrieg in France, the US military decided to replace the 75 mm guns with 105 mm howitzers, leaving the division with a division of 155 mm howitzers - this was the organization of divisional artillery throughout World War II. — But, in addition to saturating each unit with specific guns, they needed to be managed successfully. How was this process organized? - An important innovation was the organization of a Fire Directio Center (FDC) in each division. It made it possible to focus the fire of the division on one target, and after it was hit, quickly transfer it to the next one. Central control equipment provided communication with batteries and forward artillery observers, as well as producing data for setting sights. In 1941, fire control centers also appeared at the division level. In 1937, the US Army had only 25 field artillery divisions. By December 1941 (the moment the United States entered the war), their number reached 142, and by 1945 exceeded 700. 264 of them had M2A1 howitzers: 161 divisions (147 as part of divisions and 14 separate) in the European Theater of War, 71 (respectively 62 and 9) in the Pacific and 32 in the US territory. In 1942, M2A1 howitzers appeared in the Marine Corps - one division of such guns was introduced into the divisional artillery regiments along with three divisions of 75-mm howitzers. By the beginning of the large amphibious operations on Saipan and Guam, the artillery regiments already had two divisions of 105-mm and 75-mm howitzers, and by the time of the landing on Iwo Jima in 1945, three and one, respectively. — As far as is known, during the Second World War this weaponry, along with others, was also prepared for export. How were these deliveries organized? - The main recipients of American aid under the Lend-Lease program - Great Britain and the USSR - did not show much interest in American artillery systems, making do with their own artillery systems. The USSR did not receive any such howitzers, the British were given only 16. The American howitzers were much more needed by China and Free France, which received 476 and 239 M2A1s, respectively. Another 223 units of these howitzers were transferred to a number of Latin American states that entered the war on the side of the Allies, but they were used in battle only by the Brazilians, who sent an infantry division to Italy that had three divisions of 105-mm howitzers. — And what was the fate of the use of these guns after the Second World War? — 105-mm howitzers were quite widely used during the Korean War, and on both sides of the front, both by the US and of the Republic of Korea, as well as parts of Chinese volunteers who fought on the side of the DPRK. The last campaign of the US Army in which the M101A1 howitzer was widely used was the Vietnam War. Their main task in this war was the direct support of infantry units, howitzers were relatively rare in divisions. Much more often, they were used in battery, underwater or even separate artillery installations. The use of howitzers of the 1st Division of the 7th Artillery Regiment as the armament of the LCM-6 landing craft became quite exotic. Later, AMMI pontoons mounted from standard sections were used as floating batteries. For two M101A1 howitzers, a pontoon measuring 27.45×8.66 m was used, on the edges of which ammunition storage was located, in the center - living quarters, and between it and the artillery bunkers - howitzer positions (all this was protected by armor sheets). Each battery had at its disposal three AMMI pontoons and five LCM-8 landing craft (three of them served as tugboats pushing pontoons, one as a fire control center, and another one carried additional ammunition). Since 1966, new 105-mm howitzers M102 began to arrive to replace the M101A1. The old systems were gradually transferred to the Allies until the end of 1969. South Vietnam received 730 M101A1 howitzers (only 60 of the new M102 systems were delivered). A year later, the South Vietnamese army had forty divisions of 105-mm howitzers (thirty in infantry divisions, seven separate and three airborne), as well as a hundred separate M101A1 platoons in fortified positions. Losses were also considerable, especially during the repulse of large-scale offensive operations. So, for the period from March 31 to April 10, 1972, 81 howitzers were lost. — Meanwhile, in the US Army itself, these guns were abandoned far from immediately. — In the US Army and Marine Corps, the M102 was never able to completely replace the old 105-millimeter guns. In 1983, the M101A1 took part in the last combat operation in the US Army — the invasion of Grenada. In 1985, the US Army had (mostly in the National Guard and Reserve) six M101 howitzers and 494 M101A1s. It wasn't until the 1990s that both the M101A1 and M102 were replaced by the new 105mm M119 howitzers. — During the so-called Cold War, the United States was an active supplier of its weapons to allies and partners. Surely, foreign armies were also interested in this proven weapon? — In the postwar years, American 105-mm howitzers entered the arms of the armies of several dozen countries — primarily NATO members (Belgium, Denmark, Greece, Italy, the Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Turkey , Germany, France). Non-aligned Austria and Yugoslavia also received them, and after the collapse of the latter, newly independent states. In Canada, Australia and New Zealand, the M101A1 replaced the British-style 25-pounder. If in Australia and New Zealand the American howitzers have already been replaced by the licensed version of the English L118, then the Canadians in 1997 modernized their 105-mm howitzers (replacing the barrel with a longer, 33-caliber one) and under the C3 designation they keep a certain amount in spare parts. The basic version of the M101A1 was designated in Canada as C1 and was produced under license in the 1950s. In Latin America, the countries that did not operate American 105-mm howitzers are easier to think of: Costa Rica and Panama. In the rest of the states of the region (from Mexico in the north to Argentina in the south, as well as the islands of Haiti and the Dominican Republic), these howitzers are in service. Their number varies from country to country and ranges from a few units to several hundred (for example, Brazil has more than 250). In Africa, M101s are less common, but even in this region, you can name a good dozen countries that have received these systems. Ethiopia, Libya and Liberia received 105-mm howitzers as military aid from the United States, and Mozambique and some other states received them -inherited- from the colonialists. In the Middle East, M101 was used by both sides of the Israeli-Jordanian and Iranian-Iraqi conflicts, and was used in the armies of Lebanon, Saudi Arabia, and Yemen. American 105-millimeter guns are quite widespread in Indochina and the Far East (Vietnam, Laos, Cambodia, Thailand, Burma, the Republic of China, the Republic of Korea, Japan). In Japan and Taiwan, M101A1 howitzers were produced under license. In several countries, these howitzers have been modernized (for example, by turning into self-propelled guns, as in the Republic of Korea), but the modernization of the M101 is a topic for a separate story — Well, and a few words, Mr. Professor, about the present of these howitzers. — M101's career is gradually coming to an end. But even in the 21st century, this howitzer continues to serve to protect democracy. Ukraine received 18 such howitzers in September 2022. Their path to our Armed Forces was winding: the Americans at one time gave these howitzers to Denmark, and in 2002 they gave them to Lithuania, and twenty years later, the Lithuanians gave the M101A1 to Ukraine. The Ukrainian M101A1 made its combat debut in November 2022, and this howitzer was officially adopted by the Armed Forces of Ukraine on August 28, 2023. 71 separate hunting brigades are known to use these systems. In one of its previous materials, ArmyInform told about the service of these guns in the Armed Forces of Ukraine and how they are evaluated by our garmaty.

Title: How many rockets are needed to bring down the Crimean bridge: an expert on air defense of the Russia...
Description: Military expert Petro Chernyk told ArmyInform about this. — Today, there is a question as to what the air defense of Crimea is in terms of cover by anti-aircraft missile systems. Indeed, at the moment it is much denser and better than the cover in Moscow, the military expert notes. According to him, almost all complexes are concentrated in Crimea, starting with a small radius of action, that is, for example, such as OSA, to the most modern S-300, S-400. And there is already confirmed information that their very rare S-500 complexes, of which there are 16 units in total, will be deployed there. This complex declares a target interception range of up to 600 kilometers at a speed of 3,000 meters per second - here we are talking about the target. Chernyk reminds that the speed of ATACMS missile is 1500 meters per second. — Why does the enemy act in this way? Because there is a problem with the Crimean Bridge. We are well aware that in order for the Crimean bridge to fall, it must be attacked by no less than 60-70 ballistic missiles. These are the same ATACMS. Or, let's say, now there is news that the development of our Ukrainian ballistic missiles of the Grom-2 type continues. In fact, there is nothing new here, but this work is ongoing, the expert adds. Chernyk says that there must be a large number of drones in this component: - And the total salvo for the bridge to really fall should be no less than 100-120 units of the appropriate equipment. the Russians are well aware that as soon as the bridge falls, Crimea will suffocate in terms of logistics. 90% of everything that is transported to Crimea is transported by rail. Petro Chernyk notes that it is becoming more and more difficult for the enemy to deliver (cargo. — Ed.) by barges. — Especially since we already have very good news that we even started sinking barges. Therefore, the enemy concentrated a huge amount of everything in the Crimea. At the same time, over the past six months, we have at least 5 cases of confirmation of the destruction of both the radar systems that provide the same S-400 anti-aircraft missile systems, as well as the destruction of the launchers themselves. And, so far, there is no confirmed information that the old ATACMS, which entered service in 1989, were successfully intercepted by the air defense system of the Russian Federation in Crimea, the expert emphasized.

Title: $3 million investment to combat information threats: help from European funds
Description: About this informs September 12 the Deputy Prime Minister for Innovation, Development of Education, Science and of Technologies, Minister of Digital Transformation Mykhailo Fedorov. -The investment will enable the startup to scale into new markets and enter B2B to protect brands from information attacks,- he assured. Osavul was created by Ukrainian developers at the beginning of a full-scale invasion to combat Russian propaganda. The AI ​​algorithm analyzes tens of millions of messages, detects bots and planned operations much faster than any team of analysts. -Osavul focuses on all possible channels to nip IPOs in the bud and identify information threats,- the statement said. Initially, the startup focused on an internal client, in particular the National Security Council and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, helping to monitor the Russian IPSO, disinformation and manipulation in social networks. -Ukrainian Osavul has now entered the foreign market - the startup operates in five countries and collects data from more than 100 countries, and recently took part in the investigation of information warfare directed against NATO,- said Mykhailo Fedorov. As reported by ArmyInform, the Vrave1 defense development cluster launched new grants - 4 and 8 million hryvnias, previously the maximum amount was 2 million.

Title: Arms production and the needs of the Armed Forces: Volodymyr Zelenskyi met with the delegation of th...
Description: This was reported by the site Office of the President. -Thank you for this visit. We are always happy to see leaders from Denmark at the level of government, parliament. We are very glad to have such strong friends. And we are very grateful that you have been with us since the beginning of the full-scale war, helping a lot. Not only in the military dimension, but also financially and humanitarianly,- the head of state said. The President talked about the situation in the combat zone and the urgent needs of defenders of Ukraine. Volodymyr Zelenskyi noted Denmark's significant contribution to strengthening the defense capabilities of our country and leadership in the international air force coalition. -We are grateful to Denmark for the first batch of F-16 fighter jets, which are already protecting Ukraine from Russian missiles,- the head of state emphasized. During the meeting, they discussed the implementation of the bilateral security agreement signed in February this year in Lviv, as well as ways to develop cooperation in the field of joint production of weapons. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also thanked Denmark for its participation in the reconstruction of Ukraine, in particular for patronage over the reconstruction of Mykolaiv and the region.

Title: In the Limansky direction, the enemy is increasing the use of systems -Solntsepok-
Description: A serviceman of the 60th Separate Mechanized Brigade, Bohdan, told about this on Army TV. -The enemy is trying to increase the pressure, but they have problems that they cannot solve, first and foremost is the morale of their soldiers,- he said. The serviceman also said that it is very common among Russians to use Esmarch tourniquets instead of tourniquets for wounds, even among special forces. As reported by ArmyInform, the occupiers the positions of the units of the Defense Forces in Zaporizhzhia are heavily bombarded with artillery, airstrikes, strike drones and drops from copters. In view of this, the Ukrainian defenders must move and set up new positions in other places. This was the case, in particular, in the Orihiv direction.

Title: Loved walks and corresponded with Russian intelligence - now behind bars
Description: About inform at the Donetsk Regional Prosecutor's Office. The citizen was notified of suspicion of unauthorized distribution information on the deployment of the Armed Forces of Ukraine (Part 2 of Article 114-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). -According to the investigation, in March 2024, a resident of the village Tatyanivka of Sviatohirska TG communicated via Viber with her friend, who left for the Russian Federation after the full-scale invasion of the occupiers. During numerous conversations, the man spread military information to her. He learned these data during walks around the settlement, as well as from neighbors. In particular, in the text messages, the suspect indicated the locations of the bases of the armed forces and the location of Ukrainian military units in the village,- the prosecutor's office said. Currently he has been remanded in custody. The sanction of the article provides for punishment in the form of imprisonment for a term of 5 to 8 years. How reported ArmyInform, the counterintelligence of the Security Service thwarted new attempts by the military intelligence of the Russian Federation to get up-to-date data on the defense of Zaporozhye.

Title: Seven people were injured as a result of airstrikes in Kharkiv and its suburbs
Description: This was notified in the State Emergency Service. As a result of the shelling, residential buildings were damaged, and there are injured people. In one of the private houses, two women and an 11-year-old child were blocked due to damage to the front door. Emergency workers helped people get out. Rescue workers, pyrotechnicians and psychologists of the State Emergency Service worked at the scene. The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office reported that from 16:45 to 17:00 Russian troops carried out a series of air strikes on Kharkiv and its suburbs. The occupiers also struck the territory of -Ekopark- in the village with an air munition. Forests of the Malodanyliva community. There were no injuries at the scene of the impact. Trees and a fence were damaged. From the recovered debris, the law enforcement officers have previously determined that the enemy used the FAB-250 from the UMPK for shelling. As reported by ArmyInform, at noon on September 12, the occupiers shelled the village of Borov, Izyum district, Kharkiv region, for the second time in a day. The occupiers targeted the rescuers of the State Emergency Service, who were eliminating the consequences of the previous shelling. As a result of repeated Russian shelling 2 people died, another 7 were injured, including 3 rescuers.

Title: - Military was playing, he was sitting in this grenade, and it exploded in his hands - interception ...
Description: Audio recording published by GUR MOU. -Only three girls were officially taken to the hospital. Nothing is known about the soldier in whose hands the grenade exploded. And the official version is a drone,- says the Russian woman. According to her, if it really was a drone, there would be completely different destruction. -He, he says, was playing military, he was sitting on this grenade, it exploded in his hands. He, he says, filmed himself. Blood, yes, doh*, because there are no such photos on social networks. My mother, of course, and Yarik says where he is, he says, he flew into the middle of the kitchen and, he says, broke up, it doesn't happen like that, he says,- says the woman. The GUR of the IOU emphasized that there will be a fair retribution for every war crime committed against Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, during the operation in the waters of the Black Sea, soldiers of the GUR special unit of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine -30sm-za-50-miljoniv-dolariv/->destroyed a Russian Su-30SM combat aircraft by a MANPADS hit.

Title: Enemy shelling intensified in the Zaporozhye direction: the Defense Forces are setting up new positi...
Description: Captain Dmytro Lykhovii, spokesman for the Tavria Military Academy, told about this on the air of the national telethon -Yedini Novyni- . — Positions are exposed to significant combined fire intensity. Even taking into account the fact that there is a fairly wide gray area, and the battles are of a positional nature, our units have to leave some positions because they are simply burned out, destroyed, he said. In view of this, the Ukrainian defenders must move and set up new positions in other places. This was the case, in particular, in the Orihiv direction. — The statistics of damage to Russian personnel and Russian equipment testify to the increase in the intensity of hostilities. Yesterday, 69 people were destroyed or disabled in other ways - these are irrevocable, sanitary and captives together, the spokesman said. Also, 42 units of weapons and military equipment of the Russian occupiers were destroyed and damaged in the operational zone of the -Tavria- air defense system. — There is something to brag about here, because in the Gulyajpil direction, where hostilities have not been taking place on the ground since mid-August, we managed to hit one tank and 3 armored fighting vehicles, Dmytro Lykhovi noted. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the South, Ukrainian FPV drones destroy reconnaissance drones of the occupiers.

Title: 46 units of enemy equipment: the paratroopers repelled four waves of assaults during the day
Description: A video of the successful work was published on the brigade's Facebook page. -On September 12, the Russian occupiers thought of setting another record. Four waves of assaults from 5:45 a.m. to noon on the positions of the battalions of our brigade should, according to the enemy's plan, break through the defense of the Ukrainian paratroopers,- the brigade reported. Tanks, armored personnel carriers, infantry fighting vehicles, infantry on motorcycles - in general, the occupiers used 46 units of armored and not so vehicles. -And the record was set! Such a number of destroyed and damaged enemy equipment in one day in the direction of responsibility of the 46th brigade has never really happened,- the post says. Out of 46 targets, the paratroopers destroyed 15 units (9 BMPs, 2 tanks, 2 armored personnel carriers and 2 motorcycles) and disabled 11 BMPs with accurate fire from all available means of destruction. -Whoever of the enemies managed to nudge their heels in time, consider them lucky - they will live longer. But it won't be long, until the next heated meeting!-, the paratroopers assure.

Title: Russian troops fired at residents of Kherson region: 5 victims are known
Description: This was reported by the head of the Kherson City Military Administration, Roman Mrochko. According to him, after 15:00 the occupiers fired at Komysany. Three people who were in the house at that moment were injured. A 56-year-old man and a 49-year-old woman were treated by medics at the scene. They have contusion, explosive and closed craniocerebral injuries. Also, a 75-year-old woman was hospitalized with a blast injury and a shrapnel wound. In addition, two wounded were brought to the hospital from Antonivka. -Woman and man born in 1968 due to the dropping of explosives from the drone by the enemy, they received a blast injury and multiple shrapnel wounds. Necessary medical assistance is being provided to the victims,- ​​the statement said. As ArmyInform reported, the occupiers also inflicted an attack on the humanitarian mission of the Red Cross in Donetsk region.

Title: The Rome Statute, deportation of children, war criminals of the Russian Federation — the President s...
Description: This is reported by September 12, Office of the President. The head of state thanked Ukraine for its support, participation in the -United for Justice- conference and the fourth Summit of First Ladies and Gentlemen. -Thank you for everything you do for us, for your support, thank you for your decision to participate in the United for Justice conference.- Each of these signals is important to us, and it is very important that the world hears us,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy said. The President noted the permanent cooperation of the ICC with the Office of the Prosecutor General of Ukraine. The head of state also reminded that Ukraine has ratified the Rome Statute, and emphasized that it is extremely important not to allow court decisions regarding warrants for the arrest of Russian war criminals to be ignored. As reported by ArmyInform, Volodymyr Zelenskyi previously stated that the legal system -ponad-137-tysyach-voyennyh-zlochyniv/->mustwork so that the Rome Statute, and, in particular, the International Criminal Court warrant that was issued against the main Russian criminal, really limited him and already ensured his isolation.

Title: A sharp escalation in the difficult terrain near the Dnipro: 60 enemy assaults took place over the p...
Description: Captain Dmytro Lykhovii, spokesman for the -Tavria- OUV, announced this on the air of the nationwide telethon -Yedini Novyni- . — Compared to the previous period of relative lull, this is a sharp aggravation. The enemy is making significant efforts to occupy the gray zone on the so-called islands in this area, which is difficult, it is cut by straits, mouths of the Dnieper, various water obstacles right on the left bank, he said. During the day yesterday, the occupiers stormed the positions of the Defense Forces 7 times, today from the beginning of the day until 4 p.m. twice. For assaults in this terrain, which is difficult to organize, the enemy is forced to use a variety of watercraft. — Combat actions are somewhat complicated by the need for logistics with the help of boats, jet skis. A large number of these watercraft are destroyed, even entire warehouses. Day by day, the Russians there suffer significant losses, attack in small groups, the spokesman said. Thanks to effective combat work, units of the Defense Forces manage to hold back the advance of the enemy and prevent the loss of positions. — Our units manage to hold positions on the left bank of the Dnieper. It's not just Krynyk, it's about 7 locations at once, starting from the mouth of the Dnipro and further east of Krynyk, Dmytro Lykhova clarified. He noted that on the Left Bank of the Dnieper our military is increasingly taking prisoners. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Kherson Oblast units of the Defense Forces struck Russian radio-controlled boats that the enemy used to cross the straits.

Title: The enemy targeted the rescuers in the Kharkiv region: 2 people were killed, 3 employees of the Stat...
Description: The State Emergency Service of Ukraine informed about this. As a result of repeated Russian shelling, 2 people died, 7 more were injured, including 3 rescuers. Employees of the State Emergency Service were extinguishing the fire, which arose as a result of a previous enemy strike. In general, as a result of the Russian strikes, fires broke out in four different locations: a commercial establishment, 2 private houses and grass in an open area were on fire. 2 fire trucks were damaged. The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informed that a 76-year-old man and a 55-year-old man were killed as a result of the shelling of Borova year old woman According to preliminary data, Russian troops struck the settlement with Tornado-S surface-to-air missiles. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that rescuers got 86-year-old woman from under the rubble of a destroyed house in Borova.

Title: The new system of planning, reporting and the structure of the Ministry of Defense are the prioritie...
Description: informs about this September 12 at the MOU. He told the delegation, which, in particular, included representatives of the European External Affairs Service, the EU Consultative Mission, about the priorities of the Ministry of Defense in this process. Among them is work on an integrated defense system model. -We consider the Ministry as a coordinator of the Defense Forces, which must respond to changes and threats,- said Stanislav Heyder. According to him, five groups have been identified within which relevant policies are being developed and the results will be presented soon. Other reform priorities include a new planning and reporting system, a new structure of the Ministry of Defense aimed at avoiding duplication of functions and strengthening civilian control. The Deputy Minister thanked the EU for constant military, economic and political assistance. -A number of European support mechanisms currently in place are a significant contribution to our fight for freedom,- Stanislav Heyder said. The Ukrainian delegation also informed the EU experts about the current security situation around the borders of Ukraine and in the Black Sea region. As reported by ArmyInform, the EU delegation headed by the Managing Director of the Department for Peace, Security and Defense of the European External Action Service, Benedikta von Seherr-Tossdiscussedin Kyiv cooperation in the field of security and defense investments with the leadership of the IOU.

Title: Crazy -drakaris-: the occupiers -fired up- with the new idea of ​​the Third Assault
Description: The vivid video use of a new type of UAV against the Russians was told in an exclusive comment in the battalion of unmanned systems 3 OSHBr. -The events are taking place in the area of ​​responsibility of our brigade, in the Kharkiv region. Dragon drones burn enemy positions and BC warehouses located in densely planted forest strips - landings,- says Dmytro -Turok- Lytvynenko, commander of the unmanned systems battalion of the 3rd OSHBr. According to him, this enables Ukrainian means of objective surveillance to more effectively monitor enemy activity. -It has a very influential effect on the moral and psychological state of the occupiers and forces them to finally retreat from our Ukrainian land. The operators really -like- how the occupiers burn, run, fuss and eventually leave their positions!- - noted Dmytro -Turok- Lytvynenko. As reported ArmyInform, soldiers of the -Rarog- battalion of the 24th mechanized brigade named after King Danylo set fire not only to enemy equipment, but also to the personnel of the occupiers.

Title: Three military cars were burned: five Kyiv residents were informed of the suspicion
Description: About this informs September 12 Office of the Prosecutor General. According to the investigation, in late August-September 2024, while looking for part-time work, the suspects received messages in Telegram with offers for $1,000 to find and burn the car of a serviceman of the Armed Forces or other military formations. The men looked for such cars in the areas where they live, photographed them and sent the photo to the -curator- in Telegram. -After receiving approval from the customer to set fire to these cars and a promise to pay $1,000, they bought fire-starting liquid and waited for the night to complete the task,- the report said. It is noted that in Holosiyivskyi district on St. Two youths set fire to Yamska's Chevrolet Tahoe car. In Darnytskyi district on St. In Urlivska, two men set fire to the Mercedes Vito car, and in Obolonsky district on St. The Ozernyi suspect set the Niva car on fire. On their mobile phones, paliyas filmed how the cars were burning for the purpose of further reporting to the customer. None of them received the promised $1,000. Under the procedural guidance of the Kyiv City Prosecutor's Office, five residents of Kyiv were notified of suspicion for obstructing the lawful activities of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and other military formations (Part 1, Article 114-1 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). All suspects have been remanded in custody. The sanction of the article provides for deprivation of liberty for a period of 5 to 8 years. As reported by ArmyInform, previously the Security Service and the National Policeneutralized a criminal group that carried out the -order- of the Russian Federation to commit arson in Ukraine.

Title: Crossing to the other world — HIMARS covered the enemy on the Kursk bridge with cassettes
Description: The video appeared on the evening of September 12 on the channel of the Comanche Artillery Reconnaissance Division of the 40th Artillery Brigade named after Grand Duke Vytautas. The strike was a joint effort of 14 separate regiments and rocket artillery. The Russians gathered their soldiers near the crossing of the Seim, and hit them with a cluster munition that hit a large area on both banks of the river. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the Comanche Artillery Reconnaissance Division of the 40th Artillery Brigade named after Grand Duke Vytautas showed the destruction of the radar station of the modern Russian anti-aircraft missile complex S-400.

Title: There will be more F-16s in Ukrainian skies — Rustem Umyerov on a conversation with the Romanian Def...
Description: He informs about this on September 12 in social networks. According to him, Ukraine will soon receive a new Patriot air defense system from Romanian partners. -There will also be more F-16s in Ukrainian skies: a group of our pilots is already undergoing training in Romania,- he said. Rustem Umyerov thanked his Romanian colleague, the people and the government of his country for supporting and strengthening Ukrainian air defense. -We agreed to continue cooperation. I am planning my visit to Romania,- he summarized.

Title: Army+ already has two hundred thousand soldiers and four thousand reports - Kateryna Chernogorenko
Description: This was reported by September 12 Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Every day, an average of up to 10,000 defenders register with Army+. In addition, two thousand requests to update data from servicemen who had difficulties with authorization are being processed. Currently, Army+ functions are available to servicemen of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the State Special Transport Service of Ukraine. Later, the application will be scaled to all Defense Forces. -A month ago, together with hundreds of guests, including from other countries, I watched with admiration for the first time how two servicemen created and approved the first electronic report in the history of Ukraine in two minutes. Today, two hundred thousand military personnel can use Army+ capabilities. More to come. Updates and new functionality, taking into account feedback and comments from military personnel. Army+ becomes an instrument of changes in the army, so that further these changes will be painfully felt by the enemy,- said Deputy Minister of Defense for Digitalization Kateryna Chernogorenko. Today, Army+ allows service members to generate a unique service member number called Army ID, create, submit and reconcile electronic reports and take surveys. The second survey on the use of combat systems in the military is currently underway. Servicemen can pass it until September 20. -A month has passed since Army+ has been working in the army. Its capabilities have already been evaluated by two hundred thousand military personnel. The application is implemented by more than 600 military units. I am grateful to all military personnel - from soldiers and commanders on the front line to clerks in headquarters - for organizing work with electronic reports and using modern tools that make us stronger and more effective than the enemy,- emphasized the Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces, Colonel Andriy Lebedenko. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine has developed and plans to submit to the Verkhovna Rada a draft law on the register of military personnel.

Title: Downing of the Russian Su-30SM, operation -Azov-, operation of a ground drone: stream from a front-l...
Description: After the Russians lost contact with their ship, they launched a search and rescue operation. Later, a fuel stain and the wreckage of the plane were found at the crash site. -Azov- showed footage of a combat operation in the marshes of Luhansk region. Intelligence in the -Ukrainian Vietnam- is footage of the clearing of the positions of the occupiers, the elimination of enemy infantry and trophy weapons. The video shows the work of the reconnaissance unit of the 12th brigade in the forests near Siversky Dinets. The Ukrainian ground drone brought something very interesting to the Russians' position. The occupiers hid in an underground passage under the railway tracks, where our soldiers sent a -gift-. And our aerial drone already recorded a powerful explosion. These and other topics are discussed by our presenters - lieutenant colonel Serhiy Misyura and junior lieutenant Serhiy Lipko.

Title: With one drone, the marines repelled the enemy attack on the Kurshchyna with a single hit
Description: The video was released on September 12 on the unit's channel. The occupiers came forward to storm our positions near the village of Vyshnevka on the Kurshchyna, for which they had to cross the railway. Our aerial scouts spotted the enemy. An FPV drone was directed at the invaders and hit one of the Russians. The others decided to retreat, leaving the body of their fallen comrade behind. As reported by ArmyInform, Putin's next attack aircraft were buried alive by the pilots of the -Griffon- unit of the 501st separate marine infantry battalion somewhere in the Kharkiv region.

Title: The enemy attacks the most in the Kurakhiv direction — the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukra...
Description: Operational information as of 16.00 on September 12 was published by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Today, in Kharkiv Oblast, Chernihiv Oblast, and Sumy Oblast, the communities of Timofiivka, Ivano-Shiychyne, Gremyach, Sukhodil, and Porozok were affected by the fire of enemy artillery and mortars. In addition, the Russians carried out airstrikes with anti-aircraft missiles in the areas of Pavlivka, Marynoy, Bilopyll, Obodiv and Richok. In the Kharkiv direction, the enemy twice stormed the positions of our units in the Vovchansk region. In the Kupyansk direction, from the beginning of the century, the Russian occupiers carried out offensive actions near Sinkivka and Kolisnikivka. One battle is still going on. On the Lymansky direction, the enemy attacked three times near Druzhelyubivka and Nevsky. The situation is under control. In the Siverskyi direction, the Defense Forces repelled the aggressor's attempts to advance near Verkhnyokamyanskyi. One battle is still going on in this area. In the Kramatorsk direction, there have been four clashes so far in the areas of Zaliznyansk and Stupochky. At the same time, enemy aircraft struck the settlements of Pavlivske and Novopokrovka. In the Toretsk direction, the occupiers, with the support of bomber aircraft, tried four times to dislodge our units from their positions in the New York and Nelipivka districts. They received a tough rebuff. In addition, the Russian aggressors struck Toretsk and Ivanopil with NARs and KABs. In the Pokrovsky direction, the enemy carried out 20 assaults in the areas of the settlements of Vozdvizhenka, Novooleksandrivka, Zelene Pole, Novotroitske, Novogrodivka, Grodivka, Selidove and Mykhailivka. The defense forces of Ukraine restrained the onslaught of Russian troops and repelled 14 attacks, currently six battles are still going on. In the direction of Kurakhiv, the invaders attacked 33 times in the direction of Zhelanny Pershy, Ukrainsky, Oleksandropol, Georgiivka, and Kostyantynivka. 27 attempts by the occupiers to advance have already been repulsed. The fighting continues — the hottest at the moment near Georgiivka. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy stormed our positions near Zolotaya Niva and Katerynivka twice in vain. Two enemy attacks were also repulsed in the Dnieper direction. In other directions, the operational situation is without significant changes. As reported by ArmiyaInform, during the past day 105 combat clashes were recorded.

Title: Lithuania is ready to increase support for Ukrainian defense production - the President
Description: He informed about this September 12, based on the results of negotiations with the President of the Republic of Lithuania Gitanas Nausieda. During the meeting, the defense of Ukraine and the key needs of Ukrainian soldiers were discussed. Volodymyr Zelenskyi informed about the situation at the front, in particular about the Pokrovsky, Toretsky and Vugledarsky directions, as well as about the defensive operation in the Kursk region. -We all clearly understand: the protection of the Ukrainian state also means the protection of the independence of all states bordering Russia. Our Europe and the European way of life can be preserved only under the conditions that Ukraine stands up and wins this war,- he said. The President of Ukraine thanked for all the help from Lithuania, in particular for the military packages provided and the level of support for Ukraine's military capabilities guaranteed for 10 years. The leaders also discussed agreements on defense cooperation: investments in the production of drones in Ukraine and co-production. Gitanas Nausieda said that Lithuania is ready to increase support in this direction. -All co-production, all investments in defense production are very important for us. This is a priority today. Now everyone can see how successful Ukraine is in the development and use of its long-range weapons, its long-range drones,- noted Volodymyr Zelenskyi. The head of the Ukrainian state also emphasized that before the start of the heating period, Ukraine needs even more active support for its requests to partners regarding air defense systems and energy aid packages. Gitanas Nausieda assured that Lithuania will continue to support Ukraine, in particular in the context of the supply of 155 mm ammunition. He also reminded that Lithuania will provide 10 million euros for financing of the long-range capabilities of the Defense Forces of Ukraine, in particular the Palyanitsa drone missile. -We are interested in this and have spoken with the President about cooperation in the production of maritime drones,- said the leader of the Republic of Lithuania. According to him, the Lithuanian-Ukrainian defense forum was held the day before in Kyiv. a>. Its purpose is to strengthen cooperation and strengthen the Ukrainian defense industry. Gitanas Nausieda also noted that Lithuania calls on NATO members to transfer long-range missiles, fighter jets and air defense systems to Ukraine and to allow unrestricted strikes on Russian military facilities. According to ArmyInform, the President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyi during a meeting with the President of Estonia Alar Karis potreby-ukrayiny/->discussed defense support, reconstruction of our country and the path to the EU.

Title: The view from the middle of the box is an epic battle in the Pokrovsky direction
Description: The video appeared on September 12 on the brigade's channel. The crew of the Chervonaya Kalina armored vehicle advanced towards the enemy's positions in the Pokrovsky direction. The task: to work quickly, not to stop the movement and inflict maximum damage on the occupants. This was done. As reported by ArmyInform, tankers of the National Guard brigade -Chervon Kalina- with the support BMP destroyed Russian positions and buildings in which the occupiers hid.

Title: Security agreement, -humanitarian shield-, Defense Innovation Office: negotiations of the MoU and th...
Description: About this inform September 12 in the MOU. At the negotiations, Deputy Minister of Defense Stanislav Hayder focused on the implementation of the security agreement between Ukraine and the EU. -We are interested in holding open consultations on joint projects in the defense sphere. This includes both the training of military personnel and the supply of weapons and military equipment,- he said. Stanislav Heyder noted that Denmark's investment in the Ukrainian defense industrial complex is an important step to strengthen Ukraine's defense capabilities and an example for other countries. Oleksandr Balanutsa, Deputy Minister of European Integration, raised the issue of Ukraine's recent initiative to create a -humanitarian shield- over Ukraine. -Russian drones and missiles regularly and deliberately cross the borders of European NATO member countries, so a decision must be made to shoot them down. Romania and Poland are already conducting consultations on this issue within their countries,- he noted. The Ukrainian side thanked the EU for training tens of thousands of Ukrainian servicemen and expressed hope that by the end of 2024 their number will reach 75,000 soldiers, sergeants and officers. They also emphasized the importance of potentially holding such training on the territory of Ukraine, which will allow modernizing training centers and providing them with the necessary equipment. -The EU is ready to cooperate closely with Ukraine with the aim of implementing initiatives within the framework of the security agreement. Our task is to understand real needs and priorities so that our assistance is as effective as possible,- said Benedikta von Seherr-Toss. The representative of the EU also informed about the details of the opening of the Defense Innovation Office in Ukraine and the main goals of this initiative. The opening of this institution will contribute to the establishment of ties between EU companies and Ukrainian companies in the field of military development. As reported by ArmyInform, also the delegations of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine and the USA >discussedexpansion of defense cooperation.

Title: Ukraine seized the property of the family of a high-ranking official of the Russian Federation worth...
Description: The Prosecutor General's Office informs about this. According to the investigation, a high-ranking Russian military figure actively supports the aggressive policy of the Russian Federation towards Ukraine. Previously, he held the positions of Deputy Minister of Defense and Chairman of the Committee on Military-Technical Cooperation, and now he is a member of the Board of Directors of the Defense Corporation and State Counselor at the Ministry of Defense of the Russian Federation. In December 2023, he was included in the sanctions list for his involvement in supporting Russian armed aggression against Ukraine. Within the limits of these sanctions, all his assets on the territory of Ukraine were blocked, the possibility of conducting trade operations was limited, and the transfer of rights to intellectual property was also prohibited. Sanction measures included blocking an attempt to withdraw monetary assets from Ukraine. An elite apartment on the sea coast of Odessa with an area of ​​1,012.6 square meters was tried to be sold through an intermediary for 1.5 million US dollars. The real estate registered to the wife of a sanctioned person was seized by the decision of the Kyiv District Court of Odesa in April 2024. The seizure of real estate was carried out in accordance with Ukrainian legislation with the aim of preserving physical evidence in criminal proceedings and preventing the transfer of assets outside the country. A pre-trial investigation into the fact of financing actions committed with the aim of violent change or overthrow of the constitutional order or seizure of state power, change of the territory or state border of Ukraine (Article 110-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine) is carried out by the State Security Service of Ukraine in Odesa Region. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the military commissar from Vinnytsia is in the wrong hands took an apartment in a new building.

Title: Wheat should never be a target for missiles: Volodymyr Zelenskyi on the Russian strike on a civilian...
Description: He wrote about this in his Telegram channel. The head of state noted that today's strike in the Black Sea was against an ordinary civilian ship immediately after leaving Ukrainian territorial waters. According to preliminary data, fortunately, there were no human casualties. Ukraine is one of the key global donors of food security. The internal stability and life of dozens of countries in different parts of the world depends on the normal and smooth operation of our export food corridor. According to Volodymyr Zelenskyi, our food supply to African countries and the Middle East region is critical. -We will continue to do everything to protect our ports, our Black Sea and supply food to the global market. This is a real priority for Ukraine - the protection of life, and it should also be a priority for every country,- the President noted. He also added that he was waiting for the reaction of the world. Wheat and food security should never be targeted by missiles. As reported by ArmyInform, President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy -chervonogo-hresta/->reacted to another Russian war crime: the occupiers attacked the vehicles of the humanitarian mission of the International Committee of the Red Cross in Donetsk region.

Title: Every year, Estonia will allocate part of its GDP for Ukraine's defense needs
Description: He wrote about this in his Telegram channel. -We appreciate Estonia's decision to allocate 0.25% of GDP to Ukraine's defense needs every year. This is enshrined in the bilateral security agreement,- the head of state noted. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also thanked for the support in all areas and the very important agreement on cooperation in the field of security between our countries. As reported by ArmyInform, the President and Prime Minister of Latvia discussed the implementation of the bilateral security agreement.

Title: The Occupying Torch - royal drones give the Russians fiery races
Description: The video of combat work was released on September 12 on the battalion channel. A quad bike and a motorcycle, which were engulfed in flames, were especially clearly hit. Two motorcyclists, engulfed in fire, ran to their own positions. -Some Russians climb here, others run away, they use everything that moves: motorcycles, ATVs, buggies. And we punish everyone who came to us with war,- commented the video in the brigade. As reported by ArmyInform, during the criminal launch of ammunition by the enemy, soldiers of the -Rarog- battalion of the 24th mechanized brigade named after King Danylo hunted down and burned heavy flamethrower system of salvo fire TOS-1A -sonczepok-.

Title: The world can force Moscow to seek peace: the President reacted to the hostile shelling of the Red C...
Description: He wrote about this in his Telegram channel. -As of now, it is known about two injured people - they are being provided with all the necessary assistance. Unfortunately, three people were killed by this Russian strike. My condolences to family and friends,- the head of state said. The President emphasized that everything is absolutely obvious in this war: Russia is carrying evil, Ukraine is protecting life. And if someone wants to hear -both sides-, then in Russia it is only perceived as a license to continue killing. -The world must react tough and principled. One cannot remain indifferent to both countries and international organizations. Only together can the world force Russia to stop this terror and force Moscow to seek peace,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy summed up. We will remind, the army of the Russian Federation struck another blow on the Kostyantynivska community as a result of which 3 people died and 2 were injured in Virolyubivka.

Title: Dropping season — night bombing of enemy positions
Description: The video of the combat work was released on September 12 on the unit's channel. An enemy ammunition depot, a cannon, a truck and several occupants were destroyed. Drops took place from a great height, which protected the bomber from being shot down, but required great skill from the pilots. As reported by ArmyInform, UAV operators of the rapid response border commandant of the shock drone company of the -Phoenix- air complexes of the -Revenge- Guard offensive brigade discovered an enemy tank and attacked him with resets.

Title: An enemy shell hit a truck with a Red Cross humanitarian worker in Donetsk region: there were casual...
Description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. The village came under artillery fire this morning. One of the shells hit the territory of the enterprise where people were. A truck with humanitarian aid from the International Committee of the Red Cross and a car were destroyed. As noted in the Office of the Prosecutor General, ICRC employees arrived in the settlement with the purpose of extradition to local residents fuel briquettes for heating homes. At the time of the shelling, they were unloading the delivered aid. As a result of the attack, three men died on the spot. Two of their colleagues suffered shrapnel wounds and mine-explosive injuries. The victims were taken to a medical facility. One of the victims is currently in serious condition. In addition, the private sector of Kostyantynivka was again under attack - 7 houses and a power line were damaged there. As reported by ArmyInform, a missile attack on Krasnoyarsk: one dead, four injured from one family.

Title: A swindler in a white coat: for 20 thousand hryvnias he helped to transfer to the rear
Description: informs about this in the special prosecutor's office of the Eastern region. A member of the VLK of the military unit was informed about the suspicion. He is charged with extorting and obtaining an unlawful benefit (Part 3 of Article 368 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). -The investigation established that the senior lieutenant of the medical service demanded 20,000 hryvnias from a serviceman for declaring him fit for military service in military support units, TCC, training centers. At the same time, the suspect warned and emphasized that in case of refusal to provide him with the above unlawful benefit, he will be recognized as fit for military service,- the special prosecutor's office of the Eastern region notes. During the receipt of funds, the suspect was detained in accordance with Art. 208 of the CPC of Ukraine. Currently, the court has chosen a preventive measure for him in the form of detention. The investigation is ongoing. As already told ArmyInform, the SBU reported a new suspicion to the head of the Buchansk TCC, who was exposed in schemes for evasion.

Title: The enemy hit Kharkiv region with cluster munitions: the number of victims is increasing
Description: This was reported by Oleg Synegubov, the head of Kharkiv OVA. According to him, a civilian man and a woman died from an enemy strike, whose body was unblocked from under rubble It is also currently known about seven victims. Among them is a 64-year-old woman who was hospitalized. According to preliminary information, the enemy used a double strike tactic. For this, the aggressor used cluster munitions in a residential area, at least five houses are on fire. As reported by ArmyInform, the Russians dropped a corrected aerial bomb on Kup Yansk, an unmanned aerial vehicle struck the village of Zolochiv.

Title: The President and the Prime Minister of Latvia discussed the implementation of the bilateral securit...
Description: About this informs September 12, Office of the President. The head of state thanked Evica Silina for her personal participation in the fourth summit of the international Crimea platform and Latvia's constant support for Ukraine. Thank you for all your help since the beginning of the full-scale invasion. We are glad to have such good friends not only in the military sphere. We feel your strong advocacy of Ukraine within the EU and NATO,- Volodymyr Zelenskyi noted. During the meeting, they discussed strengthening cooperation in the military-technical sphere and the implementation of a bilateral security agreement. The President told about preparations for the second Peace Summit and emphasized the need to involve as many countries of the Global South as possible in this process. //armyinform.com.ua/2024/09/11/ukrayincziv-zahystyt-latvijska-bronya/->military support package, which will include armored personnel carriers, will arrive from Latvia .

Title: Not beaten, not painted: humanitarian cars were sold to the military
Description: This is notified in the Special Prosecutor's Office of the Western Region. According to the investigation, a 46-year-old military serviceman of the district territorial center equipment and social support sold vehicles imported to Ukraine through charity funds, which he was supposed to give to military formations free of charge. -It was established that he looked for -clients- among military personnel and offered to buy an Opel Frontera, a Jeep Grand Cherokee and a Nissan X-Trail for $13,200. He kept these humanitarian cars on the territory of the TCC,- said the Special Prosecutor's Office of the Western Region. The law enforcement officers documented the criminal activity of the military man and detained him in accordance with Art. 208 of the CPC of Ukraine. At present, the prosecutors have submitted to the court a request to choose a preventive measure in the form of detention for the suspect. ArmyInform told about the detention of a customs inspector at Lviv region, who asked for 13,000 US dollars for a -ticket- abroad during the war.

Title: -I thought it would be like tissue-: the Ministry of Statistics told how many Ukrainians got married...
Description: This was reported by the Deputy Prime Minister for Innovation, Development of Education, Science and Technology. Minister of Digital Transformation Mykhailo Fedorov. He also published the results of 3 days in numbers: Mykhailo Fedorov noted that digitization not only simplifies life, but also helps to create families. -It's a special pleasure after each launch to see the memes you create,- added the Minister of Innovation. Earlier, ArmyInform told how to marry a military man online.

Title: Combat reconnaissance — unique footage of a combat operation in the marshes of Luhansk region
Description: The reconnaissance video appeared on September 12 on the brigade's channel. Footage from GoPro demonstrates the peculiarities of scouts' combat work in difficult-to-navigate terrain. An enemy can hide behind every bush. Therefore, every movement of the body and weapons must be thought out. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 12th special purpose brigade -Azov- of the National Guard of Ukraine showed battles during the offensive in the Kremin direction.

Title: Rocket attack on Krasnoyarsk: one dead, four injured from one family
Description: reported this by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. In particular, in Krasnoyarsk, Dobropil community, one of the shells hit a private house - an 81-year-old woman died there, and four members of her family aged between 21 and 58 were injured. In the village, 6 houses and a power line were damaged. Also, 2 people were injured in Kostyantynivka — 7 houses, a power line, a gas pipeline and a car were damaged there. As reported by ArmyInform, among 11 victims there is a child in Kherson Oblast as a result of Russian attacks.

Title: Cruise missiles -minimaly-: an American start-up offered the Pentagon a new ammunition
Description: The startup Ares Industries, named after the Greek god of war, was only founded in May 2024. However, on the portal of the California startup center Y Combinator the other day there was posted a message that the engineers of this company have already started flight tests of compact and inexpensive cruise missiles from this manufacturer, ArmiyaInform reports. The missiles are being developed primarily for use against ships and will, according to Ares, be -ten times smaller and ten times cheaper- than any currently known model. Anti-ship missiles now weigh more than a ton and cost several million dollars each. Ares plans to sell its rockets for $300,000 per unit. Ares Industries details its developments in a release. The entire summer was spent building several prototypes and testing them in the Mojave Desert. As a result of these tests, the first batch is already being prepared for the delivery of operational missiles to customers, which is planned to be carried out by mid-2025. According to Ares representatives, cruise missiles should be compatible with existing launch platforms and move at a high subsonic speed (the speed of sound is about 1,200 km/h). Developers want to focus on land and ship options, that is, those that are launched from vehicles or warships. In the future, airborne versions and variants with a longer flight range will also appear. Ares does not provide any information about the range of the first version, only stating that it is several hundred miles (that is, no less than 322 kilometers). This California-based startup's rendering shows anti-ship missiles similar to Lockheed Martin's AGM-158C LRASM. Long-range anti-ship missiles (LRASM) have stealth characteristics. Individual cruise missiles can communicate with each other and use artificial intelligence to bypass air defense measures. Their range is 370 kilometers. The updated version, which is planned to be introduced by the US Navy in 2026, is expected to have a range of 950 kilometers. However, AGM-158C LRASMs are quite expensive. The price per unit is about $3 million.The US Navy and Air Force together want to buy more than 1,000 AGM-158Cs by 2030. Ares Industries believes that its anti-ship missiles could hypothetically be used against China in the Pacific Ocean. However, recent conflicts in the Middle East have shown that American weapons are too expensive. Current US anti-ship missiles are designed to attack destroyers. However, it makes no sense to attack smaller frigates or even drone boats with millions of dollars worth of remotely controlled weapons. In a possible conflict in the Pacific, the United States would launch thousands of anti-ship missiles a week, depleting the stockpile in days. -We cannot produce enough anti-ship missiles to counter China,- the company said. Another benefit of Ares Industries' approach is the ability to perform so-called saturation attacks. During such group attacks, the enemy's defense systems are suppressed by a huge number of missiles and drones. However, the weapons with which these attacks are carried out must be correspondingly cheap. And size plays a role, too. Warships have limited space in their missile launchers. For example, if an Arleigh Burke-class destroyer's Mk-41 launcher has room for 96 LRASM cruise missiles, it can at least theoretically carry and launch 960 smaller Ares missiles instead. Then a single destroyer could hit the enemy fleet with nearly a thousand anti-ship missiles. The goal is not only to cause material damage to the enemy. In the second wave of attacks, larger rounds and cruise missiles may be launched. They have a better chance of achieving their goal, because the air defenses are already weakened by Shahed drones or need to be reloaded with ammunition and anti-aircraft missiles, and therefore are not yet ready to repulse an enemy attack. The Pentagon's profile program also shows that the US wants to increase the production of small and cheap weapons. As part of this initiative, thousands of small unmanned autonomous drones will be developed by 2025 and will use artificial intelligence. Defense companies, especially startups, are also joining this trend. Anduril Industries, a company created by Oculus co-founder Palmer Luckey, recently announced that it will build a -hyperscale- manufacturing facility to create large-scale autonomous weapons systems such as drones or autonomous underwater vehicles. <iframe loading=-lazy- title=-What Do The Navy's Ship-Launched Missiles Actually Cost?- width=-640- height=-360- src=-https://www.youtube.com/embed/47BDvAuKRHc?start=271&feature=oembed- frameborder=-0- allow=-accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write ; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; web-share=-strict-origin-when-cross-origin- Comparative evaluation of the US Navy. Title: Counter-intelligence of the SBU exposed attempts by the Russian Federation to obtain data on the def...
Description: About informs Security Service of Ukraine. The enemy agent turned out to be a local IT specialist who worked for a staff member of the Main Directorate of the General Staff of the Russian Armed Forces (better known as Gru). On the instructions of the occupier, the suspect set up an -observation post- in his own apartment to covertly monitor the locations of the Defense Forces. To do this, the informant purchased and installed tactical binoculars with a high magnification, a rangefinder grid and a compass in the apartment of a multi-story building. With the help of specialized optics, the person involved hoped to detect the positions of air defense and Ukrainian artillery, in particular HIMARS rocket artillery systems. The attacker also tracked the routes of military convoys and the location of Defense Forces fortifications. He transmitted the information he received to his Russian curator through an anonymous chat in the messenger. According to the informant's coordinates, the occupiers planned to carry out a new series of missile and drone strikes on the front-line territory of the region. The security service exposed the enemy henchman early and detained him in his own apartment. Prior to that, comprehensive measures were taken to secure the locations of Ukrainian troops. During searches of the detainee's premises, optics and a mobile phone, which he used in his criminal activities, were seized. -Investigators of the Security Service informed him of the suspicion under Part 2 of Art. 114-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (unauthorized dissemination of information about the movement, movement or location of the Armed Forces with the possibility of their identification in the locality with the purpose of providing such information to the state that is carrying out armed aggression against Ukraine),- the message says. The perpetrator is in custody. He faces up to 8 years in prison. The special operation was carried out by SBU employees in the Zaporizhzhia region under the procedural guidance of the regional prosecutor's office. As reported by ArmyInform, life imprisonment threatens the spy who gave away the positions of the Ukrainian artillery.

Title: Creation of technical requirements for turnstiles according to NATO standards: a new development of ...
Description: It is about this informs September 12. -Within the limits of this process, the Department of Health of the Ministry of Defense (DOH) focused on the established requirements for tourniquets of the rotary and lever type, occlusive thoracic bandages, as well as methodologies for assessing their compliance with international standards,- the report says. To implement this task, the Ministry of Defense actively cooperates with international partners, in particular with the NATO Combat Trauma Committee (CoTCCC). The DOZ is studying the best practices of NATO member countries, initiating requests to the defense attaché at Ukrainian embassies regarding the quality standards of hemostatic tourniquets. On the basis of the received data, the department analyzed its own capabilities for the development of technical and functional requirements for mechanical products to stop bleeding. In addition, the Ministry of Defense has applied to the NATO Science & Technology Organization to receive a grant to create a laboratory for testing and testing of tourniquets and first aid equipment. -Providing our army with modern, standardized medical equipment is at the top of our priorities. Our task is to make pre-medical care on the battlefield as effective as possible by adapting and implementing advanced international standards,- said Oksana Sukhorukova, head of the Health Department of the IOU. According to her, the development of requirements for turnstiles and their certification according to NATO standards is key to their strategy. -It's not just a procedure, it's about our commitment to providing every soldier with real-time, life-saving tools on the frontline,- she noted. Another important step was the adoption of order No. 436 dated June 29, 2024 -On approval of the Volumes of pre-medical care provided during hostilities and training of Security Forces and Defense Forces on a tactical basis.- According to it, the skill of using a tourniquet is mandatory at all levels of training in home care. The Ministry of Defense also cooperates with the Main Department of Doctrine and Training of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine on updating the training programs of servicemen. In particular, the Department proposed to make changes to the basic military training program (BZVP), which will contribute to increasing the effectiveness of the training of servicemen in the field of pre-medical care. As reported by ArmyInform, earlier the delegations of the Ministry of Defense and NATO ->discussed speeding up the promised aid to Ukraine from allies.

Title: -Your family will leave you, son-: Russia throws conscripts into battle in the Kharkiv Region
Description: This was reported by the spokesman of the operative-tactical group -Kharkiv-, Colonel Vitaly Sarantsev. The next step may be the start of a large-scale mobilization campaign in the Russian Federation. — The significant losses suffered by the enemy in the Kharkiv direction, more than ten thousand people only in our operational zone in four months, forced Russia to look for additional resources to continue the war. Russian legislation does not prohibit enlisting conscript soldiers for combat operations after they have completed four months of service, so it is possible to predict their appearance in other areas as well, he noted. According to the spokesman, this may indicate a lack of military personnel in Russian units, as a result of which the military command is forced to use less experienced soldiers for combat missions. Voyskovyi added that Russian propaganda had already warmed up society to such a development, tested its reaction, which predictably turned out to be zero, so the next steps should be expected - the start of a large-scale mobilization campaign in Russia. ArmyInform previously reported that in the Kharkiv region, Russia is fighting with poorly trained soldiers.

Title: In the South, Russians regularly gouge out their eyes
Description: On September 12, on the broadcast of the -Yedini Novyni- marathon, the spokesman of the -Tavria- OUV, Dmytro Lykhova, told about it. -It is very gratifying that the statistics of downed reconnaissance drones is increasing. Our aerial reconnaissance has learned to shoot them down with FPV drones. And this statistic of damage to intelligence is constantly growing. There were four such lesions yesterday. Also, two boats, one enemy ATV and one -Detector- communication station were destroyed,- said the spokesman of the -Tavria- OUV. According to Dmytro Lykhovy, the front line is dynamic. Most of the combat clashes take place in the Kherson direction. 7 of them were counted during yesterday's day. -And these seven assault actions were aimed at different islands on the left bank of the Dnieper, both east of Krynok and not far from Kherson. Small infantry groups using boats. There is such a specificity of the area that it is necessary to look for some special methods of logistics through the straits and estuaries, to use hydrocycles. And this entire arsenal of Russian means of transportation is being actively destroyed,- Dmytro Lykhovi concluded. As reported by ArmyInform, according to In August, the occupiers used 200 munitions with poisonous substances in the South, and in ten days of September — four dozen.

Title: The Ministry of Defense published the number of vacancies in the Armed Forces and named the most in-...
Description: About it in interview ArmiyaInform was told by Oleksiy Bezhevets, the authorized representative of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine on recruiting issues. -Plus the online database on four online job search platforms — another 10,000. Yes, the mosaic of vacancies in the Defense Forces is huge. And a high-quality search gives a great conversion: a person who applied and who is suitable for military service can actually find a good job for himself,- said Oleksiy Bezhevets. He also listed the most in-demand professions in the Defense Forces. -Every week there are spikes regarding certain positions. Yes, a large number of applications were, for example, for intelligence. There was a separate period when gunners were looking for positions. UAV operators are always relevant. There is also a demand for staff positions, clerks, and the IT field,- said Oleksiy Bezhevets. As reported by ArmyInform, opened 35th recruiting center of the Ukrainian army.

Title: Valuyte in Valuyki — Defense forces blew up a railway in Russia

As a result of the successful operation, which took place on September 10, 2024, a freight train was damaged that provided the logistical needs of the Russian army. Immediately, 11 wagons and the locomotive of the freight train derailed and overturned.
